警方一直在监听罪犯。
Jǐngfāng yìzhí zài jiāntīng zuìfàn.
The police are continuously monitoring criminals.

连续四个月以来，警方监听了他的所有电话，并密切监视其行踪。
I assume that my telephone also has been tapped by the police.
我想我的电话也已经被警方监听了。
The government failed to pass a law expanding warrantless surveillance.
政府未能通过延长未经授权进行监听的法律。

监视
jiānshì
keep watch

cǐ zhì jìnɡlǐ
salutations; with high respect; withbest wishes

tuōmào zhìjìnɡ 
take off one\'s hat in salutation

zhìjìng
salute; pay one\'s respects to; pay tribute to

敬语是贵族系统中贵族的子女、妻子和其他亲属使用的称呼。

to pay one\'s respects
[frm] 表示某人的敬意
to pay tribute to sb/sth
对某人/某事表示敬意
A tribute was given to the heroes.

儿子善意的努力让父亲的敬慕者有几分扫兴。

yīngshōu（yīngfù）piàojù
bills receivable (payable)

无法应付
wúfǎ yìngfù 
unable to cope with; at the end of one\'s resources

yīngfù shìr
go through the motions

yìngfùyùrú

fùzhūshíshī
付诸 (=之于) 实施

Zhège qián gāi yóu wǒ fù。
This money should be paid by me.
他现在穷得连租钱都不能付了，更不用说押金了。
Tā xiànzài qióng de lián zūqián dōu bùnéng fù le，gèng búyòng shuō yājīn le。
He is too poor to pay the rent right now, let alone the cash pledge.
我现在手头没有钱，请你先帮我垫付一下房租吧。

按质付钱。

你不用非得现在付钱，下个月付也行。

我付钱时您能帮我把那些东西都装到袋里面吗？

如果不付钱，我就把你打趴下。

我们决定分担昨晚晚餐的花销，因为让朱迪一个人给我们所有人付钱不公平。

手机和附件是一起卖的，所以你不用额外付钱买了。

别撕包装，我还没付钱。

这是成功对付那些在付钱时行动缓慢的顾客的方法。
&quot;Those girls, they giggle when they see me&quot; and &quot;cigarettes, you couldn\'t pay me to smoke them&quot; are examples of topicalization.
“Nàxiē gūniángmen，tāmen kànjiàn wǒ jiù gēgē xiào”，“xiāngyān，nǐ bùnéng fùqián ràng wǒ qù xīshí tāmen”zhèyàng de jùzi shì zhǔtí huà de lìzi。
“那些姑娘们，她们看见我就咯咯笑”，“香烟，你不能付钱让我去吸食它们”这样的句子是主题化的例子。

Tā bèi zhǐkòng mǎi dōngxi bú fùqián。

付出代价
fùchū dàijià
pay a price

The cars raced down the street.
Zhèxiē chē zhēngxiānkǒnghòu de cóng Jiēshàng kāi guòqù。
这些车争先恐后地从街上开过去。
Companies will now stampede to release their latest software.
Zhèxiē gōngsī jiāng zhēngxiānkǒnghòu de fābù tāmen zuì xīn de ruǎnjiàn。
这些公司将争先恐后地发布他们最新的软件。
你的意见理论上我同意，但实际上恐怕行不通。
Nǐ de yìjiàn lǐlùn shàngwǒ tóngyì，dàn shíjì shàngkǒngpà xíngbu tōng。
In theory, I agree with you, but I feel that your ideas would not work in practice.
I\'ll have to part company with you there, I\'m afraid.
Wǒ kǒngpà wǒ zài zhèli gēn nǐ yǒu bùtóng yìjiàn。
我恐怕我在这里跟你有不同意见。
别人恐怕不这样看。
Biérén kǒngpà bú zhèyàng kàn。
People won\'t view it this way, I\'m afraid.
这样处理，恐怕不妥。
Zhèyàngchǔlǐ，kǒngpà bùtuǒ。
I\'m afraid this isn\'t the proper way to handle the case.
他恐怕不止六十岁了。
Tā kǒngpà bùzhǐ liùshí suì le。
He is probably over sixty.
走这么多的路恐怕你吃不消。
Zǒu zhèmeduō de lù kǒngpà nǐ chībuxiāo。
It may be too much for you to walk such a long way.
你要求太高，我恐怕达不到。
Nǐ yāoqiú tài gāo，wǒ kǒngpà dábudào。
Your expectations are too high. I\'m afraid I can\'t live up to them.
离开车只有十分钟，恐怕赶不上了。
Lí kāichē zhǐyǒu shí fēn zhōng，kǒngpà gǎn bú shàng le。
The train is going to leave in ten minutes. I\'m afraid we\'ll be too late.
你以为他说的都是真事，恐怕未必尽然吧！
Nǐ yǐwéi tā shuō de dōushì zhēnshì，kǒngpà wèibì jìnrán ba！
You thought what he said was the truth, but that might not be the case.
三天太局促，恐怕办不成。
Sān tiān tài júcù, kǒnɡpà bàn bu chénɡ。
I\'m afraid three days is not long enough for us to get it done.
他恐怕迟到，一早就起来了。
Tā kǒngpà chídào，yìzǎo jiù qǐlái le。
He got up earlier for fear of being late.
他走了恐怕有十来天了。
Tā zǒu le kǒngpà yǒu shí lái tiān le。
It\'s been almost ten days since he left.
恐怕要下雨。
Kǒngpà yào xià yǔ。
It looks like rain.
这事我恐怕干不了，你还是另请高明吧。
Zhè shì wǒ kǒngpà gàn bu liǎo，nǐ háishi lìngqǐnggāomíngba。
I\'m afraid I\'m not equal to the job. You\'d better try and find someone better qualified.
指挥病倒，这场演出恐怕没想儿了。
Zhǐhuī bìngdǎo，zhè chǎngyǎnchū kǒngpà méixiǎngr le。
I\'m afraid the performance\'s off because the conductor\'s ill.
我国古代的伟大建筑，恐怕莫过于万里长城了。
Wǒguó gǔdài de wěidà jiànzhù，kǒngpà mò guò yú Wàn Lǐ Chángchéng le。
Of all the ancient Chinese buildings, the Great Wall is perhaps the greatest.
这个僻字岂但我们不认识，恐怕连老教授们也未必知道。
Zhège pìzì qǐ dàn wǒmen bú rènshi，kǒngpà lián lǎo jiàoshòumen yě wèibì zhīdào。
Not only we don\'t know this obsolete character, even the old professors may not know it.
我们的人恐怕他们捣乱，为了息事宁人，便放他们进去了。
Wǒmen de rén kǒngpà tāmen dǎoluàn，wèi le xīshìníngrén，biàn fàngtāmen jìnqù le。
We were afraid they\'d disturb the audience with the racket they were making, so we let them in, just to keep them quiet.
这事恐怕还得辛苦您一趟。
Zhè shì kǒngpà hái děi xīnkǔ nín yí tàng。
I\'m afraid you\'ll have to take the trouble of going there to see about it.
她恐怕咽不下这口气。
Tā kǒngpà yàn bu xià zhè kǒu qì。
I don\'t think she can stomach (or swallow, take) an insult like that.
过于直露的话恐怕谁也受不住。
Guòyú zhílù de huà kǒngpà shuí yě shòu bu zhù。
Overly direct language is hard for anyone to accept.
这事恐怕要费一番周折。
Zhè shì kǒngpà yào fèi yì fān zhōuzhé。
I\'m afraid this business will cause us a good deal of bother.
天空中布满了乌云，恐怕要下雨了。
Tiānkōng zhōng bùmǎn le wūyún，kǒngpà yào xiàyǔ le。
With all the dark clouds in the sky, it looks like it will rain.
这个病症恐怕是由肠道感染引起的。
Zhège bìngzhèng kǒngpà shì yóu chángdào gǎnrǎn yǐnqǐ de。
This illness might be caused by a bowel infection.
沉雷大作，恐怕马上就要下雨了。
Chénléi dàzuò，kǒngpà mǎshàng jiùyào xiàyǔ le。
It\'s going to rain, because the thunder is rumbling outside.
轮船已经沉落到海底，恐怕很难打捞了。
Lúnchuán yǐjing chénluò dào hǎidǐ，kǒngpà hěnnán dǎlāo le。
The vessel has sunk to the bottom of the ocean, it will be difficult to salvage.
再这样拼命工作下去，恐怕大家都会撑不住的。
Zài zhèyàng pīnmìng gōngzuò xiàqù，kǒngpà dàjiā dōu huìchēngbúzhù de。
I\'m afraid no one can keep up if we continue to work so hard.
他的病情非常严重，恐怕要断肢了。
Tā de bìngqíng fēicháng yánzhòng，kǒngpà yào duànzhī le。
His situation is grave, I\'m afraid he needs amputation.
他已经病入膏肓，恐怕不久于人世。
Tā yǐjing bìngrùgāohuāng，kǒngpà bùjiǔ yú rénshì。
He is beyond cure and at the end of his life\'s journey.
今天的话网出了点问题，恐怕电话是打不了了。
Jīntiān de huàwǎng chū le diǎn wèntí，kǒngpà diànhuà shì dǎbùliǎo le。
There are some problems with the communication network today. I am afraid it is impossible to make calls.
纲常陵替，恐怕再难以振兴了。
Gāngcháng língtì，kǒngpà zài nányǐ zhènxīng le。
The three cardinal guides and five constant virtues can hardly be rejuvenated again after decline.
这个游戏不用秘技恐怕很难过关了。
Zhège yóuxì búyòng mìjì kǒngpà hěnnán guòguān le。
This game is nearly impossible to finish without a remarkable strategy.
他今天言行奇诡，恐怕是发生了什么事吧？
Tā jīntiān yánxíng qíguǐ，kǒngpà shì fāshēng le shénme shì ba？
He is speaking and behaving in a strange way, maybe something happened to him.
这个袋子的起墙不太结实，恐怕放不了这么多文件。
Zhège dàizi de qǐqiáng bú tài jiēshi，kǒngpà fàngbùliǎo zhèmeduō wénjiàn。
I\'m afraid the sides of the bag are not firm enough to carry so many papers.
我这次太莽撞了，恐怕要失欢于她了。
Wǒ zhècì tài mǎngzhuàng le，kǒngpà yào shīhuān yú tā le。
I was too rash this time and might lose her favor.
我学艺未精，恐怕有辱师门。
Wǒ xuéyì wèijīng，kǒngpà yǒu rǔ shīmén。
I\'m not skilful yet in this profession and might disgrace my teacher.
你捅了大漏子了，这下恐怕又要无宁了！
Nǐ tǒng le dà lòuzi le，zhèxià kǒngpà yòuyào wúníng le！
You have caused a great trouble.
这个世上恐怕很少有男人会对闲雅的女人发脾气。
Zhège shìshàng kǒngpà hěn shǎo yǒu nánrén huì duì xiányǎ de nǚrén fāpíqi。
There are few men in this world who get mad at graceful women.
这些小楷太小了，恐怕我要戴眼镜才能看见。
Zhèxiē xiǎokǎi tài xiǎo le，kǒngpà wǒ yào dài yǎnjìng cáinéng kànjiàn。
These characters are too small. I am afraid that I have to wear my glasses to see them.
这部小说的写本据说已经失传，恐怕很难找到。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō de xiěběn jùshuō yǐjing shīchuán，kǒngpà hěnnán zhǎodào。
The handwritten copy of this novel is long lost and I fear it will be hard to find.
现在局势动荡，你这心劲恐怕必须改改了。
Xiànzài júshì dòngdàng，nǐ zhè xīnjìn kǒngpà bìxū gǎigǎi le。
Things are turbulent nowadays, you must limit your zeal.
小张年轻心盛，要他服输恐怕不太容易。
Xiǎo Zhāng niánqīng xīnshèng，yào tā fúshū kǒngpà bú tài róngyì。
Xiao Zhang is young and full of vigor, it will not be easy to make him admit defeat.
这个人很倔强，我恐怕别不过他。
Zhègerén hěnjuéjiàng，wǒ kǒngpà bièbúguò tā。
This guy is too stubborn – I\'m afraid I won\'t be able to talk him out of it.
他恐怕考不好。
Tā kǒngpà kǎo bùhǎo.
He\'s afraid that he won\'t do well in the exam.
火车恐怕要晚点了。
Huǒchē kǒngpà yào wǎndiǎnle.
The train will probably be late.
我再也不看恐怖电影了，那白森森的鬼脸真可怕。
Wǒ zài yě búkàn kǒngbùdiànyǐng le，nà báisēnsēn de guǐliǎn zhēn kěpà。
I will never see a horror film again. Those white ghost faces scared the wits out of me.
他受的压力太大，恐怕要撑不住了。
你恐怕还没听懂他的话外音。
有这种想法的，恐怕不单是他一个人吧！
房顶太重，房梁恐怕吃不住

妈妈恐怕孩子走错了路，才再三叮嘱。
下这么大的雨，恐怕他不会来了。
他这样对待咱们，恐怕是有来头的。
孩子学习成绩差，考大学恐怕没戏了。
恐怕还是外语这道关难过。
这小伙子蔫头耷脑的，恐怕有不痛快的事吧？

既然是谈判，恐怕双方都要有退步的准备。

我恐怕不能去了。
I fear I am late.
我恐怕要迟到了。

恐怕妈妈不会允许我们明天去音乐会的。

汤姆恐怕不会回来了。他这次是认真的。

我们总为小事争吵，恐怕这让玛丽至少老了15岁。

I am afraid the chemistry exam will be fierce!
恐怕这场化学考试会很难的！

I\'m not wearing my doctor\'s hat today, I\'m afraid I can\'t help you.

I am afraid we have witnessed only the first phase of the conflict.

恐怕我们看到的仅仅是冲突的开始阶段。
I\'m afraid you\'re wrong.
Wǒ kǒngpà nǐ cuò le。
我恐怕你错了。

Kǒngpà wǒ bùnéng lái le。

The truly frightening thing about terrorism is the awful randomness.
Kǒngbùzhǔyì de zhēnzhèng kěpà zhī chù shì qí kǒngbù de suíyìxìng。
恐怖主义的真正可怕之处是其恐怖的随意性。
I was alarmed after I heard the horrible news.
Tīngdào nà tiáo kěpà de xiāoxi zhīhòu wǒ hěn jīngkǒng。
听到那条可怕的消息之后我很惊恐。
The sauropod dinosaurs were apparently herbivores.
Xījiǎolèi kǒnglóng xiǎnrán shì cǎoshídòngwù。
蜥脚类恐龙显然是草食动物。

kǒnglóng de huàshí yícún 
the fossil remains of a dinosaur

kǒnglóng

The exhibition of dinosaur fossils was a real treat for us.
谁也不知道是不是环境的恶变绝灭了恐龙。

当恐龙活着的时候
An American scientist has found that many images of dinosaurs may be wrong.

The cause of dinosaur extinction is still unascertainable today.
现在恐龙灭绝的原因仍无法确定。
So far, no respiratory turbinate structures have been found in dinosaurs.
到目前为止，还没有在恐龙的骨骼中找到过这种螺旋结构。
Remains of dinosaurs are found all over the world.
Shìjiè gè dì dōu fāxiànle kǒnglóng huàshí。
世界各地都发现了恐龙化石。
Dinosaurs had armour to protect them from attacks.
Kǒnglóng jùyǒu bǎohù zìjǐ miǎnshòu gōngjī de kuījiǎ。
恐龙具有保护自己免受攻击的盔甲。
The dinosaurs were survived by their more primitive smaller relatives.
Xìngcúnxiàlái de kǒnglóng shì qí gèng yuánshǐ de qīnyuán dòngwù。
幸存下来的恐龙是其更原始的亲缘动物。
Although dinosaurs do exist，they are few and far between.
Jǐnguǎn kǒnglóng quèshí cúnzài，dànshì tāmen hěn hǎnjiàn。
尽管恐龙确实存在，但是他们很罕见。
Dinosaurs are now on show at the museum.
Xiànzài kǒnglóng bèi chénliè zài bówùguǎn。
现在恐龙被陈列在博物馆。
Scientists supposed that large dinosaurs lived in swamps.
Kēxuéjiāmen cāicè dàxíng kǒnglóng shēnghuó zài zhǎozé zhōng。
科学家们猜测大型恐龙生活在沼泽中。
The boy was disappointed to find only skeletons instead of living breathing dinosaurs.
Zhège nánhái gǎndào hěn shīwàng，yīnwèi tā zhǐ zhǎodàole gǔjià，ér méiyǒu zhǎodào huókǒnglóng。
这个男孩感到很失望，因为他只找到了骨架，而没有找到活恐龙。
Theories about the extinction of dinosaurs are still highly conjectural.
Guānyú kǒnglóng mièjué de lǐlùn réngrán shì dàiyǒu hěn qiáng de cāicè xìng de。
关于恐龙灭绝的理论仍然是带有很强的猜测性的。
They think a meteor cause the extinction of the dinosaurs.
Tāmen rènwéi liúxīng dǎozhìle kǒnglóng de mièjué。
他们认为流星导致了恐龙的灭绝。
恐怖分子恐吓说要杀死人质。

The terrorists threatened to kill the hostages.

He regarded his opponent with some apprehension.
他表面上装出一副满不在乎的样子，内心却是恐慌的。
Tā biǎomiàn shàngzhuāngchū yífù mǎnbúzàihu de yàngzi，nèixīn què shì kǒnghuāng de。
Although feigning complete indifference, he was actually terrified.
他惊恐得面无人色，像僵了似的。
Tā jīngkǒng de miànwúrénsè，xiàng jiāng le shì de。
His face was ghastly and he seemed paralysed.
深恐出事
shēn kǒng chūshì
be terribly afraid that something may go wrong

Tā shēngkǒng diàoduì, zài hòumiɑn jǐn gēn。

wéikǒngluòhòu

kǒngbù
terror; horror

Although the alarm clock was ringing on the bedside cupboard, I was too sleepy to get up.
每天早晨闹钟把我唤醒。
Měitiān zǎochén nàozhōng bǎ wǒ huànxǐng.
Every morning I am woken up by my alarm clock.
我的闹钟没响。
Wǒde nàozhōng méi xiǎng 。
My alarm clock didn\'t go off.
给闹钟上弦。

He pulled the clock apart and put the whole thing together again.
他把闹钟拆开后，又重新组装上了。
I hate the beat of the clock during the night.
我讨厌夜晚闹钟的滴答声。

你定闹钟了吗？
My father gave me a clock as a birthday present.
父亲送了个闹钟给我当生日礼物。
I wish I could find a clock like this; it\'s so beautiful.
我希望我也能得到这样一个闹钟，真漂亮。
He set his alarm clock for four a.m.
他把闹钟设定在早晨4点。

她转身看了一下闹钟的夜光显示盘。
He usually set the alarm clock for 7 am.
Tā tōngcháng bǎ nàozhōng tiáo dào zǎoshang 7 diǎn。

He chewed up my glasses, and had my alarm clock the other night.

nào le yítòng
kick up a row

xiānào yíqì

nào píqi

nào qíngxù
be disgruntled; be in low spirits

这幅画笔势苍老遒劲，显出画家功力深厚。

This painting exhibits a force and vigour characteristic of a master\'s hand.

jiā bǎ jìn

廋语(隐语)。
The writer indulged in metaphorical language.
Zhè wèi zuòjiā míliàn yú yǐnyùxìng de yǔyán。

yǐnyǐn de léishēng

隐隐可见
yǐnyǐn kě jiàn 
faintly visible
感到隐隐作痛
gǎndào yǐnyǐn zuòtòng
feel a dull pain
山头隐隐在望。
Shāntou yǐnyǐn zàiwànɡ。
The mountain top was dimly visible.
周身的筋骨隐隐作痛
zhōushēn de jīngǔ yǐnyǐn zuòtòng
feel a dull pain all over
隐隐。
隐隐听到悲切的哭声。
心中隐隐作痛。
探幽索隐(索隐：搜寻奥秘)
Since the accident, she has had a dull ache at her arm.
自从那次事故后，她的胳膊就一直隐隐作痛。
Something like a blush tried to assert itself in the farmer\'s weather-beaten cheek.
农夫饱经风霜的脸颊上隐隐泛起了红晕。
He wind-burned cheeks are glowing red.
他饱经风霜的脸颊上隐隐泛起了红晕。
Her son\'s lack of direction in life was aching her.
Tā érzi de shēnghuó quēfá fāngxiàng，zhè ràng tā yǐnyǐnzuòtòng。
她儿子的生活缺乏方向，这让她隐隐作痛。
There is a cloud on the horizon that may overshadow the talks.
Yǐnyǐn tòuchū de yīnyún kěnéng wèi huìtán tóuxià yīnyǐng。
隐隐透出的阴云可能为会谈投下阴影。
But there are problems looming.
dàn yìxiē wèntí zhèng yǐnyǐn fúxiàn。
但一些问题正隐隐浮现。
隐逸者一般都不愿意过问世间琐事。
Yǐnyìzhě yìbān dōu bú yuànyì guòwèn shìjiān suǒshì。
People living in seclusion generally don\'t like to ask about trivial things happening in society.
这话隐含着另一层意思。
A deputy was found guilty of trying to cover up accident.
一代理人因为企图隐瞒意外事故被判有罪。
Shakespeare\'s plays have many layers of meaning.
莎翁的剧本通常有很多层隐含的意思。
Did you catch that allusion?
Nǐ míngbai qízhōng yǐnhán de yìsi le ma？
你明白其中隐含的意思了吗？
He could no longer contain his hostility.
Tā zàiyě méifǎ yǐncáng zìjǐ de díyì。
他再也没法隐藏自己的敌意。
For a weak moment she almost relented.
Zài yìzhìbóruò de yí kè，tā chàdiǎner dòngle cèyǐnzhīxīn。
在意志薄弱的一刻，她差点儿动了恻隐之心。
He left the monastery and subsequently lived as a hermit for six years.
Tā líkāile xiūdàoyuàn，ránhòu yǐnjūle liù nián。
他离开了修道院，然后隐居了六年。
我军在阵地中修筑了坚固的隐蔽所。
Wǒ jūn zài zhèndì zhōng xiūzhù le jiāngù de yǐnbìsuǒ。
Our troop has bulit a solid covered shelter at our position.
隐性基因
yǐnxìnɡ jīyīn 
recessive gene
The doctor found that both parents are carriers of the recessive gene.
Yīshēng fāxiàn zhè duì fùmǔ dōushì zhè zhǒng yǐnxìng jīyīn de xiédàizhě。
医生发现这对父母都是这种隐性基因的携带者。
隐性性状
yǐnxìnɡ xìnɡzhuànɡ 
recessive character
长期营养过剩已成为影响现代人健康的隐性杀手。
Chángqī yíngyǎng guòshèng yǐ chéngwéi yǐngxiǎng xiàndàirén jiànkāng de yǐnxìng shāshǒu。
Long-term excessive nutrition has become an invisible killer for modern society.
隐性失业现象值得全社会共同关注。

The phenomenon of ecessive unemployment deserves the collective attention of society as a whole.
谨防酒精和尼古丁等隐性杀手对人体的危害。

隐性负担。
a subtle poison
隐性毒
a latent homosexual

他有隐藏是同性恋的事实吗？

Yóuyú zhìliàng wèntí，zhèzhǒng yǐnxíng yǎnjìng hùlǐyè dǎo páizi le。
Due to its poor quality, the contact lens solution lost its credibility.
我不想戴框架眼镜了，想买副隐形眼镜戴。
wǒ bù xiǎng dài kuàng jià yǎn jìng le，xiǎng mǎi fù yǐn xíng yǎn jìng dài。
I don\'t want to wear glasses any more; I\'d like to wear contact lenses instead.
隐形飞机是现代科学技术的杰出成果。

Stealth aircraft is the outstanding accomplishment of modern science and technology.

他在浪涛间忽隐忽现，觉得冲浪这个运动太刺激了。

隐瞒事实
yǐnmán shìshí 
withhold the truth; hide (or hold back) the facts

Tā zuì ài xúngēn jiūdǐ，xúnqiú shìwù yǐnbì de、nèizài de yuányóu。

As I heard someone approaching the door I quickly bolted into our room.
Wǒ tīngdào yǒu rén xiàng ménkǒu zǒulái，yúshì xùnsù shǎn jìn wǒmen de fángjiān lǐ。
我听到有人向门口走来，于是迅速闪进我们的房间里。
The flicker seems to be dormant, at least for the moment.
Shǎnshuò sìhū tíng xiàlái le，zhìshǎo mùqián shì zhèyàng。
闪烁似乎停下来了，至少目前是这样。
The sky flashed with fireworks.
Tiānkōng shǎnshuòzhe yānhuā。
天空闪烁着烟花。
The windows glowed jewel bright.
Chúchuāng lǐ zhūbǎo shǎnyào。
橱窗里珠宝闪耀。
The headlines flashed on the screen.
Biāotí zài píngmù shàng shǎnshuò。
标题在屏幕上闪烁。
The candle flickered.
Làzhú de huǒyàn shǎnshuò búdìng。
蜡烛的火焰闪烁不定。
The coals were glowing in the dark.
Méikuài zài hēi\'àn zhōng shǎnyào。
煤块在黑暗中闪耀。
It happened so fast it was just a blur.
Zhè fāshēng de tài kuài le，jiǎnzhí jiùshì yì shǎn éryǐ。
这发生得太快了，简直就是一闪而已。
Her husband seemed to know many of the people who were named, but he replied evasively when asked who they were.
Tā zhàngfu hǎoxiàng rènshi hěnduō bèi rènmìng de rén，dànshì dāng wèn tā tāmen shì shuí shí tā shǎnshuòqící，huídá shuō bú rènshi。
她丈夫好像认识很多被任命的人，但是当问他他们是谁时他闪烁其词，回答说不认识。
我家祖祖辈辈都是种地的。
Wǒjiā zǔzǔbèibèi dōushì zhòngdì de。
Our family have been farmers for generations. or I come from a long line of farmers.
他们祖祖辈辈生活在敕勒川。
Tāmen zǔzǔbèibèi shēnghuó zài chìlèchuān。
They  have lived in Chile chuan for generations.
附近的船民都是世居此地，祖祖辈辈以打鱼为生。
Fùjìn de chuánmín dōushì shìjū cǐdì，zǔzǔbèibèi yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
All the neighboring boatmen have lived here and made a living by fishing for generations.
他们是祖祖辈辈都住居在这片土地上的农民。
Tāmen shì zǔzǔbèibèi dōu zhùjū zài zhèpiàn tǔdì shàng de nóngmín。
They are farmers whose forefathers lived on this land.
祖祖辈辈在这黑土地上劳动生息。
It is an oral history，passed on from generation to generation.
Zhè shì yíduàn zǔzǔbèibèi、kǒukǒuxiāngchuán de lìshǐ。
这是一段祖祖辈辈、口口相传的历史。
由于祖业丰厚，他这辈子可以衣食无忧了。
Yóuyú zǔyè fēnghòu，tā zhèbèizi kěyǐ yīshí wúyōu le。
Thanks to the generous ancestral estate, he has enough food and clothes for his entire life.
祖辈
这种习俗是祖辈流传下来的。
效法前辈，报效祖国。
你对长辈怎么老这样硬顶？
Nǐ duì zhǎngbèi zěnme lǎo zhèyàngyìngdǐng? 
Why are you always contradicting your elders so rudely?
晚辈给长辈拜年是常礼。
Wǎnbèi gěi zhǎngbèi bàinián shì chánglǐ。
It\'s a common practice for young people to pay a New Year\'s visit to their elders.
你言语过当，他毕竟是个长辈。
Nǐ yányǔ guòdàng，tā bìjìng shì gè zhǎngbèi。
Your words were extremely improper, after all he an elder.
爷爷是家族中最年尊的长辈。
Yéye shì jiāzú zhōng zuì niánzūn de zhǎngbèi。
My grandfather is the most advanced in years and senior in generation in my family.
自从父母弃养，这个家就失去了长辈的疼爱。
Zìcóng fùmǔ qìyǎng，zhège jiā jiù shīqù le zhǎngbèi de téngài。
After the death of their parents, the family lost the deep love of the senior generation.
他从小嗜书成癖，得到了父母长辈们的支持。
Tā cóng xiǎo shìshū chéngpǐ，dédào le fùmǔ zhǎngbèimen de zhīchí。
He has been addicted to books since his childhood, and has been supported by his parents and superiors.
您是长辈，应坐首坐！
Nín shì zhǎngbèi，yīng zuò shǒuzuò！
You are the superior, so of course you should take the seat of honor.
在我们家，所有违忤长辈的人都将受到严厉处罚。
Zài wǒmen jiā，suǒyǒu wéiwǔ zhǎngbèi de rén dōu jiāng shòudào yánlì chǔfá。
In our family, anyone who disobeys their superior will be severely punished.
中国古代礼仪要求晚辈坐在长辈下首。
Zhōngguó gǔdài lǐyí yāoqiú wǎnbèi zuòzài zhǎngbèi xiàshǒu。
According to ancient manners, the juniors should sit on the right side of the superiors.
长辈们常常教导我们做人要中正。
Zhǎngbèimen chángcháng jiàodǎo wǒmen zuòrén yào zhōng zhèng。
Seniors teach us to be fair and honest.
他比我长一辈。
Tā bǐ wǒ zhǎng yí bèi。
He belongs to my father\'s generation.
他比我长(小)一辈。
Tā bǐ wǒ zhǎng（xiǎo）yí bèi。
He\'s one generation my senior (junior).
你们这些晚辈，怎么能拂逆长者？
Nǐmen zhèxiē wǎnbèi，zěnme néng fúnì zhǎngzhě？
How can you rebel against your seniors?
我们都长大了，总不能仰给父母一辈吧 。
Wǒmen dōu zhǎngdà le，zǒng bùnéng yǎnggěi fùmǔ yíbèi ba。
We are grown-up now, we can\'t rely on our parents for support.
跟孩子怄气，亏你还是长辈！
长辈。
在长辈面前，他总是很卑顺的。
在长辈面前逞性子可不对。
怎么能对长辈如此非礼。
他在长辈面前服帖得很
在长辈面前他谦恭有加。
尊重长辈。
If you have a paper trimmer, ask an adult to cut the paper into the sizes listed below.
如果有裁纸刀，叫身边的长辈用刀把纸裁成如下要求的大小。
贝叶树是西双版纳珍稀植物，一辈子只开花一次。
Bèiyèshù shì Xīshuāngbǎnnà zhēnxī zhíwù，yíbèizi zhǐ kāihuā yícì。
The peepul tree is a rare and precious plant in Xishuangbanna. Such kind of trees blossom only once in their lifetime.
他们希望一辈子生活在一起，永远不分离。
Tāmen xīwàng yībèizi shēnghuó zài yìqǐ，yǒngyuǎn bù fēnlí。
They want to be together all their lives, and never part.
他读了一辈子的书，到头来不过是一个彻底的老夫子。
Tā dú le yíbèizi de shū，dàotóulái búguò shì yígè chèdǐ de lǎofūzǐ。
He has been reading books all his life, and has become a pedant.
上一辈子的宿债不应该影响下一代的交情。
Shàng yíbèizi de sùzhài bùyīnggāi yǐngxiǎng xià yídài de jiāoqíng。
The debts of the last generation should not influence relationships in the next generation.
他当了一辈子的车老板，那水平可不是一般的。
Tā dāng le yíbèizi de chēlǎobǎn，nà shuǐpíng kě búshì yìbān de。
He is an expert for he has been a carter all his life.
你快结婚吧，哪能打一辈子光棍。
Nǐ kuài jiéhūn ba，nǎ néng dǎ yíbèizi guānggùn。
You\'d better get married soon. How could you be a bachelor all your life?
他决心打一辈子光棍。
Tā juéxīn dǎ yíbèizi guānggùn。
He\'s a confirmed bachelor.
我一辈子也忘不了义母对我的恩情。
Wǒ yíbèizi yě wàngbuliǎo yìmǔ duì wǒ de ēnqíng。
I shall never forget my foster mother\'s loving-kindness to me as long as I live.
我不想当家庭妇女，一辈子围着锅台转。
Wǒ bùxiǎngdāngjiātíngfùnǚ，yí bèizi wéi zhe guōtái zhuàn。
I don\'t want to be a housewife slaving away at a hot stove all my life.
他一辈子老实、无能，对环境的压迫逆来顺受。
Tā yíbèizi lǎoshi、wúnéng，duì huánjìng de yāpò nìláishùnshòu。
All his life he had been simple, ineffective, docilely accepting the worst his environment had given him.
不甘心无声无息地过一辈子
bùgānxīn wúshēngwúxī de guò yíbèizi 
hate to live out one\'s life unknown
一辈子也忘不了。
Yíbèizi yě wàngbùliǎo。
I won\'t forget as long as I live.
他一辈子老老实实，安守本分。
Tā yíbèizi lǎolǎoshishí，ānshǒu běnfèn。
Throughout his life he has been straight and innocent, content with being where he is.
很多人一辈子都不会理解生命的奥义。
Hěnduōrén yíbèizi dōu búhuì lǐjiě shēngmìng de àoyì。
A lot of people live their lives ignorant of the secret of life.
他这一辈子，就靠打柴为生。
Tā zhè yíbèizi，jiù kào dǎ chái wéishēng。
He has lived his whole life by gathering firewood.
这位秀才考了一辈子也没登第。
Zhèwèi xiùcái kǎo le yíbèizi yě méi dēngdì。
This xiucai (a scholar who has passed the imperial examination at the country level in Ming and Qing dynasties) never passed the highest imperial examination.
我父亲是佃客，给地主种了一辈子地。
Wǒ fùqīn shì diànkè，gěi dìzhǔ zhòng le yíbèizi dì。
My father is a tenant-famer, who has cultivated land for the landlord all his life.
他已经做好了与乙肝奋争一辈子的准备。
Tā yǐjing zuòhǎo le yǔ yǐgān fènzhēng yíbèizi de zhǔnbèi。
He is ready to fight his whole life against Hepatitis B.
现在的工作大多是合同制，不像原来，一干就是一辈子。
Xiànzài de gōngzuò dàduō shì hétongzhì，bú xiàng yuánlái，yígàn jiùshì yíbèizi。
In the past many people enjoyed life long tenure at their jobs, but today people have fixed period employment contracts.
古时候，受了墨刑的人一辈子也洗不掉脸上那犯罪的“痕迹”。
Gǔshíhou，shòu le mòxíng de rén yíbèizi yě xǐbúdiào liǎnshàng nà fànzuì de“hénjì”。
In ancient times, people were punished by having their faces tattooed.
爷爷是个干了一辈子农活儿的老农人，他爱他的土地。
Yéye shì gè gàn le yíbèizi nónghuór de lǎonóngrén，tā ài tā de tǔdì。
Grandpa is a farmer who has devoted all his life to farm work; he loves his land.
他并不甘心一辈子给富贵人家当清客。
Tā bìngbùgānxīn yíbèizi gěi fùguì rénjiā dāng qīngkè。
He is not willing to be a hanger-on of rich and powerful families.
他做了一辈子教书育人的工作，深受无数学生爱戴，真可谓“桃李不言，下自成蹊”。
Tā zuò le yíbèizi jiāoshū yùrén de gōngzuò，shēnshòu wúshù xuésheng àidài，zhēn kěwèi“táolǐ bùyán，xiàzì chéngxī”。
As the idiom goes, a man of true worth attracts admiration. He has been a teacher all his life, and has won love and respect from the countless students he has taught.
老师的成就是我一辈子都无法望其项背的。
Lǎoshī de chéngjiùshì wǒ yíbèizi dōu wúfǎ wàngqí xiàngbèi de。
I won\'t be able to even begin to approach my teacher\'s achievements in all my life.
老师的训喻我们记了一辈子。
Lǎoshī de xùnyù wǒmen jì le yíbèizi。
We have held the teacher\'s instruction in mind all our lives.
他在科技战线工作了一辈子。
Tā zài kējì zhànxiàn gōngzuòle yībèizi.
He\'s spent a lifetime working at the forefront of science and technology.
他一辈子都很窝囊，不敢担一点儿责任。

这件上等铠甲是由一位军械大师制作，能够它主人用一辈子了。
All my life I\'ve dreamed of going to Italy.

我一辈子都梦想去意大利。
I have never seen so much people in one room, not in all my born days.

我从没见过一个房间里有这么多人，一辈子都没见过。
He loafs through life without any concerns.
Tā húnhún\'è\'è guòle yíbèizi，shénme yě bù guānxīn。
他浑浑噩噩过了一辈子，什么也不关心。
John spends his life trying to keep George on an even keel.
Yuēhàn zhè yíbèizi dōu zài nǔlì ràng Qiáozhì guòshàng wěndìng de shēnghuó。
约翰这一辈子都在努力让乔治过上稳定的生活。
Her bad deed followed her and haunted her dreams all her life.
Tā de èxíng yíbèizi dōu duì tā rúyǐngsuíxíng，zài shuìmèng lǐ yě bú fàngguò tā。
她的恶行一辈子都对她如影随形，在睡梦里也不放过她。
I\'ve lived in this burg all my life.
Wǒ zài zhège zhènshàng shēnghuóle yíbèizi。
我在这个镇上生活了一辈子。
I misread Hamlet all my life!
Wǒ yíbèizi dōu qūjiěle Hāmǔléitè。
我一辈子都曲解了哈姆雷特。
The box with the ancestors\' ashes was emplaced on the top shelf of the house altar.
Xiānbèimen de gǔhuīhé bèi ānfàng zài shìnèi shèngtán de zuì gāo yì céng jiàzi shàng。
先辈们的骨灰盒被安放在室内圣坛的最高一层架子上。
You don\'t catch me tasting rum so much; but just a thimbleful for luck, of course, the first chance I have.
我这辈子不会再沾朗姆酒的边了，不过只要有机会，来顶针那么小的一杯讨个吉利还是可以的。
继承革命先辈的事业
jìchénggémìngxiānbèi de shìyè。
carry on the cause of the older generation of revolutionaries
我们打算去革命红区旅游，感受革命先辈的艰苦精神。
Wǒmen dǎsuàn qù gémìng hóngqū lǚyóu，gǎnshòu gémìng xiānbèi de jiānkǔ jīngshén。
We decided to have a tour in the revolutionary base areas to feel the tough spirit of the revolutionary predecessors.
我们现在的幸福生活都是革命先辈的铁血换来的。
Wǒmen xiànzài de xìngfú shēnghuó dōushì gémìng xiānbèi de tiěxuè huànlái de。
Without the indomitable will of the revolutionaries, our happy life would be impossible.

下辈子就是当牛做马也要报答您。
Xiàbèizi jiùshì dāngniú zuòmǎ yěyào bàodá nín。
I will repay your kindness in our next life.
这是他家几辈子攒下来的老底。
He believes that his life will be better in his next incarnation.
Tā rènwéi tā xiàbèizi huì shēnghuó de gènghǎo。
他认为他下辈子会生活得更好。
晚辈
wǎnbèi
the younger generation; one\'s juniors
作为晚辈，他出言如此不恭真是不应该。
Zuòwéi wǎnbèi，tā chūyán rúcǐ bùgōng zhēnshì bùyīnggāi。
As a junior, he shouldn\'t speak so disrespectfully.
您对晚辈的垂念，真是让我受宠若惊。
Nín duì wǎnbèi de chuíniàn，zhēnshì ràng wǒ shòuchǒng ruòjīng。
I am quite overwhelmed by your appreciation.
作为晚辈，你理该去看望生病的叔叔。
Zuòwéi wǎnbèi，nǐ lǐgāi qù kànwàng shēngbìng de shūshu。
As a junior, you should go to visit your ailing uncle.
晚辈。
做晚辈的，应当体谅老人。
他俩同辈。
Tāliǎ tóngbèi。
They belong to the same generation.
咱们都是同辈，经历大体相同。
我们俩不同辈。
和他同辈的人已经不多了。
这几位同辈中他年纪最大。
现今的青年人在思想观念上跟老一辈有很大的不同。
我家上辈子几代人都在农村行医。
别看他年纪轻轻，辈行却在你我之上。
Bié kàn tā niánjì qīngqīng，bèiháng què zài nǐwǒ zhīshàng。
Though younger than us, he is our senior within the family hierarchy.
他们家上辈出过封疆大吏。
我的上辈中有三个人教书。
He was the representative of this older generation in perfection.
Tā shì shàng yí bèi de wánměi dàibiǎo。
他是上一辈的完美代表。
今天，在这么多前辈面前表演京剧，我真是现丑了。
Jīntiān，zài zhèmeduō qiánbèi miànqián biǎoyǎn jīngjù，wǒ zhēnshì xiànchǒu le。
I am deeply honored to perform in front of so many masters of Beijing opera.
你真不害臊，在前辈面前还自称雅人。
Nǐ zhēn bú hàisào，zài qiánbèi miànqián hái zìchēng yǎrén。
How can you have had the effrontery to call yourself a scholar in front of the masters ?
革命老前辈
gémìnglǎoqiánbèi
a veteran of the revolution
他们都是我的前辈。
Tāmen dōushì wǒ de qiánbèi。
They are all my seniors.
革命前辈
gémìngqiánbèi
revolutionaries of the older generation
在书法方面，你是我们的前辈。
Zài shūfǎ fāngmiàn，nǐ shì wǒmen de qiánbèi。
You are our venerable senior in calligraphy.
我们一定要牢记这些前辈，吃水不忘挖井人。
Wǒmen yídìng yào láojì zhèxiē qiánbèi，chī shuǐ búwàng wājǐng rén。
We must remember the older generation, just as when drink  water we shouldn\'t forget those who dug the well.
前辈的教诲，我终身服膺。
Qiánbèi de jiàohuì，wǒ zhōng shēn fúyīng。
I will keep your instructions in my heart forever.
小王谦虚地说自己的文章漏洞很多，诚请前辈见示。
Xiǎo Wáng qiānxū de shuō zìjǐ de wénzhāng lòudòng hěnduō，chéngqǐng qiánbèi jiànshì。

The bridge is made of three arches.
这座桥的桥桩破损厉害，专家担心它已不能负重。
Zhèzuò qiáo de qiáozhuāng pòsǔn lìhai，zhuānjiā dānxīn tā yǐ bùnéng fùzhòng。
The pier of the bridge has been so badly damaged that experts worry it is unable to bear weight.
大桥通车后，车队缓缓通过了主桥，进入长江的对岸。
Dàqiáo tōngchē hòu，chēduì huǎnhuǎn tōngguò le zhǔqiáo，jìnrù Cháng Jiāng de duì\'àn。
After the bridge opened to traffic, the motorcade drove slowly past the main bridge and arrived on the other side of the Yangzi River.

xiūqiáo bǔlù

chāiqiáo 
dismantle a bridge

Zhèkuài qiáobǎn zhí chànyou。

The overall length of the Changjiang River Bridge at Nanjing is 6,772 metres.
那座木桥承得住这样重的卡车吗？
Nà zuò mùqiáo chéng de zhù zhèyàng zhòng de kǎchē ma?

NánjīngChángJiāngdàqiáo jiànchénghòu yǒu bùshǎo wàibīn qiánlái guānguāng。

NánjīngChángJiāngdàqiáo de yèjǐngxióngwěi guīlì。

横跨河流的一座桥

你走到桥边然后照直向右转。

加固这座桥需要一百多万美元。
The bridge is a frail wooden structure.
这座桥的木质结构很不结实。
I\'m not crossing that bridge. It looks pretty wonky.
我不会从那个桥过的。它看起来很不稳。

我们可以通过画桥的草图，来找出其缺陷。

这根圆柱是桥梁的主要支柱之一。
Three arches sustain the bridge.
三个拱形礅支撑着那座桥。
The bridge is also very well done.
桥梁也设计的很好。

钢缆可用于空中吊桥。

一列火车正在过桥，轰隆隆的响声震撼着玻璃。
The bridge was capable of allowing the passage of six vehicles travelling abreast.

这座大桥能够让六辆车同时并排通过。
Regular users of the bridge can purchase books of discounted tickets.

我们手挽手开始穿过大桥。

A straight channel was cut under the new bridge for the river to run in.

We turned upstream to find a crude wooden bridge.

the decline and fall of the Roman Empire

Nǐ nòngcuò le。
You\'ve got it wrong.
there is no mistaking...
…不可能被弄错
if I\'m not {or} unless I\'m mistaken
如果我没弄错的话
If I mistake not, Mike is not much better than myself with the bow.
Rúguǒ wǒ méi nòngcuò de huà，Màikè duì gōng bìng bù bǐ wǒ zàiháng duōshǎo。
如果我没弄错的话，麦克对弓并不比我在行多少。
He is mistaken about the film time.
Tā nòngcuò diànyǐng shíjiān le。
他弄错电影时间了。
I think you are mistaken in your interpretation.
Wǒ xiǎng，nǐ zài fānyì shí nòngcuò le。
我想，你在翻译时弄错了。
The more pressure that\'s put on us, the more likely we are to slip up.
Yuèshì yālì dà，wǒmen yuè yǒu kěnéng nòngcuò。
越是压力大，我们越有可能弄错。

màinòng fēngqíng

màinòngxuétóu

卖弄
màinong
show off; parade

卖弄文墨。

我讨厌那些一有机会就卖弄他们学问的人。
Allen smiled in the self-satisfied way that meant he was about to parade his knowledge.

艾伦自满地笑了，这意味着他又要开始卖弄他的学问了。
He is known for his flash and superficial behavior.

Is Kelly a flirt, who goes from boy to boy?
Kǎilì shì gè màinòng fēngsāo、 zhāosānmùsì de rén ma？
凯莉是个卖弄风骚、朝三暮四的人吗？
嘲弄历史的人必将被历史所嘲弄。
Cháonòng lìshǐ de rén bìjiāng bèi lìshǐ suǒ cháonòng。
Those who mock history will be mocked by history.
嘲弄历史定会被历史所嘲弄。
Cháonòng lìshǐ dìnghuì bèi lìshǐ suǒ cháonòng。
你别来回摆弄那几盆花了。
Nǐ bié láihuí bǎinòng nà jǐ pén huā le。

在你面前班门弄斧，太不好意思了。

bānnòng xuéwèn 
parade one\'s erudition

Tā zǒng hào bānnòng zìjǐ de nà diǎnr zhīshi。

bōnòng qínxián

bōnòng shìfēi

这样做不但于事无补，反会把事情弄糟。

你要加倍小心，这事弄不好会把你的饭碗砸了。

He was covered with dirt because he just swept the room.

他总是爱连书，弄得大家都看不懂。

He always likes writing in linked script, and makes us unable to read.

他喜欢在海上弄潮冲浪，他觉得那种感觉很过瘾。

He likes to ride the tides and surf on the sea. The feeling is wonderful for him.

小刘生了个儿子，终于得享弄璋之乐。

我不小心弄断了这把折扇的扇骨。

他一不小心把爷爷的二胡的外弦弄断了。

这只老鼠被猫戏弄了半天，终于一命於戏了。

The cat played with the rat for a long time, before the rat finally died.
由于弄丢了三十万现金支票，他一时急得无所措手足。

Having lost 300,000 worth of cash cheques, he is at a loss as to how to conduct himself.
弟弟在弹吉他时不小心弄断了弦子。

My brother accidentally broke the string when playing his guitar.
现在很多人都不讲实际，尽是虚套子糊弄人。

Nowadays, many people are not down to earth, but full of conventions.
她为减肥日渐削瘦，把身体都弄垮了，昨天去看医生了。
Tā wèi jiǎnféi rìjiàn xiāoshòu，bǎ shēntǐ dōu nòng kuǎ le，zuótiān qù kàn yīshēng le。
She has lost so much weight that there is something wrong with her health. Therefore, she went to see the doctor yesterday.
他衣服上有血渍，估计是杀猪的时候弄的。
Tā yīfu shàng yǒu xuèzì，gūjì shì shāzhū de shíhou nòng de。
There are some bloodstains on his clothes. They must be from the pig butchering.
我不会说洋文，你别胡弄我。
Wǒ búhuì shuō yángwén，nǐ bié húnòng wǒ。
I don\'t speak a foreign language, don\'t play tricks on me.
你就别妖言惑众了，弄得人心惶惶 。
Nǐ jiù bié yāoyán huòzhòng le，nòng de rénxīn huánghuáng。
Don\'t spread fallacies to deceive people. It is making everyone feel jittery.
汉语音系是个很复杂的系统，一般人很难弄懂。
Hànyǔ yīnxì shì gè hěn fùzá de xìtǒng，yìbān rén hěnnán nòngdǒng。
The Chinese phonemic system is complicated, only a few people can fully understand it.
他每天无所事事，可头发却总是弄得油光水滑的。

rénshēng de huānlè hé bēishāng 
the joys and sorrows of life

他已经归真，我们不必太过悲伤。

他抬头仰望星汉，不禁感到一阵悲伤。

这个桌子对我来说太沉了，我一个人根本搬不动。

把它放在桌子上吧，我希望伸手就能够得到。

逃避责任
táobì zérèn 
shirk responsibility
She shirks her duties.

她逃避责任。

táobì xiànshí 
try to escape reality
逃避斗争
táobì dòuzhēng
evade struggle
逃避困难
táobì kùnnan 
avoid (or dodge) a difficulty

Tā shìtú táobì jǐngfāng de sōubǔ。
He attempted to avoid the hunt organised by the police.
逃避关税
táobìguānshuì
evade customs duties
逃避检查。

他佯言有病，其实是逃避开会。

逃避追踪者
to escape punishment
逃避惩罚

to bury one\'s head in the sand
to flinch from

逃避做某事

回避要害问题
huíbì yàohài wèntí
evade (or sidestep) the crucial question
回避困难
huíbì kùnnan 
dodge difficulties
他回避我的问题，不作答复。
Tā huíbì wǒ de wèntí，bú zuò dáfù。
He avoided answering my questions.

回避。

托词回避。
a peremptory challenge
(无需指明理由请求某一陪审员回避的)绝对回避
to evade a question
回避问题
For you to have to ask so many questions about marriage, begs the question of whether or not you should even get married at all.
你要问这么多关于婚姻的问题，却回避了一个实质性问题，就是你到底应不应该结婚。
to avoid the issue
not to shrink from sth
不回避某事
The teacher chose to evade these particularly sensitive issues.
Zhè wèi lǎoshī xuǎnzé huíbì zhèxiē yóuwéi mǐngǎn de huàtí。
这位老师选择回避这些尤为敏感的话题。
He used a dodge to evade the questions.
Tā tángsè yìfān，huíbìle wèntí。
他搪塞一番，回避了问题。
There was no need to dodge difficult issues any longer.
Méiyǒu bìyào zài huíbì nántí le。
没有必要再回避难题了。

Wǒ yòng hánhu de huídá huíbìle zhège wèntí。
我用含糊的回答回避了这个问题。
She ducked my questions with laughter.
Tā yòng xiàoshēng huíbì wǒ de wèntí。
她用笑声回避我的问题。

我们不会回避这次挑战。

我们决不能回避我们的集体责任。
They tend to evade their responsibilities.
Tāmen zǒngshì huíbì zérèn。
他们总是回避责任。

Tā qiǎomiào de huíbìle wèntí。
他巧妙地回避了问题。
He dodged the issue.
Tā huíbì gāi wèntí。
他回避该问题。
He was asking questions, unavoidable questions, persistently....
Tā bùtíng de wèn wèntí，wèn nàxiē wúfǎ huíbì de wèntí。
他不停地问问题，问那些无法回避的问题。
The weakness in the solution is unavoidable and there is no help for it.
Jiějué fāng\'àn de quēdiǎn shì bùkě-bìmiǎn érqiě wúfǎ-wǎnhuí de。
解决方案的缺点是不可避免而且无法挽回的。

他避免作出直截了当的回答。

为了避免交通拥挤，他走了一条迂回的路。
规避问题的实质
guībì wèntí de shízhì
evade the substance of the issue
规避
依托资源优势，科学选项，规避风险。
适时转产以规避风险

Tā guībì wèntí。

turn away

The towel gourds hanging on the wall have been dried out by the wind.
勾墙缝
gōu qiángfèng
point a brick wall
把墙上的漆刮下去
bǎ qiángshàng de qī guāxiàqù
scrape the paint off the wall
把地图挂在墙上。
Bǎ dìtú guà zài qiáng shàng。
Put (or Hang) the map up on the wall.
墙拐
qiángguǎi
a corner formed by two walls
大坝好似铜墙铁壁，顶住了洪水的冲击。
Dàbà hǎosì tóngqiángtiěbì，dǐngzhù le hóngshuǐ de chōngjī。
Like an iron bastion, the dam withstood the rushing floodwaters.
墙熏得黑糊糊的。
Qiángxūn dé hēihūhū de。
The wall was blackened by smoke.
红墙绿瓦
hóngqiánglǜwǎ
a red ochre wall with green tiles
用灰把墙缝糊上
yònghuī bǎ qiángfènghúshàng
plaster up cracks in the wall
灰墙
huīqiánɡ 
plastered wall
墙上豁了一个口子。
Qiángshànghuō le yígè kǒuzi。
There is a breach in the wall.
城墙豁口
chéngqiáng huōkǒu
an opening in the city wall
这堵墙已几经倒塌，几经修补。
Zhè dǔ qiángyǐ jǐjīngdǎotā，jǐjīngxiūbǔ。
The wall has collapsed and been rebuilt several times.
夹层墙
jiācéngqiáng
a double-layered wall
把梯子架在墙上。
Bǎ tīzi jià zài qiángshàng。
Put up the ladder against the wall.
把墙上那幅画揭下来。
Bǎ qiángshàng nàfúhuà jiēxiàlái。
Take that picture off the wall.
墙上开了个窗口。
Qiángshàngkāi le gè chuāngkǒu。
A window was made in the wall.
把梯子靠在墙上
bǎ tīzi kào zài qiángshàng
lean a ladder against a wall
在墙上抠个洞
zài qiángshàngkōu gè dòng
drill a hole in the wall
这堵墙要垮了。
Zhè dǔ qiángyào kuǎ le。
The wall\'s going to collapse.
这堵墙不太牢靠。
Zhè dǔ qiángbú tài láokào。
This wall is not very strong.
垒一道墙
lěi yí dào qiánɡ
build a wall
篱笆墙
líbɑqiánɡ
wattled wall
墙上一棵草，风吹两边倒。
Qiángshàngyì kē cǎo，fēngchuī liǎngbiāndǎo。
A tuft of grass atop the wall sways right and left in the wind (a saying).
墙上裂缝了。
Qiángshàng lièfèng le。
The wall has cracked.
墙上有一道裂缝。
Qiáng shàng yǒu yídào lièfèng。
There is a crack in the wall.
他在墙上乱写。
Tā zài qiángshàngluàn xiě。
He scribbled on the wall.
抹墙
mòqiáng
plaster a wall; daub plaster on a wall
墙内
qiánɡ nèi
within the walls
泥墙
nì qiáng
cover the crevices in a wall with mud (or plaster)
墙上爬满了常春藤。
Qiángshàngpámǎn le chángchūnténg。
The wall is covered all over with ivy.
请勿爬越此墙。
Qǐnɡ wù pá yuè cǐ qiánɡ。
No climbing over this wall.
墙上攀缠着两种藤蔓。
Qiángshàngpānchán zhe liǎngzhǒng téngmàn。
Two vines intertwined over the wall.
骑墙派
qíqiángpài
fence-sitter
起一堵墙
qǐ yì dǔ qiánɡ
砌墙
qì qiáng
build a wall (with bricks, stones, etc.)
墙上挂的两张画应该取平。
Qiáng shàng guà de liǎng zhāng huà yīnggāi qǔpíng。
The two pictures on the wall must be aligned.
筑人墙
zhù rénqiáng
set a wall
墙上
qiángshàng
on the wall
石头砌的墙
shítou qì de qiáng
a stone wall
墙塌了。
Qiáng tā le。
The wall collapsed.
土墙坍了。
Tǔqiáng tān le。
The earthen wall collapsed.
在墙上掏一个洞
Zài qiángshàngtāo yígè dòng。
make a hole in the wall
贴墙站着
tiēqiángzhàn zhe 
be standing against the wall
别在墙上乱涂。
Bié zài qiángshàng luàntú。
Don\'t scribble (or scrawl) on the wall.
墙上净涂写着名字。
Qiángshàngjìngtúxiě zhe míngzì。
The wall was scribbled over with names.
墙上油漆已经脱落了。
Qiángshàngyóuqī yǐjing tuōluò le。
The paint on the wall has peeled off.
这堵墙有点歪。
Zhè dǔ qiángyǒudiǎn wāi。
This wall is a little out of the perpendicular.
墙隙
qiánɡxì
a crack in the wall
这道墙没有五千块砖下不来。
Zhè dào qiángméiyǒu wǔqiān kuài zhuān xiàbulai。
You can\'t build that wall with less than 5,000 bricks.
萧墙之内
xiāoqiánɡ zhī nèi
behind the screen wall; within one\'s home
烟把厨房的墙壁熏黑了。
Yān bǎ chúfáng de qiángbì xūnhēi le。
The kitchen walls were blackened by cooking fumes.
红墙碧瓦，互相映衬。
Hóngqiángbìwǎ，hùxiāngyìngchèn。
The red walls and green tiles set each other off beautifully.
越墙而逃
yuè qiánɡ ér táo
escape by climbing over the wall
在墙上粘贴标语
zài qiángshàngzhāntiē biāoyǔ 
paste slogans on the wall
墙上挂着一幅山水画。
Qiángshàngguà zhe yìfú shānshuǐhuà。
On the wall hangs a landscape painting.
砖墙
zhuānqiánɡ 
brick wall
撞墙
zhuànɡ qiánɡ 
bump against a wall
墙哗啦一声倒了。
Qiáng hualā yì shēng dǎo le。
The wall fell with a crash.
墙脚
the foot of a wall
用石灰浆刷墙
yòng shíhuījiāng shuā qiáng
whitewash a wall
你这样会把墙捶打坏的。
Nǐ zhèyàng huì bǎ qiáng chuídǎ huài de。
因为年代太久远了，墙上的花纹都有些斑驳。
Yīnwéi niándài tài jiǔyuǎn le，qiáng shàng de huāwén dōu yǒuxiē bānbó。
The decorative pattern on the wall is a little bit mottled with age.
这面土墙是夯土版筑而成。
Zhè miàn tǔqiáng shì hāngtǔ bǎnzhù ér chéng。
The wall was built by stamping earth between board frames.
他家北边的墙上挂着一幅油画。
Tā jiā běibiān de qiáng shàng guà zhe yìfú yóuhuà。
An oil painting is hanging on the northern wall of his house.
这面墙被涂成了橙色，十分显眼。
Zhè miàn qiáng bèi túchéng le chéngsè，shífēn xiǎnyǎn。
The wall has been painted orange, it\'s conspicuous.
他们在这面墙上冲眼是为了在上面挂一幅画。
Tāmen zài zhè miàn qiáng shàng chòngyǎn shì wèi le zài shàngmiàn guà yìfúhuà。
They drilled a hole on the wall to hang a picture.
由于钻孔时用力过猛，他把墙壁穿破了。
Yóuyú zuànkǒng shí yònglì guòměng，tā bǎ qiángbì chuānpò le。
Because he used much strength, he drilled through the wall.
有他这道挡风墙，你还担心什么。
Yǒu tā zhè dào dǎngfēngqiáng，nǐ hái dānxīn shénme。
He will protect you, what do you worry about?
这面墙上有着条纹状的雕饰。
Zhè miàn qiáng shàng yǒu zhe tiáowénzhuàng de diāoshì。
There are striated engravings on this wall.
士兵在堞墙上阻击来犯的敌兵。
Shìbīng zài diéqiáng shàng zǔjī láifàn de díbīng。
Soldiers are defending against the attacking enemies at the parapet wall.
子弹穿过墙壁，留下了一个洞眼儿。
Zǐdàn chuānguò qiángbì，liúxià le yígè dòngyǎnr。
A bullet went through the wall, leaving a hole on it.
靠墙的多宝槅里，陈列着好多精美的古玩。
Kào qiáng de duōbǎogé lǐ，chénliè zhe hǎo duō jīngměi de gǔwán。
On the exhibition shelf are many exquisite antiques.
那个足球撞到墙上之后，又因为反冲力而回弹到了一楼人家的窗玻璃上。
nàge zúqiú zhuàng dào qiáng shàng zhīhòu，yòu yīnwèi fǎn chōnglì ér huítán dào le yī lóu rénjia de chuāng bōli shàng。
Due to the rebounding force, the football hit a window after bouncing against the wall.
他在粉白的墙上挂了两幅油画。
Tā zài fěnbái de qiáng shàng guà le liǎng fú yóuhuà。
He put two oil paintings up on the white wall.
这个古老建筑的风火墙早已无法承担防火的重任了。
Zhè ge gǔlǎo jiànzhù de fēnghuǒqiáng zǎoyǐ wúfǎ chéngdān fánghuǒ de zhòngrèn le。
This ancient fire wall can no longer take the full burden of fire-proofing.
这面墙是用浮岩垒成的。
Zhè miàn qiáng shì yòng fúyán lěichéng de。
The wall was built by piling up pumice stones.
用干打垒建造的土墙结实吗？
Yòng gāndǎlěi jiànzào de tǔqiáng jiēshi ma？
Is a wall of rammed earth durable?
他立志在高墙里好好改造，重新做人。
Tā lìzhì zài gāoqiáng lǐ hǎohǎo gǎizào，chóngxīn zuòrén。
He is determined to mend his ways and start a new life.
城墙上新贴出一张告谕。
Chéngqiáng shàng xīntiēchū yìzhāng gàoyù。
A new bulletin has been put up on the city wall.
我们两家被这堵墙隔开了。
Wǒmen liǎng jiā bèi zhè dǔ qiáng gékāi le。
We two families are separated by this wall.
我们在宫墙下照张相吧。
Wǒmen zài gōngqiáng xià zhào zhāng xiàng ba。
Let\'s take a picture under the palace wall.
他把头磕在了墙上，头上起了一个鼓包。
Tā bǎ tóu kēzài le qiáng shàng，tóushàng qǐ le yígè gǔbāo。
He bumped into a wall and a swelling appeared immediately on his head.
这真是鬼打墙了，怎么就走不出这片林子了呢？
Zhè zhēnshì guǐdǎqiáng le，zěnme jiù zǒu bùchū zhèpiàn línzi le ne？
I got lost at night, and went to the wrong place.  Why can\'t I get out of the bamboo forest?
刷墙的时候，他手里拿个辊子，挥舞着胳膊。
Shuāqiáng de shíhou，tā shǒulǐ ná gè gǔnzi，huīwǔ zhe gēbo。
When whitewashing the wall, he painted with a roller in his hand.
我家的合家欢就挂在里屋的墙上。
Wǒjiā de héjiāhuān jiù guàzài lǐwū de qiáng shàng。
Our family picture is hung on the wall of the inner room.
挂在他家墙上的喉管是他爷爷留下来的民间乐器。
Guàzài tā jiā qiáng shàng de hóuguǎn shì tā yéye liúxiàlái de mínjiān yuèqì。
The reed pipe hanging on the wall of his home is a folk musical instrument left by his grandpa.
我喜欢他挂在墙上的这幅花鸟画。
Wǒ xǐhuan tā guà zài qiáng shàng de zhèfú huāniǎohuà。
I like the flower-bird painting hanging on his wall.
他负责在城墙上修箭垛。
Tā fùzé zài chéngqiáng shàng xiū jiànduò。
He is responsible for the construction of battlements.
一把大刀金煌煌地挂在墙上。
Yì bǎ dàdāo jīnhuánghuáng de guàzài qiáng shàng。
A shiny broadsword is hanging on the wall.
由旧城墙可以看出这里曾是隋朝的京畿。
Yóu jiù chéngqiáng kěyǐ kànchū zhèlǐ céngshì Suícháo de jīngjī。
The old city walls show that this area belonged to the captial city and its environs.
把这张照片扩放成12寸吧，可以挂在卧室的墙上！
Bǎ zhèzhāng zhàopiàn kuòfàngchéng shí\'èrcùn ba，kěyǐ guà zài wòshì de qiángshàng！
Let\'s enlarge the photo to 12 inches, then it can be hung on the bedroom wall.
这个剧场的墙壁经过特殊处理，可以更好地拢音。
Zhège jùchǎng de qiángbì jīngguò tèshū chǔlǐ，kěyǐ gèng hǎo de lǒngyīn。
After going through a special technique, the wall of the theater carries sound well.
宝宝走路时脑勺儿不小心碰到了墙上，疼得直哭。
Bǎobao zǒulù shí nǎosháor bùxiǎoxīn pèngdào le qiángshàng，téng de zhíkū。
The baby carelessly bumped the back of his head onto wall, and the pain made him keep crying.
他想自己装修新房，自己抹腻子、自己刷墙。
Tā xiǎng zìjǐ zhuāngxiū xīnfáng，zìjǐ mǒ nìzi、zìjǐ shuāqiáng。
He wants to decorate the house, apply putty and paint the walls all by himself.
他这个淘气的孩子，6岁时就会爬梯上墙了。
Tā zhège táoqì de háizi，liùsuì shí jiùhuì pátī shàngqiáng le。
He is such a naughty child, he could climb over ladders and walls when he was just six years old.
那些常春藤攀援而上，爬满了整面墙。
Nàxiē chángchūnténg pānyuán érshàng，pámǎn le zhěng miàn qiáng。
These Chinese ivies climbed upwards and covered the entire wall.
我们打算在今年冬天起墙，明年春天完工。
Wǒmen dǎsuàn zài jīnnián dōngtiān qǐqiáng，míngnián chūntiān wángōng。
We plan to start building the walls in winter this year and complete the project next spring.
这个墙基太浅，不能再加盖楼层了。
Zhège qiángjī tài qiǎn，bùnéng zài jiā gài lóucéng le。
The base of the wall is so shallow that no more storeys can be added.
出于健康的考虑，他采用了环保的墙面漆。
Chūyú jiànkāng de kǎolǜ，tā cǎiyòng le huánbǎo de qiángmiànqī。
In view of health, he adopted the environmentally friendly wall lacquer.
你要有自己的主见，不能总当墙头草。
Nǐ yào yǒu zìjǐ de zhǔjiàn，bùnéng zǒng dāng qiángtóucǎo。
You ought to be your own master, you cannot always be like grass on top of a wall.
他家新房的墙面是用青灰上的色。
Tā jiā xīnfáng de qiángmiàn shì yòng qīnghuī shàng de sè。
The wall surfaces of his new house were brushed with greenish lime.
这个挡土墙的倾斜度不符合《施工规范》的要求。
Zhège dǎngtǔqiáng de qīngxiédù bùfúhé《Shīgōngguīfàn》 de yāoqiú。
The gradient of the earth-retaining wall doesn\'t conform to construction regulations.
他经常义务清刷墙上的非法广告。
Tā jīngcháng yìwù qīngshuā qiáng shàng de fēifǎ guǎnggào。
He often voluntarily brushes away and clears illegal advertisements on the wall.
下一道工序是在墙面上涂抹一层沙浆。
Xià yídào gōngxù shì zài qiángmiàn shàng túmǒ yì céng shājiāng。
The next procedure is to daub a layer of mortar on the wall.
房屋年久失修，墙面有点渗水。
Fángwū niánjiǔ shīxiū，qiángmiàn yǒu diǎn shènshuǐ。
Some water comes through the walls because the house hasn\'t been repaired for a long time.
给我拿几个水泥钉来，我要在这水泥墙上钉几个挂钩。
Gěi wǒ ná jǐgè shuǐnídīng lái，wǒ yào zài zhè shuǐníqiáng shàng dìng jǐgè guàgōu。
Bring me some cement nails, and I\'ll fix some hooks in this cement wall.
这一带种植大面积松墙是为了防止沙尘暴的侵袭。
Zhè yídài zhòngzhí dà miànjī sōngqiáng shì wèi le fángzhǐ shāchénbào de qīnxí。
The purpose of planting such a huge pine wall is to prevent sandstorms.
这是一种藤本植物，它会沿着墙壁生长的。
Zhè shì yìzhǒng téngběn zhíwù，tā huì yán zhe qiángbì shēngzhǎng de。
It is a vine, it can grow along a wall.
靠墙的条几上，放着两个大花瓶。
Kàoqiáng de tiáojǐ shàng，fàng zhe liǎnggè dà huāpíng。
On the table beside the wall, there are two big vases.
灵堂里摆满了花圈，墙上也挂满了挽幛。
Língtáng lǐ bǎimǎn le huāquān，qiáng shàng yě guàmǎn le wǎnzhàng。
The mourning hall is full of wreaths, and on all the walls elegiac scrolls are hung.
这幅世界名画复制本是用万能胶粘在墙上的。
Zhè fú shìjiè mínghuà fùzhìběn shì yòng wànnéngjiāo zhānzài qiáng shàng de。
This copy of the world famous painting is glued onto the wall with the all-purpose glue.
危城因为有很高的城墙，一般比较难攻。
Wēichéng yīnwèi yǒu hěngāo de chéngqiáng，yìbān bǐjiào nángōng。
Cities with high walls are often hard to conquer.
你怎么在人家墙上留下这么多乌痕？
Nǐ zěnme zài rénjia qiáng shàng liúxià zhèmeduō wūhén？
How can you leave so many stains on other people\'s wall.
菜场的墙上贴着张无头告示，让人看不明白。
Càichǎng de qiángshàng tiēzhe zhāng wútóu gàoshì，ràng rén kàn bùmíngbai。
There is an ambiguous official notice in the food market which confused a lot of people.
为图方便，戏班将每天的戏单贴在墙上。
Wèi tú fāngbiàn，xìbān jiāng měitiān de xìdān tiēzài qiáng shàng。
The Opera troupe put the play list on the wall for the sake of convenience.
墙上挂着一幅以线描的手法创作的人物肖像。
Qiáng shàng guà zhe yìfú yǐ xiànmiáo de shǒufǎ chuàngzuò de rénwù xiāo xiàng。
There is a portrait painted in fine lines on the wall.
兄弟阋墙是不明智的，也是大家最不想看到的。
Xiōngdi xìqiáng shì bùmíngzhì de，yěshì dàjiā zuì bùxiǎng kàndào de。
It is not wise for brothers to quarrel between themselves, and it is also something no one wants to see.
他仰靠着墙，装酷呢。
Tā yǎngkào zhe qiáng，zhuāng kù ne。
He is leaning on the wall, pretending to be cool.
在墙上凿眼是为了让空气流通。
Zài qiáng shàng záoyǎn shì wèi le ràng kōngqì liútōng。
Digging a hole in the wall is for the purpose of circulating the air.
听说儿子干了这种龌龊事，老周真想撞墙。
Tīngshuō érzi gàn le zhèzhǒng wòchuò shì，Lǎo Zhōu zhēn xiǎng zhuàngqiáng。
After hearing the dirty things done by his son, old Zhou had a sudden impulse to hit the wall.
这里曾经有半壁墙，是我们小时候最爱来的地方。
Zhèlǐ céngjīng yǒu bànbì qiáng，shì wǒmen xiǎoshíhou zuì ài lái de dìfāng。
Once there was half a wall, which was our favorite place in our childhood.
如果考虑采光的话，可以选用玻璃砖来做墙。
Rúguǒ kǎolǜ cǎiguāng de huà，kěyǐ xuǎnyòng bōlízhuān lái zuò qiáng。
If we take the light into consideration, we can use glass blocks to make the wall.
我打算在这个墙面上刷调和漆。
Wǒ dǎsuàn zài zhège qiángmiànshàng shuā tiáohéqī。
I\'ve decided to apply ready-mixed paint to the wall.
两个邻居扒在墙头上聊天。
Liǎnggè línjū bāzài qiángtóushàng liáotiān。
The two neighbours (英) {或} neighbors (美) leaned on the wall chatting.
一道墙
yídào qiáng
yìdǔ qiáng
他狗急跳墙，口不择言。
Tā gǒujítiàoqiáng，kǒubùzéyán。

头一遍
tóu yí biàn 
the first time

他用寸楷抄写了一遍这首诗。

He copied this poem in regular script in one-cun-sized characters.
请大家再跟我学唱一遍这段戏的倒板。

你能把老师刚说的话复诵一遍吗？

The teacher asked the students to recite the text again.
大家已经看过一遍合同了，你再做个简释吧。

Everyone has read the contract, would you like to make a simple explanation of it now?
他把这件事情添油加醋地描述了一遍。
Tā bǎ zhèjiàn shìqing tiānyóu jiācù de miáoshù le yí biàn。
He added highly colored details to the story.
老师在课堂上把这个公式重新推演了一遍。

The teacher deductively inferred this formula again in class.
我草草看了一遍笔记，就进了考场。
Wǒ cǎocǎo kànle yíbiàn bǐjì，jiù jìnle kǎochǎng。

他把作文重写了一遍。
Tā bǎ zuòwén chóngxiěle yíbiàn。

He took a quick look at the audience and then began his speech.

春天一到，漫山遍野都开满了小黄花。

如果一个错误会对多个结论产生重大影响，那么这个错误就是普遍性的。
矛盾的普遍性(特殊性)
máodùn de pǔbiànxìng（tèshūxìng）
the universality (particularity) of contradiction
矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中。
Máodùn de pǔbiànxìngjí yùyú máodùn de tèshūxìngzhī zhōng。
It is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.
这是个例，不具有普遍性。
矛盾的普遍性寓于矛盾的特殊性之中
学生课业负担过重现象具有普遍性。
Luke uses this story as the supreme example of his theme of universalism.

有普遍意义
yǒu pǔbiàn yìyì

普遍

普遍规律。
&quot;I didn\'t hear nothing.&quot;
这种说法现被普遍认为不那么符合现代英语的规范
a generally accepted usage
被普遍接受的用法
widespread benefits
普遍受益
It is common practice in the US to tip the waiter.
在美国给服务生小费是很普遍的现象。
Coeducation is very common in North America.
男女同校的现象在北美非常普遍。
Allergy to cats is extremely common, and can be a major problem even for people who don\'t own cats.
对猫过敏是非常普遍的，即使这对那些不养猫的人来说也是个大问题。
contrary to popular belief
与普遍观点相反的是
a topic of general interest
普遍感兴趣的话题
a general feeling of optimism
普遍的乐观情绪
She won general acceptance in the advertising industry by her hard work and excellent performance.
她凭借努力工作和出色的表现赢得了广告界的普遍认可。

公司的财务报表依从普遍接受的会计惯例。

人们普遍错误地认为战争已经破坏了和平进程。
Dead languages are more common nowadays.
Fèiqì de yǔyán zài dāngjīn gèng pǔbiàn le。
废弃的语言在当今更普遍了。

陪审团做出对原告有利的判决，获得大笔金钱回报。

Yuánshǐ rénlèi yǐjing yǒu le sùpǔ de shěnměiguān。
Primitive people already had an embryonic view of aesthetics

aesthetic judgment

Arts with the same origin often share the same aesthetic aims.

Unlike electric charges attract each other.
不论是磁铁还是电流，都是同性相斥、异性相吸。

Magnets or currents of the same polarity will repel each other, while those of different polarity will attract each other.

越是搞活经济，越要重视宏观调节。
Yuè shì gǎohuó jīngjì，yuè yào zhòngshì hóngguān tiáojié。
The more the economy is enlivened, the more attention we should pay to macroeconomic regulation.
把宏观管理和微观搞活结合起来。
Bǎ hóngguānguǎnlǐ hé wēiguāngǎohuó jiéhé qǐlái。
Combine macro-control and micro-flexibility.
把经济搞活
bǎ jīngjì gǎohuó
reinvigorate the economy
对外开放，对内搞活经济
Duì wài kāifàng，duì nèi gǎohuó jīngjì。
open to the outside and invigorate the economic domestically
每逢节假日，自选商场都会搞促销活动。
Měiféng jiéjiǎrì，zìxuǎn shāngchǎng dōuhuì gǎo cùxiāo huódòng。
Every festival and holiday, the supermarket would have promotion activities.
他们把社区活动搞得风风火火，有声有色。
Tāmen bǎ shèqū huódòng gǎo de fēngfēnghuǒhuǒ，yǒushēngyǒusè。
They successfully organized many activities in their community.
这个政策搞得企业死不死，活不活的。
Zhège zhèngcè gǎo de qǐyè sǐ bu sǐ，huó bu huó de。
This policy is making it difficult for all enterprises.
我们在“双百方针”的指导下，搞了这次影视作品研讨活动。
Wǒmen zài“shuāngbǎifāngzhēn”de zhǐdǎo xià，gǎo le zhècì yǐngshì zuòpǐn yántǎo huódòng。
We held this seminar for screen works under the direction of the principle &quot;let a hundred flowers bloom; let a hundred schools of thoughts strive&quot;.
把搞活经济当作首要任务来抓。
简政放权，搞活企业。
现在是什么朝代了，还搞封建迷信活动！
他假手于人，搞文物走私活动，牟取暴利。
搞好产供销，增强企业活力。
党内生活要民主化，不能搞家长制。
to turn sb\'s life {or} world upside down
把某人的生活搞得天翻地覆
I was trying to get some ideas for our sales promotion.
Wǒmen zài nǔlì wèi wǒmen de cùxiāo huódòng gǎochū yìxiē chuàngyì。
我们在努力为我们的促销活动搞出一些创意。
The crowd of following cars made the occasion seem like a parade.
Hòumiàn jǐngēn de wānyán de chēduì bǎ zhè xiàng huódòng gǎo de xiàngshì yóuxíng。
后面紧跟的蜿蜒的车队把这项活动搞得像是游行。

他在搞什么花样？

gǎohǎo tuánjié
strengthen unity
搞好军民关系
gǎohǎo jūnmín guānxì
build good relations between the army and the people
当领导的就要从谏如流，广开言路，才能把工作搞好。
Dāng lǐngdǎo de jiùyào cóngjiàn rúliú，guǎngkāi yánlù，cáinéng bǎ gōngzuò gǎohǎo。
Being a leader means you should be open to good advice so that you can do your job better.
做一个称职领导的关键是要搞好和群众的关系。
Zuò yígè chènzhí lǐngdǎo de guānjiàn shì yào gǎohǎo hé qúnzhòng de guānxì。
The key to being a competent leader is to foster good relations with the people.
你们要严格按照门前三包的有关规定，搞好自己单位门前的三项工作。
Nǐmen yào yángé ànzhào ménqián sānbāo de yǒuguānguīdìng，gǎohǎo zìjǐ dānwèi ménqián de sān xiàng gōngzuò。
You should firmly follow related prescriptions about &quot;three pieces of duty to the administration of resident\'s front land&quot;, and do a good job of managing the front land of your own company.

Shìcháng wèi le bǎ tóuzī gōngzuò gǎohǎo，tèdì ràng fùshìzhǎng qù guówài chū zhuānchāi kǎochá。
In order to do a good job in investment, the mayor sent the vice-mayor abroad for a specialized inspection.
搞好人际关系非常重要。
Gǎohǎo rénjìguānxì fēicháng zhòngyào.
It\'s very important to have good personal relationships.
这件事情搞不好，咱们都得吃不了兜着走。
Zhèjiàn shìqing gǎo bùhǎo，zánmen dōu děi chībùliǎo dōu zhe zǒu。
If the matter isn\'t handled well, we will have more trouble than we can handle.
这个地方基础建设搞得好，公路基本都是准高速公路。
Zhège dìfāng jīchǔ jiànshè gǎo de hǎo，gōnglù jīběn dōushì zhǔn gāosù gōnglù。
This place has done a good job in its infrastructure, with most of the roads approaching the expressway level.
我认为他能够把企业搞的这么好，一个很重要的原因是他的财商很好。
Wǒ rènwéi tā nénggòu bǎ qǐyè gǎo de zhème hǎo，yígè hěnzhòngyào de yuányīn shì tā de cáishāng hěnhǎo。
I think one of the major reasons that he manages his company so well is that he has a good financial advisor.
他们厂的厂区绿化搞得特别好。
Tāmen chǎng de chǎngqū lǜhuà gǎo de tèbié hǎo。
The green work in their factory district is well done.
你最好今天把它搞完。
Nǐ zuìhǎo jīntiān bǎ tā gǎowán。
You\'d better finish it today.
好好的一次郊游搞成这样子，都是你！

跟他搞好关系，他很有门路。

最重要的就是照顾好你自己，不要搞得太辛苦。
提防有人暗中搞鬼。
Dīfáng yǒurén àn zhōng gǎoguǐ。
Beware of foul play!
你究竟在搞什么鬼？这么神秘。
Nǐ jiūjìng zài gǎo shénme guǐ? zhème shénmì。
What on earth are you up to? You\'re being so mysterious.
他究竟要搞什么鬼名堂，目前大家还看不出来。

Until now, people still don’t know what he\'s up to.
这个恶作剧不知道是哪个淘气鬼搞的。

谁知他在搞什么鬼名堂？

这些货物与提货单并不相符，一定是搞错了。

这件事搞得他心神不定。
Zhèjiàn shì gǎo de tā xīnshénbúdìng。

This is child\'s play. I can definitely nail it.

We should not just set our eyes on short-term interests, but should instead be far-sighted.
她不愧是搞财务的，家庭分类账记得清楚详细。

She is a real accountant who even keeps a detailed  household ledger.

If you really want to make progress in your studies, you should make a desperate effort in learning basic knowledge.

对于购买火车票是否要搞实名制，目前还有争议。

让我们把事情搞清楚

优秀作品
yōuxiù zuòpǐn 
(literary or artistic) works of excellence
他晚期的作品更优秀。
Tā wǎnqī de zuòpǐn gèng yōuxiù。
His later works are even more outstanding.
向青年推荐优秀的文学作品
xiàng qīngnián tuījiàn yōuxiù de wénxué zuòpǐn 
recommend outstanding literary works to the youth
为了表彰话剧界有突出贡献的艺术家和优秀话剧工作者，邮局了发行中国话剧诞辰100周年纪念邮票。
Wèile biǎozhāng huàjùjiè yǒu tūchū gòngxiàn de yìshùjiā hé yōuxiù huàjù gōngzuòzhě，yóujú le fāxíng Zhōngguó huàjù dànchén yìbǎi zhōunián jìniàn yóupiào。
In order to commend those artists and excellent workers who have made distinguished contributions to modern drama, the post office issued a set of commemorative stamps for the 100th anniversary of the birth of modern Chinese drama.
这些优秀的文艺作品是老百姓的精神食粮。
Zhèxiē yōuxiù de wényì zuòpǐn shì lǎobǎixìng de jīngshén shíliáng。
These excellent literary and art works are the spiritual food of the people.
优秀的现实主义文学作品能很好地反照生活。
Yōuxiù de xiànshízhǔyì wénxué zuòpǐn néng hěnhǎo de fǎnzhào shēnghuó。
Good realistic works can reflect the realities of actual life.
他是一个优秀的木模工人，会制作各种木模。
Tā shì yígè yōuxiù de mùmó gōngrén，huì zhìzuò gèzhǒng mùmó。
He is an excellent wooden mould worker, and can make all kinds of wooden moulds.
义演中大腕歌星争相作秀。
竞选者各出奇招作秀。
什么形象工程，其实是在作秀。‖ (秀：英语show音译)
荣获优秀作品一等奖
优秀剧作
That ceremony is just for show.
Nàgè yíshì zhǐshì zài zuò xiù。
那个仪式只是在作秀。
His \'Hamlet\' lacks the brilliance that one expects.
Tā dǎoyǎn de 《 Hāmǔléitè 》 quēfá dàjiā suǒ qīwàng de yōuxiù zuòpǐn de tèxìng。
他导演的《哈姆雷特》缺乏大家所期望的优秀作品的特性。
the best writer of his day
他的时代的最优秀的作家
The boxer was a magnificent fighting machine.
Zhè wèi quánjīshǒu shì yí gè yōuxiù de zuòzhàn jīqì。
这位拳击手是一个优秀的作战机器。
His prospects as a writer are excellent.
Tā yǒu kěnéng chéngwéi yí wèi yōuxiù de zuòjiā。
他有可能成为一位优秀的作家。
by way of being a fine pianist
作为一个优秀的钢琴演奏家
My own preference is for good literature.
Wǒ zìjǐ xǐhuan yōuxiù de wénxué zuòpǐn。
我自己喜欢优秀的文学作品。
As a select representative of the whole university, he performed outstandingly in the national contest.
作为整个大学的优秀代表，他在全国竞赛中表现非常突出。
This model exudes confidence as she moves down the runway.
这个模特从走秀台走过来时，显得非常自信。
A model should be confident and expressive on the runway.
模特在走秀台上应该自信，具有表现力。
他们的家的媳妇真是秀慧，人见人夸。
Tāmen de jiā de xífù zhēnshì xiù huì，rénjiàn rénkuā。
Their daughter-in-law is really beautiful and intelligent. She wins praise from everyone she meets.
这里风景秀美，真让人留连忘返。
Zhèlǐ fēngjǐng xiùměi，zhēn ràng rén liúliánwàngfǎn。
The picturesque view here is a great attraction to me.
The reality show has been spotted at ten p.m.
真人秀定于晚上十点播出。
They are talking about their favorite reality shows.
他们在谈论自己最喜欢的真人秀节目。
Reality television shows seem to be a ten a penny nowadays.
Diànshì zhēnrénxiù xiànzài sìhū duō de bù zhíqián le。
电视真人秀现在似乎多得不值钱了。
出口秀节目越来越受欢迎。
Chūkǒuxiù jiémù yuèláiyuè shòuhuānyíng。
Talk-show programs are becoming more and more popular.
这姑娘越长越俊秀了。
发现和荐举年轻的优秀管理人才
fāxiàn hé jiànjǔ niánqīng de yōuxiù guǎnlǐ réncái 
discover and recommend excellent young managers
他因学习成绩优秀而受到奖赏。
Tā yīn xuéxí chénɡjì yōuxiù ér shòudào jiǎnɡshǎnɡ。
He was awarded a prize for excellence in his studies.

miáoxiě yíwèi yōuxiù huàjiā de chéngzhǎngguòchéng
describe how he grew up to be an outstanding painter
成绩优秀
chénɡjì yōuxiù 
get excellent results or marks
优秀人才
yōuxiù réncái 
talented persons
优秀选手
yōuxiù xuǎnshǒu 
topnotch player
这挨肩儿的兄弟三人，个个儿都优秀。
Zhè āijiānr de xiōngdì sān rén，gègèr dōu yōuxiù。
Close in age, the three brothers are all great guys.
现在许多京剧流派都缺乏优秀的传人，这对京剧的发展很不利。

Now, many schools of Beijing Opera are lacking good people to carry on the skills, which poses a grave problem for the development of Beijing Opera.
优秀运动员的目标不仅是夺冠，而且还要创纪录。
Yōuxiù yùndòngyuán de mùbiāo bùjǐn shì duóguān，érqiě háiyào chuàng jìlù。
The goal of an excellent athlete is not only to win but also to break old records.
他的单科成绩都是优秀。
Tā de dānkē chéngjì dōushì yōuxiù。
All of his courses are excellent.
在这次戏曲调演中，涌现出了很多优秀剧目。

Many excellent plays appeared in this period\'s selection of local operas.
我们应当把优秀的人物当成自己的榜样，奋起直追。
Wǒmen yīngdāng bǎ yōuxiù de rénwù dàngchéng zìjǐ de bǎngyàng，fènqǐ zhízhuī。
We should learn from the examples of excellent people and try to catch them up.
公司给优秀劳动者派发了干股。
Gōngsī gěi yōuxiù láodòngzhě pàifā le gāngǔ。
The company apportioned shares to excellent workers.
小王是一位非常优秀的机械师，任何机器问题经过他的手都迎刃而解。
Xiǎo Wáng shì yíwèi fēicháng yōuxiù de jīxièshī，rènhé jīqì wèntí jīngguò tā de shǒu dōu yíngrènérjiě。
Xiao Wang is an excellent mechanic, able to solve any mechanical problem.
应聘时他的优秀表现赢得了面试考官的赞许。
Yīngpìn shí tā de yōuxiù biǎoxiàn yíngdé le miànshì kǎoguān de zànxǔ。
When accepting the offer of employment, his excellent performance won the examiner\'s praise.
她成绩这么优秀，可以说考上一所名牌大学是没问题的。
Tā chéngjì zhème yōuxiù，kěyǐ shuō kǎoshàng yìsuǒ míngpái dàxué shì méi wèntí de。
She does exceedingly well in her studies and should have no problem being admitted to a prestigious university.
他是王教授力荐的课题组长，一定非常优秀。
Tā shì Wáng jiàoshòu lìjiàn de kètí zǔzhǎng，yídìng fēicháng yōuxiù。
He was strongly recommended to be the project leader by Professor Wang. He must be very excellent.
他由于力破了校纪录而被我们选为优秀运动员。
Tā yóuyú lìpò le xiào jìlù ér bèi wǒmen xuǎnwéi yōuxiù yùndòngyuán。
Because he tried his best and broke the school record, we choose him to be a lettermen.
由于学习成绩优秀，他被批准躐等升级。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì yōuxiù,tā bèi pīzhǔn lièděng shēngjí.
Because of excellent grades, he was approved to skip  the normal steps to go up to a higher grade.
她觉得交朋友应该宁缺勿滥，要交就交个优秀的朋友。
Tā juédé jiāopéngyou yīnggāi níngquē wùlàn，yào jiāo jiù jiāo gè yōuxiù de péngyou。
She holds the view that it\'s better not to make friends than to make an unsuitable friend.
他从小爱好美食与烹饪，立志要当个优秀的庖厨。
Tā cóng xiǎo àihào měishí yǔ pēngrèn，lìzhì yào dāng gè yōuxiù de páochú。
He loved delicious food and cooking when he was a child. He made up his mind to be an excellent chef.
专家认为这篇优秀的文章仍有可评改之处。
Zhuānjiā rènwéi zhèpiān yōuxiù de wénzhāng réng yǒu kěpínggǎi zhī chù。
Experts point out that the excellent article still needs some corrections.
他是一名优秀企业家，经营着很多家企业。
Tā shì yìmíng yōuxiù qǐyèjiā，jīngyíng zhe hěnduō jiā qǐyè。
He is an excellent entrepreneur, who runs many enterprises.

她可是很优秀的女中音哦！
Tā kěshì hěn yōuxiù de nǚ zhōng yīn o！
She is an excellent mezzo-soprano.
他拥有忠良的优秀品格。
Tā yōngyǒu zhōng liáng de yōuxiù pǐngé。
He has a loyal and honest character.
他那么优秀，在他面前我自愧弗如。

a bland, ingratiating manner
和蔼而又迎合的态度

这些舞者竞相引起观众和裁判的注意力。
The actor had fallen over the dancers on stage.

The dancers toes pointed outward.

那个舞者跟随音乐的节拍旋转身体。

She asked her older brother to escort her to the ball.

Can you dance the salsa?
你会跳萨尔萨舞吗？
I would grind every girl on the dance floor if given a chance.

遗传特征
yíchuán tèzhēng
hereditary feature; heredity
花木兰代父从征的故事流传至今。
Huā Mùlán dàifù cóngzhēng de gùshì liúchuán zhìjīn。
The story of Huamulan going to a military expedition for her father has been handed down to the present time.

遗传特征将人与人区别开来。
A carrier remains infective without himself showing signs of the disease.

Acquired characteristics (such as a suntan or a broken nose) cannot be passed on.
Hòutiān huòdé de tèzhēng（lìrú bèi shàihēi huòzhě bízi bèi dǎpò）búhuì chuángěi hòudài。
后天获得的特征（例如被晒黑或者鼻子被打破）不会传给后代。
Inheritance is effected by genes, which determine the  characters of the organism.
Yíchuán shòudào jīyīn de yǐngxiǎng，jīyīn juédìngle shēngwùtǐ de tèzhēng。
遗传受到基因的影响，基因决定了生物体的特征。
《凉州词》：“ 醉卧沙场君莫笑，古来征战几人回。”
《Liángzhōucí》：“Zuìwò shāchǎng jūnmòxiào，gǔlái zhēngzhàn jǐrénhuí。”
Liangzhou Ci :&quot;One should not laugh at drunk people that fall on the battlefield, as since time immemorial, few of those going to the battlefield can stay alive and return home.&quot;
征战
Zhēngzhàn
go on a military campaign
这是一支解放战争中经过南征北战的英雄连队。
Zhè shì yìzhī jiěfàngzhànzhēng zhōng jīngguò nánzhēngběizhàn de yīngxióngliánduì。
This is a heroic company which fought on many fronts in the Liberation War.
出征的战士
chūzhēng de zhàn shì
soldiers sent on an expedition

Gūlǎoye shì yìmíng jūnrén，niánqīng de shíhou nánzhēng běizhàn。
My great uncle used to serve in the army and fight up and down the country.

zhànshí zhēnɡjí

Tā gǎndào hánlěng cìgǔ。
她感到寒冷刺骨。
A thrilling wind blew off the frozen lake.
Cìgǔ de hánfēng chuīguò jiéle bīng de húpō。
刺骨的寒风吹过结了冰的湖泊。
病人的脊椎骨已经变形。
Bìngrén de jǐzhuīgǔ yǐjing biànxíng。
The patient has a deformed spine.
因骨折需仰卧病床。
他打球的时候摔了一跤，腓骨骨折了。
Tā dǎqiú de shíhou shuāi le yì jiāo，féigǔ gǔzhé le。
He stumbled when playing on the field and injured his fibula.
他在这次车祸中筛骨骨折。
Tā zài zhècì chēhuò zhōng shāigǔ gǔzhé。
His ethmoid bone was broken in the accident.
他生就一身傲骨，宁折不弯。
Tā shēngjiù yìshēn àogǔ，nìng zhé bùwān。
A man of unyielding character, he would rather break than bend.
冷风砭骨。
Lěngfēng biān gǔ。
The cold wind cuts one to the marrow.
寒风彻骨
hánfēngchègǔ 
The bitter wind chills one to the bone.
皮球在地上骨碌。
Píqiúzàidì shànggūlu。
The ball is rolling on the ground.
他一骨碌从床上爬起来。
Tā yì gūlu cóngchuángshàngpá qǐlái。
He rolled out of bed.
伞骨
sǎngǔ
如骨鲠在喉，不吐不快
rú gǔgěngzài hóu，bùtǔ bú kuài
feel as if one has a fishbone in one\'s throat and be unable to rest until one has spat it out; have a criticism that one must express
他渐渐饮食不进，骨瘦如柴。
Tā jiànjiàn yǐnshí bú jìn，gǔshòurúchái。
Gradually he lost his appetite and wasted away till he was nothing but skin and bones.
粉碎性骨折
fěnsuìxìnggǔzhé

开放性骨折
kāifàngxìnggǔzhé

Tā shuāi le yì jiāo，yòu bì gǔzhé le。
He fell and fractured his right arm.
活动一下筋骨
huódòngyíxià jīngǔ 
limber up the joints; limber oneself up
戳脊梁骨
chuō jǐliánggǔ
criticize sb. behind him; backbite

Wǔshù kěyǐ duànliàn jīngǔ。
Practising wushu strengthens the physique.
耻骨联合
chǐgǔ liánhé

shòugúlínxún 
be terribly emaciated
令人毛骨悚然
lìngrén máogǔsǒngrán 
send cold shivers down one\'s spine; make sb.\'s hair stand on end; be bloodcurdling
没有丝毫的奴颜与媚骨
méiyǒu sīháo de núyán yǔ mèigǔ 
be free from all sycophancy or obsequiousness
奴颜媚骨者向来就有，今后也永远会有。
Núyánmèigǔ zhě xiàng lái jiù yǒu，jīnhòu yě yǒngyuǎn huì yǒu。
There has ever been and ever will be found sycophancy on the side of power.
她情愿粉身碎骨，也不在敌人面前屈服。
Tā qíngyuàn fěnshēnsuìgǔ，yě bú zài dírén miànqián qūfú。
She would rather be cut to pieces than yield to the enemy.
颧骨突起
quángǔ tūqǐ
have prominent cheekbones
他虽然浑身青肿，但并未伤筋动骨。
Tā suīrán húnshēn qīngzhǒng，dàn bìngwèi shāngjīn dònggǔ。
Although badly bruised all over, he had broken no bones.
舒散一下筋骨
shūsàn yíxià jīngǔ
stretch oneself; flex one\'s limbs; relax one\'s muscles
舒展一下筋骨
shūzhǎn yíxià jīngǔ

冷得透骨
lěng de tòugǔ 
be chilled to the bone
看得透骨
kàn de tòugǔ 
a keen observation; a penetrating analysis
得到脱胎换骨的改造
Dédào tuō tāihuàngǔ de gǎizào 
cast off one\'s old self and take on a new self; make a change in one\'s very nature
那些了不得的作家，谨严入骨，惜墨如金，要把一生的作品，只删存一个或者三四个字。
Nàxiē liǎobu de de zuòjiā，jǐnyánrùgǔ，xīmòrújīn，yào bǎ yìshēng de zuòpǐn，zhǐ shān cún yígè huòzhě sān sì gè zì。
Some important writers are so strict with themselves, so sparing of ink, that they like to pare down the work of a lifetime to three or four words.
侠骨义胆
xiágǔyìdǎn
chivalry and loyalty
烈士遗骨
lièshì yígǔ 
the remains of the martyrs
画虎画皮难画骨，知人知面不知心。
Huàhǔhuàpínánhuàgǔ，zhīrénzhīmiànbùzhīxīn。
Painting a tiger\'s skin is easy, but not so the bones. A man\'s face one can know, but not his heart.

甲骨文
jiǎgǔwén
inscriptions on bones or tortoise shells of the Shang Dynasty (c. 16th-11th century B.C.)
遗骨
yígǔ
remains (of the dead)
外面寒风砭骨，我们尽量少出门。
Wàimiàn hánfēng biāngǔ，wǒmen jìnliàng shǎo chūmén。
The icy wind outside cuts one to the marrow, we’d better stay indoors.
一次事故中她摔折了膑骨。
yícì shìgù zhōng tā shuāizhé le bìngǔ。
She broke her patella in an accident.
附近的农户对匪徒之残毒恨之入骨。
Fùjìn de nónghù duì fěitú zhī cándú hènzhīrùgǔ。
The thugs\' cruelty is the pet hate of the farmers in the neighbourhood.
这段经历对于他可谓彻骨铭心。
Zhè duàn jīnglì duìyú tā kěwèi chègǔ míngxīn。
This experience was deeply etched in his mind.
你这么做事情，不是让别人戳脊梁骨吗？
Nǐ zhème zuòshìqing，búshì ràng biérén chuō jǐliánggǔ ma？
Doesn\'t it make others talk behind your back by doing things like this?
自从右臂骨折后，他一直戴着吊带。
Zìcóng yòubì gǔzhé hòu，tā yìzhí dài zhe diàodài。
He has always worn a bandage since the fracture of his right arm.
他天生反骨，老是和别人唱反调。
Tā tiānshēng fǎngǔ，lǎo shì hé biérén chàng fǎndiào。
He is by nature a contrary person who deliberately takes different attitudes from others.
航空公司为这次飞递救命骨髓而特开了绿色通道。
Hángkōng gōngsī wèi zhècì fēidì jiùmìng gǔsuǐ ér tè kāi le lǜsè tōngdào。
The airline company opened an emergency green path for the delivery of the lifesaving bone-marrow.
他爷爷原来是财主，家里有很多骨董。
Tā yéye yuánlái shì cáizhǔ，jiā lǐ yǒu hěnduō gǔdǒng。
His grandpa used to be very rich, so there are many antiques in his house.
他的骨骼肌受损，不知道什么时候恢复。
Tā de gǔgéjī shòusǔn，bùzhīdào shénme shíhou huīfù。
It is hard to tell when the injury to his skeletal muscles can recover.
上次吃饭我被骨鲠卡了，别提多难受了。
Shàngcì chīfàn wǒ bèi gǔgěng kǎ le，bié tí duō nánshòu le。
Last time I ate, I got a fish bone caught in my throat and it felt extremely bad.
骨针对于低等动物的生存是至关重要的。
Gǔzhēn duìyú dīděng dòngwù de shēngcún shì zhìguān zhòngyào de。
Spicules are extremely important to lower animals.
由于缺钙，老年人容易患骨质疏松症。
Yóuyú quēgài，lǎoniánrén róngyì huàn gǔzhì shūsōngzhèng。
Due to a lack of calcium, old people can easily get osteoporosis.
虎骨作为一种中药现在已禁止使用。
Hǔgǔ zuòwéi yìzhǒng zhōng yào xiànzài yǐ jìnzhǐ shǐyòng。
Tiger bones used in Chinese medicine has been forbiddern.
目前发现的中国最早的文字，是距今3000多年前的甲骨文。
Mùqián fāxiàn de Zhōngguó zuìzǎo de wénzì，shì jùjīn sānqiān duōniánqián de jiǎgǔwén。
The earliest characters ever found in China are the inscriptions on bones or tortoise shells, which have a history of more than 3000 years.
一看这副枯骨，就知道墓主人肯定已经死去很多年了！
Yíkàn zhè fù kūgǔ，jiù zhīdào mùzhǔrén kěndìng yǐjing sǐqù hěnduō nián le！
The minute you see the dry bone, you know that the occupant of the tomb died many years ago.
寺庙后院的灵塔，存放着这位高僧的遗骨。
Sìmiào hòuyuàn de língtǎ，cúnfàng zhe zhèwèi gāosēng de yígǔ。
Inside the pagoda in the backyard of the temple, there lay the remains of the dignitary.
他时常回忆起那段镂骨铭心的恋情。
Tā shícháng huíyìqǐ nàduàn lùgǔ míngxīn de liànqíng。
He always recalls the love which is engraved in his mind.
骨折了真难办，只好打上夹板慢慢休养了！
Gǔzhé le zhēn nánbàn，zhǐhǎo dǎshàng jiábǎn mànmàn xiūyǎng le！
It is difficult to cope with a bone fracture. The only way is to put the injured part in splints, and rest till it is healed.
这切骨之仇，我永生难忘。
Zhè qiēgǔ zhī chóu，wǒ yǒngshēng nánwàng。
This is deep hatred, I will never forget it in my whole life.
风太大了，伞骨都被吹折了。
Fēng tài dà le，sǎngǔ dōu bèi chuī shé le。
The wind was too strong. The framework of the umbrella was snapped by it.
这匹老马由于长年的劳累，已经瘦骨嶙峋了。
Zhè pǐ lǎomǎ yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，yǐjing shòugǔlínxún le。
This old horse has become skinny due to long years\' tiring work.
据说天天饮用鲜奶有助于骨骼的生长。
Jùshuō tiāntiān yǐnyòng xiānnǎi yǒuzhùyú gǔgé de shēngzhǎng。

小小的跖骨损坏可能会造成严重的后果 。

她第一次骑马就坠马骨折了。
Tā dìyīcì qímǎ jiù zhuìmǎ gǔzhé le。
The first time she rode a horse, she fell off and broke a bone.
最近他感觉自己胸骨后灼痛，医生怀疑他患有食管癌。

He has been feeling a burning pain behind his chest bones recently. The doctor suspects that he has esophagus cancer.
我们把爷爷的骨灰安厝在了殡仪馆。

His body is a bag of bones.
Tā de shēntǐ gǔshòurúchái。
他的身体骨瘦如柴。
He doesn\'t look too bad because of his coat but when you handle him，he is just a bag of bones.

因为欺骗我，我对他恨之入骨。

bàn guǐliǎn 
make grimaces; make faces

shuō guǐhuà

因为心里有鬼，所以他连一句硬话都不敢说。

满嘴鬼话
当面说好话，背地里却在捣鬼。也说背地。

We clutched at the chance to become famous and wealthy.
Wǒmen zhuāzhù rènhé néng chéngmíng fācái de jīhuì。
我们抓住任何能成名发财的机会。
In this way I was going to make a pile of money.
Zhèyàng wǒ jiù néng fācái le。
这样我就能发财了。
There is no escape until your number comes up.
Rúguǒ nǐ bù néng zǒuyùn fācái de huà，shì táo búdiào de。
如果你不能走运发财的话，是逃不掉的。
This man always watches with a greedy eye for the main chance.
Zhège nánrén zǒngshì yòng tānlán de yǎnguāng guāncházhe fācái de jīhuì。
这个男人总是用贪婪的眼光观察着发财的机会。
When my ship comes in, I \'ll probably buy a hotel.
Dāng wǒ yǒuzhāoyírì fācái shí，wǒ kěnéng huì gòumǎi yì jiā jiǔdiàn。
当我有朝一日发财时，我可能会购买一家酒店。
Just think--you could be rich one day!
Xiǎngxiǎng bā，yǒu yì tiān nǐ yě huì fācái de!
想想吧，有一天你也会发财的！

to make a killing

这个男子买了许多彩票，期望着发大财。

那位钢琴演奏者的演奏不娴熟。
The actor had his lines down cold.
这演员把台词背得滚瓜烂熟了。
faniliarize yourself with the job
使自己熟悉工作
a full-grown boy
成熟的男孩
an intimate acquaintance with the facts
对事实非常熟悉
to introduce a freshman to campus life
使新生熟悉校园生活
a mature scheme
考虑成熟的计划
new to the work
对工作不熟悉
unfamiliar with the novels of Kafka
不熟悉卡夫卡的小说
unripe plans
不成熟的计划
cook until done
直止煮熟
winter apples
晚熟苹果
Are you acquainted with my brother?
你跟我兄弟熟吗？
Be mature and stop acting as if you were a baby.
成熟点儿，别表现得像个孩子。
He pilots helicopters very well.
他驾驶直升机的技术很娴熟。
Would you like a ripe pear?
你喜欢吃熟透的梨吗？
The grapes are still green.
葡萄还没熟呢。
His face looks familiar to me.
我觉得他很面熟。
Forced strawberries can be found at the market in season or out of season.
无论什么时令，都可以在市场上买到催熟的草莓。
to know sth backwards {or} &gt; backward and forward
[US] 极熟悉某事
to be familiar with
[+subject] 对…熟悉
to get the feel of sth
开始熟悉某事
he\'s mature for his age
对他的年龄而言他算是成熟的
It\'s time you grew up.
你到了应该成熟的时候了。
having lived abroad for years, I wasn\'t familiar with...
已在国外呆了多年，我都对…不熟悉了

我立即感到自在，因为我见到熟悉的面孔。
He didn\'t know London very well.
他不怎么熟悉伦敦。
this concept is new to me
我对这个概念不熟悉
I\'m new to this way of doing things
我不熟悉这种做事方式
to be a novice at sth
对某物不熟悉
to be ripe for sth
某事的时机已成熟
the time is ripe
时机已成熟
to be unfamiliar with sth
不熟悉某事
This beef is still undercooked. Boil it for ten more minutes.
这牛肉还没有熟透呢，再多煮十分钟吧。

我们对社会科学家之间的行话不熟悉。

成熟胚的子叶是绿色，黄色或浅黄色。
She prefers her steak well-done.
她喜欢吃煎得熟透的牛排.
I would like my mutton chops well done.
我要熟一点的羊排。

The priest arrived at church and found his way to his accustomed place at the front of the church.
Mùshī láidào jiàotáng，zǒudàole tā shúxī de jiàotáng qiánmiàn de wèizhi。

Wánquán fāyù chéngshú de niú tǐzhòng kěyǐ chāoguò 750。

我在啃一些煮熟的鸟肉。

他的飞机驾驶技术非常娴熟。

他的朋友圈都非常成熟，能给予不少帮助。

Zìcóng shàngcì jìngōng yǐlái，guójūn gèng chéngshú yě gèng ruìzhì le。

We should bring this issue to a head and make a decision.

传说中鲛人泪可以化为珍珠。
Chuánshuōzhōng jiāorénlèi kěyǐ huàwéi zhēnzhū。
According to the tale, the tears of shark-people can be turned into pearls.
丈夫走了以后，她每天晚上都用鲛绡偷偷的拭泪。
Zhàngfū zǒu le yǐhòu，tā měitiān wǎnshàng dōu yòng jiāoxiāo tōutōu de shìlèi。
After her husband died young, she secretly wiped away tears with a handkerchief every day.
这支蜡烛已经快燃尽了，下面的蜡泪都有好多了！
Zhèzhī làzhú yǐjing kuài ránjìn le，xiàmiàn de làlèi dōu yǒu hǎo duō le！
Nearly burned out, the burning candle keeps dripping.
二十年没见面的兄妹二人一见面就已经老泪纵横，相拥而泣。
Èrshí nián méi jiànmiàn de xiōngmèi èr rén yí jiànmiàn jiù yǐjing lǎolèi zònghéng，xiāngyōng ér qì。
Having not met each other for over twenty years, the brother and sister hugged each other and cried when they met.
他泪涟涟地向我们诉说她的不幸遭遇。
Tā lèiliánlián de xiàng wǒmen sùshuō tā de búxìng zāoyù。
He told us his unfortunate experiences with tears in his eyes.
她哭得如同泪人一样，可一句话也不说。
Tā kū de rútóng lèirén yíyàng，kě yíjù huà yě bùshuō。
She was all wet with tears, but just said nothing.
一滴清莹的泪珠从她面颊上滑了下来。
Yì dī qīngyíng de lèizhū cóng tā miànjiáshàng huá le xiàlái。
A glistening tear slid down from her cheek.
她经常为自己孤苦的命运暗自弹泪。
Tā jīngcháng wèi zìjǐ gūkǔ de mìngyùn ànzì tánlèi。
Tears comes into her eyes when she thinks of her own hard lot.
看他泫然泪下，我们真不忍心再批评他了。
Kàn tā xuànrán lèixià，wǒmen zhēn bùrěnxīn zài pīpíng tā le。
Seeing him crying with such a sadness, we couldn\'t criticize him any more.

The biggest tear is pinned together by a huge safety-pin.

Rain splashed over his ears and mixed with his tears.

yì jué kùnnan

如果你遇到什么困难，我们必将全力鼎助。

If you have any difficulty, we will help you with all our strength.
面对困难，她非特毫不退缩，还积极寻求解决办法。

这件案子勾连的人太多，处理起来困难很大。

So many people are involved in this case that it is very difficult to deal with.

漫道是这点小事，就是再大的困难我们也要克服。

困境
kùnjìng
difficult position; predicament; straits
