词组是词的组合。
Cízǔ shì cí de zǔhé。
A phrase is a group of words.
拨两间房子给词典组
bō liǎngjiān fángzi gěi cídiǎnzǔ 
set aside two rooms for the dictionary group
组词。
这个句子由一个并列词组作主语。
图解词组。
The inflected forms of a word can be represented by a stem and a list of inflections to be attached.
Cí de qū zhé xíngshì kě yóu yí gè cígàn hé yì zǔ fùjiā cíwěi biànhuà lái tǐxiàn。
词的屈折形式可由一个词干和一组附加词尾变化来体现。
The adjective &quot;red&quot; in the phrase &quot;an red bag&quot; modifies &quot;bag&quot;.
词组“一个红书包”中，形容词“红”修饰“书包”。
&quot;old&quot; modifies &quot;man&quot; in old man
在词组old man中，old修饰man
set phrase
固定词组
a set phrase
一个固定词组
A conjunction connects words, phrases, clauses, and sentences.
连词用来连接单词、词组、分句和句子。
Make sentence with these phrases.
用这些词组造句。
Justice and injustice are contrary terms and neither one applies to God.
Gōngpíng hé bù gōngpíng shì yì zǔ fǎnyìcí，érqiě liǎng zhě duì Shàngdì láishuō dōu bú shìyòng。
公平和不公平是一组反义词，而且两者对上帝来说都不适用。
&quot;Caller&quot; is a Scottish term as in &quot;a caller breeze&quot;.
Cízǔ“a caller breeze（liángfēng）”lǐ de“caller（qīngliáng de）”shì Sūgélán shùyǔ。
词组“a caller breeze（凉风）”里的“caller（清凉的）”是苏格兰术语。
&quot;Turn out&quot; is a phrasal verb in the question &quot;how many turned out to vote?&quot;.
“turn out”zài wènjù“how many turned out to vote?”zhōng shì dòngcí cízǔ。
“turn out”在问句“how many turned out to vote?”中是动词词组。
Once assembled, primitives are used exactly like other words.
Yídàn zǔhéqǐlái，cí de yuánxíng jiù wánquán xiàng qítā de cí nàyàng yùnyòng le。
一旦组合起来，词的原形就完全像其他的词那样运用了。
Words are the blocks from which sentences are made.
Zì cí shì zǔchéng jùzi de gòujiàn。
字词是组成句子的构件。
&quot;Smog&quot; is a blend of &quot;smoke&quot; and &quot;fog&quot;.
“Smog”shì yóu“smoke”hé“fog”zǔchéng de hùnhé cí。
“smog”是由“smoke”和“fog”组成的混合词。
&quot;Motel&quot; is a portmanteau word made by combining &quot;motor&quot; and &quot;hotel&quot;.
“motel”shì yóu“motor”hé“hotel”zǔchéng de hùnhé cí。
“Motel”是由“motor”和“hotel”组成的混合词。
The team concorded several thousand nouns, verbs, and adjectives.
Zhège xiǎozǔ xiūgǎi zhěnglǐle shùqiān gè míngcí、dòngcí、xíngróngcí。
这个小组修改整理了数千个名词、动词、形容词。
Nouns are crucial to language.
名词是语言至关重要的组成部分。
These words are a part of the recognized youth culture.
这些词被认为是青年文化的一个组成部分。
&quot;Proto&quot; is a combining form in a word like &quot;protolanguage&quot; that refers to the hypothetical ancestor of another language or group of languages.
“Proto”shì“protolanguage”zhèyàng de cí de gòucí chéngfèn，hòuzhě shìzhǐ lìng yì zhǒng yǔyán huò lìng yì zǔ yǔyán de jiǎshè zǔxiān。
“Proto”是“protolanguage”这样的词的构词成分，后者是指另一种语言或另一组语言的假设祖先。
重新勘定的辞典共校正出字词错误72处。
Chóngxīn kāndìng de cídiǎn gòng jiàozhèng chū zìcí cuòwù qīshíèrchù。
During the re-collation of the dictionary, 72 misuses of words were found.
普通话中的“了、着、的”等虚词和做后缀的“子、头”等字都念轻声。
Pǔtōnghuà zhōng de“le、zhe、de”děng xūcí hé zuò hòuzhuì de“zǐ、tóu“děng zì dōu niàn qīngshēng。
In putonghua, particles like le, zhe, and de and suffixes like zi and tou are all in the neutral tone (or are all toneless).
汉语究竟是词本位，还是字本位，学术界现在有争论。
She\'s written a program to find words which frequently occur together.
她编写了一个程序，用来查找经常共现的字词。
Semantic tags were attached in order to identify different meanings of the word.
Tōngguò jiā yǔyì biāoqiān kěyǐ quèdìng zì cí de bùtóng hányì。
通过加语义标签可以确定字词的不同含义。
A dictionary of synonyms is called a thesaurus.
同义词字典称为类属词典。
The noun is labeled as uncountable in the dictionary.
这个名词在这本字典里被注为不可数名词。
Sonar is an acronym for sound navigation ranging.
“Sonar”（shēngnà）shì“sound navigation and ranging”（shēngyīndǎoháng hé cèjù）de shǒuzìmǔ suōxiěcí。
“sonar”（声纳）是“sound navigation and ranging”（声音导航和测距）的首字母缩写词。
the initial letter of a word
一个词的首字母
I begin to pronounce the sequence of words and numbers.
Wǒ kāishǐ shuō yìxiē cí hé shùzì。
我开始说一些词和数字。
Initial &quot;l&quot; in &quot;little&quot; is nonsyllabic.
“little”yì cí de shǒu zìmǔ“l”shì bù chéng yīnjié de。
“little”一词的首字母“l”是不成音节的。
The word &quot;dog&quot; is animate.
“gǒu”zhè ge zì shì yǒushēng míngcí。
“狗”这个字是有生名词。
This a radical entry in the learners dictionary.
Xuéxízhě zìdiǎn kěyǐ tōngguò cígēn chácí。
学习者字典可以通过词根查词。
When do you double the final consonant?
在什么情况下双写词尾的辅音字母？
Tell me a word that begins with the letter N.
告诉我一个以字母N开头的单词。
&quot;C&quot; is a polyphone because it is pronounced like &quot;k&quot; in &quot;car&quot; but like &quot;s&quot; in &quot;cell&quot;.
“c”shì yígè duōyīn zìmǔ，yīnwèi tā zài dāncí“car”zhōng fā“k”de yīn，ér zài dāncí“cell”zhōng fā“s”de yīn。
“C”是一个多音字母，因为它在单词“car”中发“k”的音，而在单词“cell”中发“s”的音。
Similar to truncation, wildcards substitute a symbol for one letter of a word.
与截取类似，通配符替代了单词中的某一个字母。
The eight overhanging letters spell out the word THINKING.
Zhè bā gè guà qǐlái de zìmǔ pīnxiě chū yígè dāncí thinking.
这八个挂起来的字母拼写出一个单词THINKING.
The dictionary gave several senses for the word.
Zìdiǎn zhōng lièchūle nàgè cí de duōzhǒng yìyì。
字典中列出了那个词的多种意义。
Many words that were originally hyphenated are now written without hyphens.
Hěnduō dāncí yìkāishǐ shì yǒu liánzìfú de，dànshì xiànzài dōu bú yòng liánzìfú le。
很多单词一开始是有连字符的，但是现在都不用连字符了。
Nciku is more than a dictionary.
N cíkù bú zhǐshì yí bù zìdiǎn。
n词酷不只是一部字典。
We weren\'t sure whether there was a hyphen in the word co-ordination.
Wǒmen bú quèdìng zài dāncí co-ordination zhōng yǒu méi yǒu liánzìfú。
我们不确定在单词co-ordination中有没有连字符。
The word &quot;element&quot; contains five different types of character.
Dāncí“element”bāohán wǔ gè bùtóng de zìmǔ。
单词“element”包含五个不同的字母。
The morpheme can be reduplicated to emphasize the meaning of the word.
Císù kěyǐ chóngfù，yǐbiàn qiángdiào zì de yìsi。
词素可以重复，以便强调字的意思。
The dictionary content has words that were empty of meanings.
字典里收进了一些毫无意义的单词。
The name was a by-word of scorn and opprobrium throughout the city.
Zhège míngzi chéngle quán chéng biǎoshì qīngmiè hé chǐrǔ de dàimíngcí。
这个名字成了全城表示轻蔑和耻辱的代名词。
Nobody ever heard of analog clocks until digital clocks became common, so &quot;analog clock&quot; is a retronym.
Zài shùzì shízhōng biàn de chángjiàn zhīqián méi rén tīngshuōguò mónǐ shízhōng（analog clock），suǒyǐ mónǐ shízhōng shì yígè fǎn pú cí。
在数字时钟变得常见之前没人听说过模拟时钟（analog clock），所以模拟时钟是一个返璞词。
词人往往运用词的声韵特点进行状景寄怀，托物寓情。
Círén wǎngwǎng yùnyòng cí de shēngyùn tèdiǎn jìnxíng zhuàngjǐng jìhuái，tuōwù yùqíng。
Ci writers often make use of the qualities of sounds to express emotions at the sight of some particular scenes or objects.
专有名词
zhuānyǒu míngcí 
technical term; nomenclature
The terms are often used (though quite wrongly) as synonyms for each other.
Zhèxiē zhuānyǒumíngcí jīngcháng bèi yònglái（suīrán shì hěn cuòwù de zuòfǎ）zuòwéi gèzì de tóngyìcí。
这些专有名词经常被用来（虽然是很错误的做法）作为各自的同义词。
He published a collection of his onomastic essays.
Tā chūbǎnle yí bù zhuānyǒumíngcíxué wénjí。
他出版了一部专有名词学文集。
a verbal auxiliary
助动词
auxiliary verb
他理屈词穷，只好求助于诡辩。
Tā lǐqūcíqióng，zhǐhǎo qiúzhù yú guǐbiàn。
As he had a weak case and could not defend himself, he had to resort to sophistry.
多查查词书，对你写作是有帮助的。
Duō cháchá císhū，duì nǐ xiězuò shì yǒu bāngzhù de。
Reading more lexicographical books is very helpful to improve your writing ability.
This helps users to recognise spelling mistakes and to filter out incorrect words.
Tā bāngzhù yònghù shíbié pīnxiě cuòwù，guòlǜ diào bú zhèngquè de dāncí。
它帮助用户识别拼写错误，过滤掉不正确的单词。
作为一篇合格的论文，主题词是必不可少的。
Zuòwéi yì piān hégé de lùnwén，zhǔtící shì bìbùkěshǎo de。
In a qualified thesis paper, key words are indispensable.
把毛主席的诗词谱成歌曲
bǎ Máo Zhǔxí de shīcí pǔchéng gēqǔ
set Chairman Mao\'s poems to music
有人认为，疯癫只不过是异端的代名词，是不为主流的文明所认可而受到的惩罚。
Yǒu rén rènwéi，fēngdiān zhǐbúguò shì yìduān de dàimíngcí，shì bùwéi zhǔliú de wénmíng suǒ rènkě ér shòudào de chéngfá。
Some people believe that madness is a synonym for heresy and the punishment for not being accepted by mainstream culture.
名词一般只能用作句子的主语或宾语。
Míngcí yìbān zhǐnéng yòngzuò jùzi de zhǔyǔ huò bīnyǔ。
Nouns are usually used as the subject or object of a sentence.
一般来说，象声词没有实际意义，因而不能当主语。
Yìbān láishuō，xiàng shēngcí méiyǒu shíjì yìyì，yīnér bùnéng dāng zhǔyǔ。
Generally speaking, onomatopoeia have no actual meaning, therefore they cannot be used as a subject.
西方国家说社会主义国家的政治是铁幕，纯属诬蔑之词。
Xīfāng guójiā shuō shèhuìzhǔyì guójiā de zhèngzhì shì tiěmù，chúnshǔ wūmiè zhī cí。
Western countries saying socialist countries practice autocratic rule is just slander.
全称判断的主词是周延的。
表示&quot;主要意思&quot;的&quot;大意&quot;和表示&quot;疏忽&quot;的&quot;大意&quot;，虽然读音不同，但词形是一样的
It would test whether each word in the sentence was a candidate for the case slots of the main verb.
Tā huì cèshì jùzi zhōng de měigè cí néngfǒu tìhuàn zhǔdòng cí。
它会测试句子中的每个词能否替换主动词。
Unrestricted verbs are usually stronger than those qualified by adverbs.
Zìzhǔ dòngcí tōngcháng bǐ nàxiē bèi fùcí xiànzhì de dòngcí línghuó。
自主动词通常比那些被副词限制的动词灵活。
A tonic syllables carries the main stress in a word.
Zhǔyīn shì yí gè dāncí de zhǔyào zhòngyīn。
主音是一个单词的主要重音。
Here are some examples where the subject does not agree with the verb
Zhèli yǒuxiē lìzi，qízhōng de zhǔyǔ hé dòngcí bù xiāngfú。
这里有些例子，其中的主语和动词不相符。
In English the subject and the verb must agree in number.
Zài yīngyǔ zhōng，zhǔyǔ hé dòngcí bìxū zài（dān fù）shù shàng bǎochí yízhì。
在英语中，主语和动词必须在（单复）数上保持一致。
The main (or independent) clause in a complex sentence has at least a subject and a verb.
Fùzá jù zhōng de zhǔjù（dúlìfēnjù）zhìshǎo yīngyǒu yí gè zhǔyǔ hé dòngcí。
复杂句中的主句（独立分句）至少应有一个主语和动词。
I wrote the lyrics and Harry composed the music for a theme song.
Wǒ wèi zhǔtíqǔ xiěle cí，Hālì pǔ de qǔ。
我为主题曲写了词，哈利谱的曲。
The subject must agree with the verb.
主语必须和动词保持数的一致。
Words and expressions in each unit are divided by subject.
把每个单元的词语和表达按主题分开。
A sentence is in the active form when the action stated by the verb is performed by the subject.
如果动词描述的动作是由主语发出的，这句话就是主动语态。
首先，请宋经理为大会致词。
Shǒuxiān，qǐng Sòng jīnglǐ wéi dàhuì zhìcí。
At last, let\'s welcome Manager Song to address the conference.
致悼词
zhì dàocí 
deliver a memorial speech
致贺词
zhì hècí
give a speech of congratulation
这个词条在两本词典中的意思不太一致。
Zhège cítiáo zài liǎng běn cídiǎn zhōng de yìsi bú tài yízhì。
This entry is not exactly the same in two different dictionaries.
会议先由领导致词。
校长代表学校向捐款单位致谢词。
只听一面之词，以致作出了错误的判断。
In careful usage the noun enormity is not used to express the idea of great size.
Zài xìzhì de yòngfǎ zhōng，míngcí enormity bú yònglái biǎoshì dà chǐcùn de gàiniàn。
在细致的用法中，名词enormity不用来表示大尺寸的概念。
An umlaut is caused in a sound by its assimilation to another sound.
元音变化是由于一个音被另一个音词同化而导致。
&quot;This&quot; is a demonstrative pronoun.
“This”是指示代词。
法官裁定他的证词有效。
Fǎguān cáidìngtā de zhèngcí yǒuxiào。
The judge ruled that his testimony was valid.
他的证词利害攸关，能够直接决定你是否有罪。
Tā de zhèngcí lìhài yōuguān，nénggòu zhíjiē juédìng nǐ shìfǒu yǒuzuì。
His witness is of close interest to you. It can directly decide whether you are guilty or not.
在人证、物证面前，他没词儿了。
inconsistent testimony
自相矛盾的证词

Zhèngrén yīng nénggòu tígōng chōngzú shìdàng de zhèngcí。
证人应能够提供充足适当的证词。
The criminal averted his face while listening to the testimony.
Zuìfàn zài tīngqǔ zhèngcí shí bǎ liǎn zhuànle guòqù。
罪犯在听取证词时把脸转了过去。
She went on record to give full testimony during the proceedings.
Tā zài sùsòng guòchéng zhōng gěichūle quánbù zhèngcí，bìng jìlùzài\'àn。
她在诉讼过程中给出了全部证词，并记录在案。
Don\'t be surprised when somebody takes issue with your testimony.
Yǒu rén duì nǐ de zhèngcí tíchū yìyì shí， búyào dàjīng-xiǎoguài de。
有人对你的证词提出异议时，不要大惊小怪的。
I will testify in favor of you.
Wǒ huì zuò duì nǐ yǒulì de zhèngcí。
我会作对你有利的证词。
According to his own testimony he can\'t do it.
Ànzhào tā běnrén de zhèngcí，tā méiyǒu nénglì zuò nà jiàn shì。
按照他本人的证词，他没有能力做那件事。
A wife is usually considered unqualified to testify against her husband.
Yìbān rènwéi，qīzǐ méiyǒu zīgé duì tā zhàngfu zuò búlì de zhèngcí。
一般认为，妻子没有资格对她丈夫做不利的证词。
He was allowed to hear the playback of his testimony.
Tā huòzhǔn língtīng duì tā de zhèngcí de huífàng。
他获准聆听对他的证词的回放。
His testimony was just a contrivance to throw us off the track.
Tā de zhèngcí zhǐshì wèile ràng wǒmen tuōlí zhèngguǐ de bǎxì éryǐ。
他的证词只是为了让我们脱离正轨的把戏而已。
His testimony was a concoction.
Tā de zhèngcí shì dùzhuàn de。
他的证词是杜撰的。
His incrimination was based on my testimony.
Tā de kònggào shì gēnjù wǒ de zhèngcí tíchū de。
他的控告是根据我的证词提出的。
&quot;Perjure&quot; is a reflexive verb because you cannot perjure anyone but yourself.
“Perjure”（shǐ zuò wěizhèng）shì yí gè fǎnshēn dòngcí，yīnwèi nǐ zhǐnéng shǐ zìjǐ érfēi tārén zuò wěizhèng。
“perjure”（使做伪证）是一个反身动词，因为你只能使自己而非他人做伪证。
Equally, the presence of a pronoun does not prove a relationship.
Tóngyàng，dàicí de chūxiàn bú zhèngmíng suǒshǔ guānxi。
同样，代词的出现不证明所属关系。
学会使用语气词也会使句子增色不少。
Xuéhuì shǐyòng yǔqìcí yě huì shǐ jùzi zēngsè bùshǎo。

上句和下句之间需要用关联词语过渡一下。
Shàngjù hé xiàjù zhījiān xūyào yòng guānlián cíyǔ guòdù yíxià。
The former part of the sentence should be connected to the later part through a conjunction.
遇到复杂的词语要作个简释，以便学生明白。
Yùdào fùzá de cíyǔ yào zuò gè jiǎnshì，yǐ biàn xuésheng míngbai。

In researching dialects, he has accumulated a great number of valuable words and expressions.
这两个词语义相同，但使用场合不同。
Zhèliǎnggè cí yǔyì xiāngtóng，dàn shǐyòng chǎnghé bùtóng。
These two words are the same semantically, but they are used in different contexts.
分词短语
fēncí duǎnyǔ
participial phrase

Nǐ suǒ shuō de，búguò shì fúcí xūyǔ bà le。
What you said were just empty words.
学习语言不仅要学会拼写单词，更要学会语用。
Xuéxí yǔyán bùjǐn yào xuéhuì pīnxiě dāncí，gèngyào xuéhuì yǔyòng。
Learning a language not only means learning to spell words, it also means learning to use the language.

It is more convenient to study English with an electronic dictionary.

Zài yīngyǔ zhōng，jiāyǒu“un”qiánzhuì de cí shì fǒudìngcí。
In English, &quot;un&quot; is a prefix for negative words.

要实现自然语言自动处理，必须抽取单词的词干。

Zài duǎnyǔ “piàoliang de nǚhái”zhōng，“piàoliang”wéi xíngróngcí。
在短语“漂亮的女孩”中，“漂亮”为形容词。
It is not possible for a lexicon to provide full coverage of language.
Cídiǎn bù kěnéng wánquán fùgài yí gè yǔyán。
词典不可能完全覆盖一个语言。
The linguist probably etymologized the words incorrectly.
Zhè míng yǔyánxuéjiā huòxǔ méiyǒu zhèngquè de zhǐchū zhèxiē cí de qǐyuán。
这名语言学家或许没有正确地指出这些词的起源。
常用词汇
chángyòng cíhuì 
common words
用词精当
yòngcí jīngdàng
precise and appropriate wording; masterly choice of words
这篇文章里，有的地方用词不恰当。

用词切当

用词确切
yòngcí quèqiè
precise wording

Your dissertation is appropriate worded.

A frequent (or common) error is using the transitive verb &quot;lay&quot; for the intransitive &quot;lie&quot;.

常见的（或者通常的）错误是把及物动词“lay”用于非及物动词“lie”。

Zhè liǎng gè cí zài yòngfǎ shàng shì tóngyì cí。

She had marshalled her thoughts and had a legitimate excuse ready.

她已经整理好了自己的思路，准备了一个合理的托词。
&quot;Horse&quot; and &quot;hoarse&quot; are homophonous words.
“Horse”hé“hoarse”shì tóngyīncí。
“Horse”和“hoarse”是同音词。
Words written alike are often pronounced differently.
拼法相同的词往往读音不同。
The two different words assimilated into a third different sounding word.
Zhè liǎng gè bùtóng cí de fāyīn tónghuà chéng lìng yī gè yīn。
这两个不同词的发音同化成另一个音。
同义词辨析
tóngyìcí biànxī
synonym discrimination
辨析同义词
biànxī tóngyìcí
discriminate between synonyms
同义词。
辨析同义词。
Although porcelain is frequently used as a synonym for china, the two are not identical.
虽然瓷器常常被当作陶瓷的同义词，但两者并不完全相同。
I need a synonym dictionary for my essay.
我需要一本同义词词典来写文章。
How can you find antonyms in the thesaurus?
你怎么能在同义词典中发现反义词呢？
Why do you need a thesaurus?
你需要同义词典做什么？
Synonyms can be interchanged without a changing the context\'s meaning.
Tóngyìcí kěyǐ xiānghù diàohuàn，ér búhuì gǎibiàn shàngxiàwén de hányì。
同义词可以相互调换，而不会改变上下文的含义。
毕业时同学们互相题词共勉。
Bìyè shí tóngxuémen hùxiāng tící gòngmiǎn。
At graduation the students presented each other with valedictory inscriptions.
这一题词是鲁迅先生的手笔。
Zhè yì tící shì Lǔ Xùn xiānshēng de shǒubǐ。
This inscription is in Lu Xun\'s own handwriting.
我对这个问题不清楚，只能不赞一词。
Wǒ duì zhège wèntí bùqīngchu，zhǐnéngbúzànyìcí。
I\'m not clear about this matter, so I had better keep quiet.
为博物馆题词。
这几幅题词很有意义。

他忘了台词，还得让人提词。
Tā wàng le táicí，hái děi ràng rén tící。
He forgot his lines and had to be prompted.
我来提词。
Wǒ lái tící。
I\'ll be the prompter.
你要忘了台词，我提示你。
Nǐ yào wàngle táicí，wǒ tíshì nǐ。
If you forget your lines, I\'ll prompt you.
如果她忘了台词，你就给她提示一下。
Rúguǒ tā wàng le táicí，nǐ jiù gěi tā tíshì yíxià。
Prompt her if she forgets her lines.
He stumbled over the words on the teleprompter.
Tā jiējiē-bābā de niànzhe diànzǐ tícíjī shàng de huà。
他结结巴巴地念着电子提词机上的话。
I offered several prompts during the play because she kept forgetting her lines.
由于她总是忘词，我给她做了好几次提白。
评弹是评话和弹词的合称。
Píngtán shì pínghuà hé táncí de héchēng。
Pingtan (a form of storytelling and ballad singing in Suzhou dialect) is a general term for pinghua (storytelling as an entertainment) and tanci (storytelling to the accompaniment of stringed instruments and drums).
背台词
bèitáicí 
speak one\'s lines
演员对每句台词都要反复吟咏、咀嚼，才能进入角色。
Yǎnyuán duì měi jù táicí dōuyào fǎnfù yínyǒng、jǔjué，cái néngjìnrù juésè。
An actor must rehearse his lines again and again, chewing on them so to speak, before he can hope to get inside the character that he is playing.
话剧演员需要有深厚的台词功力。

a quick study
过目成诵者(尤指台词记得快的演员)

míngcíde dānshùxíngshì
the singular form of the noun

水是不可数名词。
Logical quantifiers, adverbs, prepositions, and conjunctions are called syncategoremes.
Luójì shùliàngcí、fùcí、qián zhì dìng cí hé liáncí tǒngchēng wéi syncategoreme。
逻辑数量词、副词、前置定词和连词统称为syncategoreme。

Zài dāncí“bush”fùshù zhōng chārù yígè yuányīn jiùshì chāyīn。
在单词“bush”复数中插入一个元音就是插音。

“It”shì dì-sān rénchēng dānshù de zhōngxìng dài míngcí。
“it”是第三人称单数的中性代名词。
There is a word, 7 lines back, that I don\'t understand. What does it mean?
倒数第七行有一个单词我不理解。它是什么意思？
The plural of deer is said to be formed by the addition of a zero allomorph of the plural morpheme.
deer的复数被认为是通过添加零词缀而构成的。
She felt oddly pleased and flattered by the compliment.
Duì zhèxiē gōngwéi zhī cí，tā gǎndào shòuchǒngruòjīng。
对这些恭维之词，她感到受宠若惊。
这本诗词选集收录了十首今体诗。
Zhèběn shīcí xuǎnjí shōulù le shí shǒu jīntǐshī。
This collection of poetry includes ten modern poems.
这本书收录了近三千首唐诗和一千首宋词。

The book contains nearly 3,000 Tang poems and 1,000 pieces of Song prose.
Certain words need to be tensed out to pronounce correctly.
Yǒuxiē cí bìxū shōujǐn kǒuxíng cáinéng fāyīn zhǔnquè。
有些词必须收紧口型才能发音准确。
他的写作风格朴实简练，很少添加饰词。

He writes simply and succinctly, rarely adding too much adornment.
实词
推倒诬蔑不实之词。
&quot;Honesty&quot; and &quot;whiteness&quot; are abstractions.
“诚实”和“洁白” 是抽象词。
这些诗词的本事，年久失考。
Zhèxiē shīcí de běnshì，niánjiǔ shīkǎo。
The original story these poems were based on has long been lost.
吟唱毛泽东诗词
yínchànɡ Máo Zédōnɡ shīcí 
chant Mao Zedong\'s poems
国乐中蕴含了许多传统文化的因素，比如诗词文赋。
Guóyuè zhōng yùnhán le xǔduō chuántǒng wénhuà de yīnsù，bǐrú shīcí wénfù。
Traditional Chinese music contains many traditional cultures, such as poetry, ci and prose.
他对诗词歌赋有一定的研究，尤其钟爱宋词。
Tā duì shīcígēfù yǒu yídìng de yánjiū，yóuqí zhōng ài sòngcí。
He has done some research on Chinese traditional styles of writing and likes Song ci best.
姐姐上学的时候就对古典诗词产生了兴趣，尤其喜欢五古。
Jiějie shàngxué de shíhou jiù duì gǔdiǎn shīcí chǎnshēng le xìngqù，yóuqí xǐhuan wǔgǔ。
My sister began to be interested in classical poetry when she was in school, and her favorite was an ancient poem with five characters to each line.
康熙皇帝巡风江南，后来留下许多诗词。
Kāngxī huángdì xúnfēng jiāngnán，hòulái liúxià xǔduō shīcí。
Emperor Kangxi wrote many poems during his inspection tour to the Southland.
不要把诗和词混同起来。
Búyào bǎ shī hé cí hùntóng qǐlái。
Don\'t confuse poetry of regular metre with poetry with irregular metre.
爸爸喜爱诗歌词赋，在他的熏陶下，我也对此十分地着迷。
Bàba xǐ\'àishīgēcífù，zài tā de xūntáo xià，wǒ yě duìcǐ shífēn de zháomí。
Father was fond of poetry. Because of his influence, I am fascinated in it too.
唐代有诗、宋朝有词，我们当代的时文是什么？
Tángdài yǒu shī、Sòngcháo yǒu cí，wǒmen dāngdài de shíwén shì shénme？
There was poetry in the Tang Dynasty and ci in the Song Dynasty, then what is the representative literature form in our contemporary society?
词和律诗体式不同。
Cí hé lǜshī tǐshì bùtóng。
Ci poems are different in form from lüshi poems.
你把我写的这几个词联缀起来看看是不是一首诗？
Nǐ bǎ wǒ xiě de zhèjǐgè cí liánzhuì qǐlái kànkàn shìbushì yì shǒu shī？
Combining these words I have written. Can\'t they form a poem?
《诗词例话》
唐宋诗词。
诗、词、赋无不精通。
唐诗宋词
唐诗、宋词、元曲是我国古代文学史上的三座高峰。
When he read his poem, he broke the meter of the poem.
Dāng dú dào zìjǐ de shīcí shí，tā bìngwèi zūnzhào yuánlái de yùnlǜ。
当读到自己的诗词时，他并未遵照原来的韵律。
Poetry often does not translate.
Shīcí chángcháng wúfǎ fānyì。
诗词常常无法翻译。
The poet syllabized the verses he read.
Zhè míng shīrén wèi tā lǎngsòng de shīcí biāozhù yīnjié。
这名诗人为他朗诵的诗词标注音节。
A poet sometimes falsifies accent.
诗人有时改变词的重音。
This poem can be characterized as a lament for a dead lover.
Zhè shǒu shī kěyǐ kànzuò shì duì sǐqù qíngrén de dàocí。
这首诗可以看作是对死去情人的悼词。
老师给出生词的释义。
Lǎoshī gěi chū shēngcí de shìyì。
The teacher gave a definition of the new word.
20年前他对编词典产生了兴趣，从此乐此不疲。
Èrshínián qián tā duì biāncídiǎn chǎnshēng le xìngqù，cóngcǐ lècǐbùpí。
He began to be interested in dictionary-making 20 years ago, and since then has worked at it gladly and never tired.
学中文的学生必须对正词法有全面的掌握。
Xué zhōng wén de xuésheng bìxū duì zhèngcífǎ yǒu quánmiàn de zhǎngwò。
Students majoring in Chinese must have an overall mastery of morphology.
自己生造的不三不四的词句
zìjǐ shēngzào de bùsānbúsì de cíjù 
nondescript expressions of one\'s own coinage
这个词太生僻了。
&quot;Crack&quot; is often described as a derivative of cocaine.
Yìbān rènwéi “crack” shì “cocaine” de pàishēngcí。
一般认为“crack”是“cocaine”的派生词。
&quot;Electricity&quot; is a derivative of &quot;electric&quot;.
“electricity”shì“electric”de pàishēngcí。
“Electricity”是“electric”的派生词。
&quot;Singer&quot; from &quot;sing&quot; or &quot;undo&quot; from &quot;do&quot; are examples of derivations.
“Cóng“sing”yǎnbiàn érlái de singer”hé cóng“do”yǎnbiàn érlái de“undo”shì pàishēngcí de liǎng gè lìzi。
从“sing”演变而来的“singer”和从“do”演变而来的“undo”是派生词的两个例子。
The unknown word turned up over and over again in the text.
Zhège shēngcí zài wén zhōng fǎnfù chūxiàn。
这个生词在文中反复出现。
As a rule, the locative postposition only modifies inanimate nouns.
按规则，方位后置词只能修饰无生命的名词。
The stable yard fraternity is seldom short of the picturesque word.
Wěndìng de tíngyuàn xiōngdihuì hěn shǎo quē shēngdòng de cíhuì。
稳定的庭院兄弟会很少缺生动的词汇。
&quot;Pick&quot; is the primitive from which &quot;picket&quot; is derived.
“pick”shì“picket”suǒ cóng pàishēng de gēn cí。
“pick”是“picket”所从派生的根词。
The teacher asked the students to spell and define the words.
Lǎoshī yāoqiú xuésheng pīnxiě dāncí bìng xiěchū shìyì。
老师要求学生拼写单词并写出释义。
The morphological relation between &quot;sing&quot; and &quot;singer&quot; and &quot;song&quot; is derivational.
Cóng xíngtài guānxi shàng kàn，“sing”、“singer”hé“song”dōushì yóu tóng yí gè cí pàishēng chūlái de。
从形态关系上看，“sing”、“singer”和“song”都是由同一个词派生出来的。
How did that word come to mean that?
这个词是怎么衍生出那个意思的？
&quot;Bosky&quot; is a literary term.
“Bosky （ǎi lín cóngshēng de）”shì gè wénxuéxìng cíhuì。
“Bosky（矮林丛生的）”是个文学性词汇。
This student knows her irregular verbs.
Zhè míng xuésheng zhǎngwòle bù guīzé dòngcí。
这名学生掌握了不规则动词。
Words change meaning  without our noticing.
不经意间，词汇的意义已经发生了变化。
Space is provided for the pupil to add new words.
Xuéshengmen bèi jǐyǔle kōngjiān，yǐbiàn zēngjiā xīndāncí。

The prepositions are underlined.
Qiánzhì cí dōu huàle xiàhuáxiàn。
前置词都画了下划线。
神婆不住地在屋子里跳神儿，口中还念念有词。
Shénpó búzhù de zài wūzi lǐ tiàoshénr，kǒu zhōng hái niànniàn yǒucí。
The witch kept on dancing in a trance in the room, and mumbled at the same time.
道长手持麈尾，口中念念有词，仿佛在诉说着死者的来世。
Dàozhǎng shǒuchí zhǔwěi，kǒu zhōng niànniàn yǒucí，fǎngfú zài sùshuō zhe sǐzhě de láishì。
The monk was holding a horsetail whisk in his hand and muttering incantations, as if talking about the future world of the dead.
诸葛亮在民间传说中成了智慧的代名词。
Zhūgě Liàng zài mínjiān chuánshuō zhōng chéng le zhìhuì de dàimíngcí。
Zhuge Liang is a synonym for wisdom in folklore.

huàxué mínɡcí
chemical term
满口新名词
mǎnkǒu xīn mínɡcí
mouthing newfangled phrases

The International Date Line is a geographical noun.
李清照的《声声慢》是非常著名的一首慢词。

Slow slow tune by Li Qingzhao is a very famous long and slow-rhymed ci.
名词
处所名词
&quot;包青天&quot;早已成为清官的代名词
满口新名词儿。
医学名词
满嘴都是新名词儿。
名物词。
a verbal noun
动词状名词，动名词
The noun that follows each of these words governs the verb.
Gēnzài zhèxiē cí hòu de míngcí dōu zhīpèizhe dòngcí。
跟在这些词后的名词都支配着动词。
To eye is a denominative verb.
“to eye”中的eye是来自名词的动词。
a noun which has two senses
一个有两种释义的名词
Poverty was an attribute of the working classes in England
Zài yīngguó ，pínqióng shì gōngrénjiējí de dàimíngcí。
在英国，贫穷是工人阶级的代名词。
A distinction between the verb and noun senses of &quot;conflict&quot; is that in the verb the stress is on the ultimate (or last) syllable.
“Conflict”de dòngcí ìyì hé míngcí yìyì zhījiān de qūbié zàiyú，zhòngyīn zài zuìzhōng de（huòzhě zuìhòu de）yīnjié shàng。
“Conflict”的动词意义和名词意义之间的区别在于，重音在最终的（或者最后的）音节上。
&quot;Meek&quot; in &quot;blessed are the meek&quot; is an adnoun.
“Blessed are the meek”lǐ de“meek”shì gè xíngmíngcí。
“Blessed are the meek”里的“meek”是个形名词。
The word &quot;car&quot; is inanimate.
“qìchē”zhè ge cí shì wú líng míngcí。
“汽车”这个词是无灵名词。
a patronymic suffix
表示父名的词尾
Son and daughter are heteronymous.
儿子和女儿是异名(关连词)。
“人次”、“吨公里”、“秒立方米”等为复合量词。
“Réncì”、“dūngōnglǐ”、“miǎolìfāngmǐ”děng wéi fùhéliàngcí。
&quot;Person-time&quot;, &quot;ton kilometer&quot; and &quot;cubic meters per second&quot; are all compound classifiers.
to command a large vocabulary
掌握大量词汇
the literal meaning of ponder is &quot;to weigh&quot;
“ponder”一词的源意是“称…的重量”
a copulative conjunction
连系连接词(如and)
a copulative verb
连系动词
Though is a concessive conjunction.
though 是让步连接词。
In &quot;John or Bob may go, but their sister may not.&quot;, &quot;or&quot; and &quot;but&quot; are disjunctive conjunctions.
在“John or Bob may go, but their sister may not.”句中，“or”和“but”是转折(或分离)连接词。
&quot;And&quot; is a copulative conjunction.
“and”shì yí gè liánjiē liáncí。
“And”是一个连接连词。
a conjunctive adverb
连接副词
&quot;And&quot; in &quot;John and Mary&quot; or in &quot;John walked and Mary rode&quot; is a coordinating conjunction; and so is &quot;or&quot; in &quot;will you go or stay??
Zài“John and Mary”huòzhě“John walked and Mary rode”zhōng，“and”yì cí shì bìngliè liáncí；zài“will you go or stay”zhōng de“or”yě shì bìngliè liáncí。
在“John and Mary”或者“John walked and Mary rode”中，“and”一词是并列连词；在“will you go or stay”中的“or”也是并列连词。
When&quot; in &quot;I will come when I can&quot; is a subordinating conjunction.
Zài“I will come when I can”zhōng，“when”shì cóngshǔ liáncí。
在“I will come when I can”中，“when”是从属连词。
a stream of words
一连串单词
I can tell that the girl doesn\'t know how to speak a single word in Chinese.
Wǒ kànde chūlái，zhège nǚhái lián yí gè zhōngwén dāncí yě bú huì shuō。
我看得出来，这个女孩连一个中文单词也不会说。
华丽的词藻
huálì de cízǎo
flowery language
李清照的词婉丽凄美，是婉约派词的代表人物。
Lǐ Qīngzhào de cí wǎnlì qīměi，shì wǎnyuēpài cí de dàibiǎo rénwù。
A representative of the romantic school, Li Qingzhao wrote euphemistic and graceful poems.
词藻艳丽
cízǎo yànlì
flowery diction
这篇散文词藻繁丽，意境优美。
Zhèpiān sǎnwén cízǎo fánlì，yìjìng yōuměi。
This essay is rich and flowery in diction and elegant in its artistic mood.
黼黻(常比喻华丽的词藻)。
词藻华丽。
Beauty is an abstract word.
美丽是个抽象词。
fine writing
词藻华丽的文章
lush writing
词藻华丽的写作
介词。
This makes a fine introduction.
Tā de jièshào chōngmǎnle měiyùzhīcí。
他的介绍充满了美誉之词。
解说词
Adding &quot;out&quot; to many verbs transitivizes them.
Zài xǔduō dòngcí hòumiàn jiāshàng“out”huì shǐ tāmen biànwéi jíwù dòngcí。
在许多动词后面加上“out”会使它们变为及物动词。
&quot;Foliate&quot; is combined with the prefix &quot;tri&quot; to form the word &quot;trifoliate&quot;.
“Yǒu yè de”yǔ qiánzhuì“tri”jiéhé gòuchéngle“jùyǒu sān yè de”yìcí。
“有叶的”与前缀“tri”结合构成了“具有三叶的”一词。
&quot;Foliolate&quot; is combined with the prefix &quot;bi&quot; to form the word &quot;bifoliolate&quot;.
“Yǒu yè de”yǔ qiánzhuì“bi”jiéhé gòuchéngle“jùyǒu liǎng piàn yè de”yìcí。
“有叶的”与前缀“bi”结合构成了“具有两片叶的”一词。
构词
ɡòucí
form a word
&quot;Neo&quot; is a combining form in words like &quot;neocolonialism&quot;.
“Neo”zài“neocolonialism”yìcí zhōng shì yí gè gòucí chéngfèn。
“neo”在“neocolonialism”一词中是一个构词成分。
-ate is a verbal suffix
“-ate”是构成动词的后缀
&quot;Hemato-&quot; is a combining form in words like &quot;hematology&quot;.
“Hemato-”shì dāncí de yí gè gòuchéng bùfen，bǐrú“hematology”。
“hemato-”是单词的一个构成部分，比如“hematology”。
供词
a confession signed under duress
在胁迫下所签的供词，强迫供状
You have to change your version or the police won\'t accept it.
你得更改你的供词，不然警察不会相信你的。
The elicitation of his testimony was not easy.
Zài tào tā de gòngcí shí pōfèi zhōuzhāng。
在套他的供词时颇费周章。
多功能词典
编歌词
biāngēcí
write lyrics
这首歌的词曲作者是同一个人。
Zhèshǒugē de cíqǔ zuòzhě shì tóng yígè rén。
The writer of the lyrics and the composer of the song is the same person.
根据这首歌的谱配了一段新词。
Gēnjù zhèshǒugē de pǔ pèi le yíduàn xīn cí。
New lyrics have been composed to the music of this song.
歌词
我把这一段歌词的大意向大家译述一下。
When the measured speech of the chorus passes over into song the tones are, remotely but unmistakably, those taught by the orthodox liturgy.
Suīrán héchàng de gēcí bèi gēshēng suǒ yānmò，dànshì tōngguò zhèngtǒng yíshì xùnliàn de qǔdiào réngrán yōuyáng éryòu qīngxī。
虽然合唱的歌词被歌声所淹没，但是通过正统仪式训练的曲调仍然悠扬而又清晰。
The words of the song were beautiful and haunting.
Zhè shǒu gē de gēcí yōuměi，yíngrào zài rénmen xīntóu。
这首歌的歌词优美，萦绕在人们心头。
His compositions always started with the lyrics.
Tā de yuèqǔ zǒngshì yǐ gēcí kāishǐ。
他的乐曲总是以歌词开始。
Solmizate a song before you learn the lyrics.
Zài xuéxí gēcí zhīqián，xiān shìchàng。
在学习歌词之前，先视唱。
an adverbial suffix
副词后缀
&quot;More surely&quot; is the comparative of the adverb &quot;surely&quot;.
“More surely”shì fùcí“surely”de bǐjiàojí xíngshì。
“more surely”是副词“surely”的比较级形式。
&quot;Most surely&quot; is the superlative of the adverb &quot;surely&quot;.
“most surely”shì fùcí“surely”de zuìgāo jí。
“most surely”是副词“surely”的最高级。
Her litmus test for good breeding is whether you split infinitives.
Tā cèshì biérén shìfǒu jùyǒu liánghǎo jiàoyǎng de biāozhǔn shì kàn duìfāng shìfǒu zài búdìng shì de dòngcí qián jiā xiūshì fùcí。
她测试别人是否具有良好教养的标准是看对方是否在不定式的动词前加修饰副词。
他拼错了两个词，刨了四分。
Tā pīncuò le liǎnggè cí，páo le sì fēn。
He got four marks deducted for two spelling mistakes.
分科词典。
措词十分锐利。
Whereas &quot;each,&quot; &quot;every,&quot; &quot;either,&quot; &quot;neither,&quot; and &quot;none&quot; are distributive or referring to a single member of a group，&quot;which&quot; in &quot;which of the men&quot; is separative.
Suīrán“each”、“every”、“either”、“neither”hé“none”dōushì pèifēncí huòzhě shì zhǐ yí gè qúntǐ zhōng de dāngè chéngyuán，dàn“which of the men”zhōng de“which”shì fēnlí de。
虽然“each”、“every”、“either”、“neither”和“none”都是配分词或者是指一个群体中的单个成员，但“which of the men”中的“which”是分离的。
In &quot;After marrying him, her trouble began,&quot; the participle&quot;marrying&quot; dangles.
在“与他结婚后，她的麻烦开始了”中，“marrying”是垂悬分词。
&quot;Brim&quot; and &quot;crown&quot; are meronyms of &quot;hat&quot;.
“brim”（màoyán）hé“crown（mào dǐng）shì“hat”（màozi） de bùfen cí。
“brim”（帽沿）和“crown”（帽顶）是“hat”（帽子）的部分词。
There are three types of articles, namely the zero article, the indefinite article and the definite article.
冠词分为三种：零冠词，不定冠词和定冠词。
As I\'ve already told you, articles can be classified into definite articles and indefinite articles.
我早就讲过，冠词可以分为定冠词和不定冠词。
The teacher asked her to distinguish three different meanings of the word.
Lǎoshī ràng tā qūfēn zhège dāncí de sān zhǒng bù tóng yìsi。
老师让她区分这个单词的三种不同意思。
A simplex word has no affixes and is not part of a compound--like &quot;boy&quot; compared with &quot;boyish&quot; or &quot;house&quot; compared with &quot;houseboat&quot;.
Dānchúncí méiyǒu cízhuì，bú shì fùhécí de yí bùfēn —— rú yǔ“boyish”xiāng bǐjiào de“boy”huòzhě yǔ“houseboat”xiāng bǐjiào de“house”jiùshì dānchúncí。
单纯词没有词缀，不是复合词的一部分——如与“boyish”相比较的“boy”或者与“houseboat”相比较的“house”就是单纯词。
Thematic vowels are part of the stem.
Cígàn yuányīn shì cígàn de yíbùfēn。
词干元音是词干的一部分。
This analysis was drilled down to keyword level.
Zhè yī fēnxī shēnrù dào le guānjiàncí。
这一分析深入到了关键词。
Neil has trouble with words that have similar pronunciations.
尼尔分不清楚读音相似的词。
The girl confused &quot;snack&quot; with &quot;snake&quot;.
这个女孩分不清“小吃”和“蛇”这两个单词。
词典的每一条释义都要反复斟酌。
Good\' is the antonym of \'bad\'.
“Hǎo”shì“huài”de fǎnyìcí。
“好”是“坏”的反义词。
Lenders and borrowers are converse terms.
Dàikuǎnrén hé jièkuǎnrén shì fǎnyìcí。
贷款人和借款人是反义词。
The reciprocal of safety is risk.
Ānquán de fǎnyìcí shì fēngxiǎn。
安全的反义词是风险。
Risk is the reciprocal of safety.
Fēngxiǎn shì ānquán de fǎnyìcí。
风险是安全的反义词。
To him the antonym of &quot;gay&quot; was &quot;depressed&quot;.
Duì tā láishuō“gāoxìng”de fǎnyìcí shì“jǔsàng”。
对他来说“高兴”的反义词是“沮丧”。
Every word has a syndrome of meanings.
Měigè dāncí dōu yǒu duōcéng hányì。
每个单词都有多层含义。
One word can have different meanings.
一个词可以有很多含义。
这两个人说的对口词真有意思。
Zhè liǎnggèrén shuō de duìkǒucí zhēn yǒu yìsī。
The rhymed dialogue between the two performers is very interesting.
晚上就要演出了，他们正抓紧对词呢。
Wǎnshàng jiùyào yǎnchū le，tāmen zhèng zhuājǐn duìcí ne。
They are going through a rehearsal, the show is to be staged at night.
你把这些词目校对一下，不要出错。
Nǐ bǎ zhèxiē címù jiàoduì yíxià，búyào chūcuò。
Check these objects with a dictionary, don\'t make any mistakes.
你这个单词发音不对。
Nǐ zhège dāncí fāyīnbúduì。
You pronounced this word wrong.
这个词是旧时下对上的称呼。
Zhège cí shìjiù shí xià duì shàng de chēnghū。
This word was used in the old days to address one\'s superiors.
对已经取得的成绩不要夸大其词。
Duì yǐjing qǔdé de chéngjì bú yào kuādàqící。
We shouldn\'t overstate our past achievements.
演出前，他们又一次对词走场子。
对此，群众颇有微词。
My apprehension of words is auricular; I must hear what I read.
Wǒ duì cíhuì de lǐjiě shì tōngguò tīnglì lái wánchéng de；wǒ bìxū tīngdào wǒ suǒ yuèdú de nèiróng。
我对词汇的理解是通过听力来完成的；我必须听到我所阅读的内容。
Our everyday understanding of this term is connected with the idea of choice.
Wǒmen duì zhège cí de rìcháng lǐjiě shì hé xuǎnzé de yìsi liánxì zài yìqǐ de。
我们对这个词的日常理解是和选择的意思联系在一起的。
He said a few kind but ambiguous words to me.
Tā hánhúqící de duì wǒ shuōle jǐjù hǎohuà。
他含糊其词地对我说了几句好话。
She has something against her boss for always being out of the office.
老板总是不在办公室，她对此略有微词。
The lawyer was asked to abstract his closing statements.
Lǜshī bèi yāoqiú duì qí jié\'àn chéncí zuòchū zǒngjié。
律师被要求对其结案陈词做出总结。
This is a compact dictionary, good enough for beginners.
Zhè shì yì běn jiǎnmíng cídiǎn，dàn duì chūxuézhě láishuō zúgòu hǎo le。
这是一本简明词典，但对初学者来说足够好了。
There are a few people having a go at him now.
Xiànzài yǒuxiē rén duì tā pōyǒuwēicí。
现在有些人对他颇有微词。
They were careful with the words they chose.
Tāmen zǐxì duìdài tāmen xuǎn de dāncí。
他们仔细对待他们选的单词。
动词不定式
dòngcí búdìngshì
infinitive
The past tense of regular verbs is expressed by adding -d or -ed to the infinitive.
Guīzé dòngcí de guòqùshì shì yǐ xiàngdòngcí búdìng shì tiānjiā“d”huòzhě“ed”de fāngshì lái biǎodá。
规则动词的过去式是以向动词不定式添加“d” 或者“ed” 的方式来表达。
这篇文章我只改动了一些词句。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wǒ zhǐ gǎidòng le yìxiē cíjù。
I just polished a few sentences in this essay.
词意恳挚动人
cíyì kěnzhì dònɡrén
express oneself in moving words
&quot;Fell&quot; is a causative verb meaning &quot;to cause to fall&quot;.
Fell是个使役动词，意为“使倒下”。
&quot;Ought&quot; is a defective verb.
“ought”是个不完全(变化)的动词。
&quot;Am&quot; is a form of the verb &quot;be&quot;.
“am”是动词“be”的一种形式。
the future tense of a verb
动词的将来时
Go is an irregular verb.
go是个不规则动词。
a modal verb
情态动词
Can, may, might, must, should, and would are modal auxiliary .
can，may，might，must，should和would是情态动词。
Prickle is a frequentative of prick.
prickle是prick的重复动词。
The teacher asked me to find all the verbs in the text.
老师让我找出课文中的所有动词。
&quot;Sing&quot; is a strong verb.
“Sing”shì gè bù guīzé dòngcí。
“Sing”是个不规则动词。
The sentence &quot;he washed&quot; has a reflexive verb.
Jùzi“he washed”zhōng bāohán yí gè fǎnshēn dòngcí。
句子“he washed”中包含一个反身动词。
单词重音
dāncí zhòngyīn 
word stress
单音词。
a monosyllabic word
单音节词
An ordinarily mute vowel should be pronounced in this word.
Yìbān bù fāyīn de yuányīn yīng zài zhège dāncí zhōng fāyīn。
一般不发音的元音应在这个单词中发音。
In English words, ‵is the symbol of stress.
英文单词里，‵是重音音节的符号。
The consonants are geminated in these words.
Fǔyīn zài zhèxiē dāncí zhōng dōuyào shuāngxiě。
辅音在这些单词中都要双写。
Our teacher has a tendency to accent the first syllable of each word as she reads.
Wǒmen de lǎoshī zài yuèdú shí xǐhuan zhòngdú měigè dāncí de dì-yī gè yīnjié。
我们的老师在阅读时喜欢重读每个单词的第一个音节。
A long word may have more than one stress.
一个长单词可能有不只一个重音音节。
小王一有空暇就背英文单词。
Xiǎo Wángyì yǒu kòngxiá jiù bèi Yīngwén dāncí。
Whenever he has a bit of spare time, Xiao Wang uses it to memorize English words.
念单词
背单词
单词忘得一干二净。

learning English vocabulary is a killer
学习英文单词真是难死人了
He has a rarely seen ability to memorize words.
他有着极出色的记忆单词的能力。
If you don\'t know the word you can always use a dictionary to look it up.

如果你不知道这个单词，你什么时候都可以查词典。

Rúguǒ bú tìhuàn dāncí de huà，nà háiyǒu rènhé yìyì ma？

It\'s a great way to spread the word about nciku to all of the world.

Wǒ tǎoyàn yǐ“-ism”jiéwěi de dāncí。

Modern Chinese-English Dictionary (New Edition)
现在的鼓曲与宋代的鼓子词是有渊源的。
Xiànzài de gǔqǔ yǔ Sòngdài de gǔzicí shì yǒu yuānyuán de。
Modern day Guqu originated from Dagu of the Song Dynasty,
词的全盛时代是宋朝。
relative pronoun
关系代词
A and an are indefinite articles, any is an indefinite pronoun.
a和an是不定冠词，any是不定代词。
Each other is a reciprocal pronoun.
each other是个相互代词。
He always put the stress on the pronoun.
他总重读代词。
The sentence &quot;They cared for each other&quot; contains a reciprocal pronoun.
Jùzi“they cared for each other”zhè jù huà zhōng bāohán yí gè xiānghù dàicí。
句子“they cared for each other”这句话中包含一个相互代词。
&quot;Glistering&quot; is an archaic term.
“Glistering”zhège cí shì yí gè gǔdài de cí。
“Glistering”这个词是一个古代的词。
Washington is a metonym for the united states government.
Huáshèngdùn shì dàibiǎo Měiguó zhèngfǔ de zhuǎn yù cí。

含糊其词的答复
hánhuqící de dáfù
an equivocally worded reply

&quot;Tick&quot; and &quot;clatter&quot;, are both onomatopoeic words.
追溯词源

Yǒu de bāoyìcí de cíyì zhújiàn yǎnbiàn wéi biǎnyì de。
Some negative words have actually evolved from positive ones.
这两个词在意义上没有区别。
Zhè liǎnggè cí zài yìyì shàng méiyǒu qūbié。
There is no difference in meaning between the two words.
这个词的意思是什么？
Zhège cí de yìsi shì shénme? 
What is the meaning of this word?
他词不达意。
Tā cíbùdáyì。
He couldn\'t express what he meant.
这个词有三个意义。
Zhège cí yǒu sāngè yìyì。
This word has three distinct meanings.

Xiě wénzhāng shí qiǎncí búdàng，kěnéng huì lìng rén kàn bùdǒng wénzhāng de yìsi ne。
Inappropriate wording may make people unable to understand the meaning of the article.
词意畅达
词惬意当。
理解这个词的意义。
词不达意
他把这个词的尾音故意拖得很长。
词义解释既要注意科学性，又要注意通俗性。
The word &quot;mother&quot; means &quot;female parent,&quot; but it generally connotes love, care, tenderness,etc.
“mother”一词意为“母亲”，但它总含有慈爱、关怀和温柔等意义。

将重音放在第二个音节会改变词意。
The meaning of this word is confusing.
这个词的意思很令人费解。
I couldn\'t take in the meaning of the word.

the meaning of a word
词的含意
After some discussion, they agreed to label the term as neutral.
一番讨论之后，他们同意将这个词归入中性类别。
根据上下文确定词义
gēnjù shàngxiàwén quèdìngcíyì
tell the meaning of a word from its context
词义
cíyì 
这个词的含义缺少精确的界定。
Zhège cí de hányì quēshǎo jīngquè de jièdìng。
There is no clear definition for the meaning of this word.
这个词略带贬义。
Zhège cí lüè dài biǎnyì。
This word is slightly derogative.
这个词不能按本义去理解。
Zhège cí bùnéng àn běnyì qù lǐjiě。
This word should not be taken in its literal sense.
他这是断章取义地摘取词句。
Tā zhè shì duànzhāngqǔyì de zhāiqǔ cíjù。
He is quoting out of context.
这个词很常见，但我不清楚它的比喻义。
Zhège cí hěnchángjiàn，dàn wǒ bùqīngchu tā de bǐyùyì。
It is a common word, but I am not sure about its metaphorical meaning.
词义。
词义泛化。
新词新义。
贬义词。
泧扯(割裂文义，剽窃词句)。
词句支离，文义含混。
in the narrow sense of the word
就该词的狭义来说
The example sentence illustrated the meaning of the word.
这个例句诠释了这个词的释义。
I couldn\'t remember the definition of this word.
Wǒ xiǎng bù qǐlái zhège cí de dìngyì le。
我想不起来这个词的定义了。
An example sentence would show what this word means.
Lìjù nénggòu jiěshì zhège cí de hányì。
例句能够解释这个词的含义。
I cannot conceive of a positive connotation for vanity.
Wǒ xiǎng bùchū “fúhuá” yì cí yǒu rènhé de jījí hányì。
我想不出“浮华”一词有任何的积极含义。
Words like &quot;conservative&quot; require periodic redefinition.
Xiàng“conservative”zhèyàng de cíhuì xūyào dìngqī chóngxīn dìngyì。
像“conservative”这样的词汇需要定期重新定义。
词性
词性。
Speakers declined the part of speech in each sentence.
Yǎnjiǎngzhě gǎibiànle měi yíjù zhōng de cíxìng。
演讲者改变了每一句中的词性。
The word child is of common gender.
child一词是通性的。
&quot;Only&quot; is an exclusive particle.
“Only”是个表示排他性的小品词。
词形变化
cíxíng biànhuà 
morphological changes; inflections
词话这种文学形式要依附于词的发展而发展。
Cíhuà zhèzhǒng wénxué xíngshì yào yīfù yú cí de fāzhǎn ér fāzhǎn。
The development of notes on ci poetry relies on the development of ci poetry.
词曲开始时都是和乐的艺术形式，发展到后来成为独立的文学形式。
Cíqǔ kāishǐ shí dōushì héyuè de yìshù xíngshì，fāzhǎn dào hòulái chéngwéi dúlì de wénxué xíngshì。
Both Ci and Qu were art forms of chords at the beginning. Later they developed into independent literary forms.
词的形态变化。
这本词典部头可真不小。
There are currently over 600 entries in this table.
Zhè zhāng biǎogé lǐ mùqián yǒu liùbǎi duō gè cítiáo。
这张表格里目前有600多个词条。
Normal dictionary entries appear in the top half of each page.
Zhèngguī cídiǎn tiáomù chūxiàn zài měi yè de shàng bàn bù。
正规词典条目出现在每页的上半部。
The word &quot;depression&quot; can cover a lot of territory.
“ Xiāotiáo” zhège cí kěyǐ fùgài hěn dà de fànwéi。
“萧条”这个词可以覆盖很大的范围。
划一这本词典的体例
huàyī zhèběn cídiǎn de tǐlì
standardize the layout of the dictionary
Each and &quot;either&quot; are distributive words.
“each”和“either”是个体词。
&quot;Hat&quot; is a holonym for &quot;brim&quot; and &quot;crown&quot;.
“hat”（màozi）shì“brim（màoyán） hé“crown”（mào dǐng）de zhěngtǐ cí。
“hat”（帽子）是“brim”（帽沿）和“crown”（帽顶）的整体词。
博学鸿词科(按科目)
His eye fell on a misspelled word.
他的目光落在一个拼错的词上。
李清照是宋朝一个擅长写小令的女词人。

Li Qingzhao was a female writer in the Song dynasty who wrote pleasant short lyrics.
This word couldn\'t be put in any category.
该词不能被归为任何一类。

他的这篇报告里都是冗词赘句，听者越来越不耐烦。
Tā de zhèpiān bàogào lǐ dōushì rǒngcí zhuìjù，tīngzhě yuèláiyuè bú nàifán。
His report is full of redundant words and repetitive expressions, the audience are getting impatient.
他词穷理屈，一句话也说不出来。
Tā cíqióng lǐqū，yíjù huà yě shuō bùchūlái。
He was condemned by his own words, and had nothing to say.
刚说了几句，他就没词儿了。

After uttering a few sentences, he got stuck.
词句畅达
作者在词句上下了很大功夫

遣词造句，粹美精当
The two sentences are bound together by a cohesive tie.
Zhè liǎng gè jùzi tōngguò guānliáncí bèi jiéhé zài le yìqǐ。
这两个句子通过关联词被结合在了一起。
The first word of a sentence is always spelled out, never abbreviated.
Yí jù huà de dì-yī gè cí zǒngshì bèi pīnchū，cóngbù suōxiě。
一句话的第一个词总是被拼出，从不缩写。
The test wasn\'t difficult at all, I had to choose the right article for each of the 30 sentences.
考试并不难，我得给三十个句子找出正确的冠词。
这本词话现在已经失传了，真是可惜。
Zhèběn cíhuà xiànzài yǐjing shīchuán le，zhēnshì kěxī。
It is a pity that this novel has been lost to the world.
他在会上的讲话，措词强硬。
Tā zài huì shàng de jiǎnghuà，cuòcí qiángyìng。
His speech at the meeting was strongly worded.
你说话一贯过甚其词。
Nǐ shuōhuà yíguàn guòshèn qící。
You always stretch the truth.
六个月就能编一本词典？ 这简直是在说梦话！
Liù gè yuè jiù néngbiān yìběn cídiǎn? Zhè jiǎnzhí shì zài shuō mènghuà！
To compile a dictionary within 6 months —that\'s just daydreaming!
他词锋一转，我根本反应不过来该说什么。
Tā cífēng yìzhuǎn，wǒ gēnběn fǎnyìng bú guòlái gāi shuō shénme。
After he changed the topic, I really didn\'t know what to say.
A theme is a word with all of the affixes removed.
Cígàn jiùshì qùdiào suǒyǒu cízhuì zhīhòu de cí。
词干就是去掉所有词缀之后的词。
正词法草案
the general spelling of a word
词的通常拼法
Jay tried to work her ideas into the right phrase.

这个词在这篇文章中的词频很高。

cuòcí dédàng 
aptly worded; appropriate wording
如果一篇文章颠来倒去总是那么几个词，人家就不愿看。

This dictionary, despite the care exercised in compiling it, cannot in the nature of things be free from error.

这首词写得很哀艳。
Zhèshǒu cí xiě de hěnāiyàn。
The poem is beautiful, yet sad at the same time.
为了儿子，他只好卑词求情，苦苦哀告。

He had to humble himself for the sake of his son.

Cífēng xīlì shì tā wénzhāng de zuì dà tèdiǎn。
A sharp vigor of style is the major feature of his articles.
爷爷送给我一本词谱，我非常爱惜。
Yéye sònggěi wǒ yìběn cípǔ，wǒ fēicháng àixī。
Grandpa gave me a collection of tunes of ci poems and I treasure it very much.
辛弃疾是我最喜欢的词人。
Xīn Qìjí shì wǒ zuì xǐhuan de círén。
Xinqiji is my favorite writer.
这场官司的词讼费应由原告承担。
Zhèchǎng guānsī de císòngfèi yīng yóu yuángào chéngdān。

这个词在此处的辞格应为宾格。

This word in this position is in the objective case.
他的行文措词恰当，有理有据。
Tā de xíngwén cuòcí qiàdāng，yǒulǐ yǒujù。
His article is written with appropriate wording and adequate reasoning and proofs.
他写文章时喜欢雕砌词藻。
Tā xiě wénzhāng shí xǐhuan diāoqì cízǎo。
He likes to use an ornate style when writing.
那个演员突然忘词儿了，急得满脸飞红。

The actor blushed as he forgot his lines.
不同的艺术家在唱同样的段子时，鼓词会有很大不同。
Bùtóng de yìshùjiā zài chàng tóngyàng de duànzi shí，gǔcí huì yǒu hěndà bùtóng。
Lyrics vary greatly if the same piece is sung by different artists.
现经牛津大学出版社惠允，我社将出版译本牛津词典。
Xiàn jīng Niújīndàxué chūbǎnshè huìyǔn，wǒ shè jiāng chūbǎn yìběn niújīn cídiǎn。
Thanks to the permission of Oxford University Press, our press will publish the translated version of the Oxford Dictionary.
开幕词的写作要点是：短小简洁，表达祝福和希望。
Kāimùcí de xiězuò yàodiǎn shì：duǎnxiǎo jiǎnjié，biǎodá zhùfú hé xīwàng。
The key points for writing an opening speech are: short and clear, express blessings and hopes.
炼狱是个宗教词汇，是洗脱人罪过的地方。
Liànyù shì gè zōngjiào cíhuì，shì xǐtuō rén zuìguò de dìfāng。
Purgatory is a religious word which is a place for people to wash away their sins.
搜索引擎是按照关键词来排检相关信息的网络技术。
Sōusuǒ yǐnqíng shì ànzhào guānjiàncí lái páijiǎn xiāngguān xìnxī de wǎngluò jìshù。
A search engine is an internet technology which arranges and searches for related information according to key words.
这篇文章通篇都是溢美之词。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng tōngpiān dōushì yìměi zhī cí。
The whole article is filled with undeserved words of praise.

This man speaks crudely, and doesn\'t look like a decent man.
这篇散文的文词非常华美，我很喜欢。

I like this article vey much because of its rich diction.

Zhège cí de jiěshì xiǎozhù lǐ xiě de qīngqīngchuchǔ。
The meaning of this word is clearly explained in the notes.
你怎么能只听他的一面之词就批评我呢。

How can you criticize me after hearing his one-sided statement?

The ci composed by the graceful and restrained group members has the beauty of blandness in all the text.

保守某事的秘密/将某事保密
behind the scenes
秘密地
in secrecy
on the sly
[inf] 秘密地
to tell sb sth in the strictest confidence
极秘密地将某事告诉某人
to be sworn to secrecy/silence
发誓保守秘密/保持沉默
That tree house used to be the place where us girls exchanged confidences.
那个树屋曾是我们几个女孩诉说秘密的地方。
This secret is of great consequence and it should be strictly confidential.
这个秘密事关重大，必须严格保密。
She told my secret to Tim underbreath.
她低语把我的秘密告诉了蒂姆。
The lawyer must keep the secret of his clients.
律师必须替委托人保守秘密。
The company secretly sells military equipment to foreign nations.
这家公司向国外秘密销售军火。
Tom suspects Jenny told his secrets to her friend.
汤姆怀疑珍妮把他的秘密告诉了她的朋友。
I should put you in the know, not keep you in the dark.
Wǒ yīnggāi ràng nǐ zhīdào，érbúshì duì nǐ bǎoshǒu mìmì。
我应该让你知道，而不是对你保守秘密。
I didn\'t want to understand his deep dark secret.
Wǒ bùxiǎng liǎojiě tā lìngrénfèijiě de mìmì。
我不想了解他令人费解的秘密。
The wedding is a private affair, with only the bride, groom and their families there.
Hūnlǐ bàn de hěn mìmì，zàichǎng de zhǐyǒu xīnniáng、xīnláng hé tāmen de jiārén。
婚礼办得很秘密，在场的只有新娘、新郎和他们的家人。
This website allows users to bare all of their secrets anonymously.
Zhège wǎngzhàn yǔnxǔ yònghù nìmíng gōngkāi tāmen de suǒyǒu mìmì。
这个网站允许用户匿名公开他们的所有秘密。
She was given clearance to see secret information.
Tā bèi pīzhǔn liúlǎn mìmì xìnxī。
她被批准浏览秘密信息。
He is going to confide the secrets of his heart to us.
Tā jiāng xiàng wǒmen tǔlù tā xīnlǐ de mìmì。
他将向我们吐露他心里的秘密。
Please do not share my confidences to you with others.
Qǐng bié bǎ wǒ gēn nǐ de mìmì gēn biérén fēnxiǎng。
请别把我跟你的秘密跟别人分享。
He had little doubt that they were confidential informants of the police.
Tāmen shì jǐngfāng de mìmì xiànrén，tā duì cǐ háobù huáiyí。
他们是警方的秘密线人，他对此毫不怀疑。
Eve was the girl who lived in the convent and knew all the nuns\' secrets.
Yīfū shì zhùzài xiūdàohuì de nǚhái，tā zhīdào suǒyǒu nàxiē xiūnǚ de mìmì。
伊夫是住在修道会的女孩，她知道所有那些修女的秘密。
My wife uncovered the man\'s secret through her friend\'s husband.
Wǒ de qīzǐ tōngguò tā péngyou de zhàngfu fāxiànle zhège nánrén de mìmì。
我的妻子通过她朋友的丈夫发现了这个男人的秘密。
He is well known for his reports on underground crime and gangs.
Tā yīnwèi guānyú bàodào mìmì de fànzuì hé bāngpài ér chūmíng。
他因为关于报道秘密的犯罪和帮派而出名。
The whole organisation went underground overnight.
Zhěnggè zǔzhī tōngxiāo mìmì gōngzuò。
整个组织通宵秘密工作。
America\'s jet project was initiated under the tightest possible secrecy.
Měiguó de pēnqìshìfēijī xiàngmù shì zài jí jìn kěnéng mìmì de qíngkuàng xià qǐdòng de。
美国的喷气式飞机项目是在极尽可能秘密地情况下启动的。
Her face became full of flush after her secret was revealed.
Tā de mìmì bèi xièlòu zhīhòu，dùnshí miànhóng\'ěrchì。
她的秘密被泄露之后，顿时面红耳赤。
How did you get this secret information?
Nǐ shì rúhé dédào zhège mìmì xiāoxi de？
你是如何得到这个秘密消息的？
The choices，which affect your lives，will not be made behind closed doors or in secret huddles.
Bú yào mìmì de zuòchū yǐngxiǎng nǐ shēnghuó de xuǎnzé。
不要秘密地做出影响你生活的选择。
I did n\'t want to blurt out my secret to him.
Wǒ bù xiǎng xiàng tā tūrán shuōchū wǒ de mìmì。
我不想向他突然说出我的秘密。
Our relationship is bound with secrets and lies.
Wǒmen de guānxi shì kào mìmì hé huǎngyán lái wéixì de。
我们的关系是靠秘密和谎言来维系的。
I can\'t recall any of us having a close enough friend to confide in.
Wǒ jì bùqǐ wǒmen shuí céng yǒuguò kěyǐ tòulù mìmì de mìyǒu。
我记不起我们谁曾有过可以透露秘密的密友。
The tunnels had now been connected up, and the workmen used the subway constantly as a private short cut.
Suìdào yǐjīng bèi liánjiē qǐlái，gōngrénmen chángcháng shǐyòng dìtiě zuòwéi mìmì jiéjìng。
隧道已经被连接起来，工人们常常使用地铁作为秘密捷径。
Such discoveries never remain secret for long，and from beyond the laboratory interested parties are gathering in force.
Zhèyàng de fāxiàn búhuì chángjiǔ de chéngwéi mìmì，bùjǐnjǐn shì zài shíyànshì，yuèláiyuè duō de rén kāishǐ duì zhèxiē chǎnshēngle xìngqù。
这样的发现不会长久地成为秘密，不仅仅是在实验室，越来越多的人开始对这些产生了兴趣。
I can\'t keep this secret anymore and I just need to get it off my chest.
Wǒ bùnéng zài bǎoshǒu zhège mìmì le，wǒ xūyào bǎ wǒ Xīnli de fánnǎo qīngtǔ chūlái。
我不能再保守这个秘密了，我需要把我心里的烦恼倾吐出来。
Anyway，the number plate gives the game away.
Bùguǎn zěnyàng，chēhàopái xièlòule mìmì。
不管怎样，车号牌泄露了秘密。
The bastard knew by now that he had given the game away.
Dào rújīn，nàge huàidàn cái zhīdào tā de mìmì yǐjīng bèi xièlòu le。
到如今，那个坏蛋才知道他的秘密已经被泄露了。
Secret information needs to be guarded from the public.
Mìmì xìnxī xūyào bǎohù bú ràng dàzhòng zhīdào。
秘密信息需要保护不让大众知道。
Your secret will always be in safe hands.
Nǐ de mìmì jiāng huì yǒngyuǎn dōu bú bèi xièlòu。
你的秘密将会永远都不被泄露。

He promised to keep her plans in the dark.
Tā dāying wèi tā de jìhuà bǎoshǒu mìmì。
他答应为她的计划保守秘密。

I told her the secret on pain of death.
Wǒ màosǐ gàosu tā zhège mìmì。
我冒死告诉她这个秘密。
The secret of his success rested with his famous elephants.
Tā chénggōng de mìmì zàiyú tā nà zhī zhùmíng de dàxiàng。

虽然他们没有泄露秘密，但校长已经知道了。
His story takes the lid off the secret practices of politicians.
Tā de gùshi jiēlùle zhèngkèmen de mìmì xíngjìng。
他的故事揭露了政客们的秘密行径。
They always met under the rose, as they were talking about something illegal.
Tāmen jīngcháng mìmi jiànmiàn，hǎoxiàng zài tánlùn fēifǎ de shìqing。
他们经常秘密见面，好像在谈论非法的事情。
The combination to the safe was a secret.
Nàgè bǎoxiǎnguì de mìmǎ shì gè mìmì。

我到死都不会说出这个秘密的。

Tā tuō kǒu bǎ mìmì shuō chūlái le。

Rènhé yǒuxiào fǎnduì jíquán zhǔyì tǒngzhì de zǔzhī bìxū shì mìmì de，fēnsàn chéng gè gè dānyuán de。
任何有效反对极权主义统治的组织必须是秘密的，分散成各个单元的。
Secret activities offer presidents the alluring but often illusory promise that they can achieve foreign policy goals without the bothersome debate and open decision that are staples of democracy.
Mìmì de xíngdòng gěi zǒngtǒng tígōngle mírén dàn wǎngwǎng xūhuàn de yǔnnuò —— tāmen kěyǐ zài méiyǒu fánnǎo zhēnglùn hé gōngkāi juédìng děng mínzhǔ chéngfèn de qíngkuàng xià biàn nénggòu dádào wàijiāo zhèngcè de mùdì。
秘密的行动给总统提供了迷人但往往虚幻的允诺——他们可以在没有烦恼争论和公开决定等民主成分的情况下便能够达到外交政策的目的。
Many private deals were made backstage at the convention.

大会上，很多秘密交易都是在幕后完成的。

秘而不宣
mì\'érbùxuān
keep sth. secret; not let anyone in on a secret
She revels in the secrecy of her trade.
Tā xǐhuan duì tā de shǒuyì mì\'érbùxuān。
她喜欢对她的手艺秘而不宣。

She is lecturing others about the secrets of keeping a good figure.

这是他珍藏的秘籍，从不轻易给别人看的。

It\'s not right to swear at people.
这个人蔫不唧的，怎么会骂人吵架呢？
Zhègerén niānbùjī de，zěnme huì màrén chǎojià ne？
He is sluggish, how can he have called people names and quarreled with them?
他经常骂人不带脏字儿。
Tā jīngcháng mà rén bú dài zāngzìr。
He usually calls other\'s name without saying  dirty words.
这样铺张浪费，没有一个人不骂。
Zhèyàngpūzhānglàngfèi，méiyǒu yígèrén bú mà。
Such extravagance is an object of general condemnation.
为世人所唾骂
wéi shìrén suǒ tuòmà 
be the opprobrium of the community
人们都骂他臭狗屎，他也不去争辩。
Rénmen dōu mà tā chòugǒushǐ，tā yě bùqù zhēngbiàn。
People speak very low of him, but he never challenges them.
她被人当街骂作贱物，太可怜了。
Tā bèi rén dāngjiē màzuò jiànwù，tài kělián le。
She was called a slut in the street; what a pitiful woman.
他离叛了他的政党并将机密泄露，受到世人的唾骂。
Tā lípàn le tā de zhèngdǎng bìng jiāng jīmì xièlòu，shòudào shìrén de tuòmà。
He betrayed and left his party and leaked its secrets, which made him reviled by the people.
秦桧是宋代著名的佞臣，受尽后人的唾骂。
Qín Huì shì Sòngdài zhùmíng de nìngchén，shòujìn hòurén de tuòmà。
Qinhui was a notorious sycophantic official in the Song dynasty, and was spurned by later generations.
这个人的名声真是臭不可闻，人们对他骂声不断。
Zhègerén de míngshēng zhēnshì chòubùkěwén，rénmen duì tā màshēng búduàn。
This man has a bad reputation. People continually fling curses at him.
教授被人当众辱骂，简直是斯文扫地。
Jiàoshòu bèi rén dāngzhòng rǔmà，jiǎnzhí shì sīwén sǎodì。
The professor was abused in public, his scholarly dignity completely disgraced.
不知道门外的两个人为什么吵骂起来了。
Bùzhīdào ménwài de liǎnggèrén wèishénme chǎomà qǐlái le。
I don\'t know why the two people outside the door are quarreling.
她气得咒骂起来：这么缺德害人，将来让你绝门！
Tā qì de zhòumà qǐlái：zhème quēdé hàirén，jiānglái ràng nǐ juémén！
She was very angry and began to curse: you are so wicked that you will have no children!
敌人已经在城下骂阵了，我们却还是按兵不动。
Dírén yǐjing zài chéng xià màzhèn le，wǒmen què háishi ànbīng búdòng。
The enemies are provoking us to battle with a stream of abuse, but we still take no action.
骂他混账一点也不亏，他太气人了。
Mà tā hùnzhàng yìdiǎn yě bùkuī，tā tài qìrén le。
It\'s not excessive to call him a bastard. He is such a nuisance!
她大骂他移情别恋，喜欢上别的女人。
Tā dàmà tā yíqíng biéliàn，xǐhuanshàng bié de nǚrén。
She cursed him for shifting his love to another woman.
麦穰子(骂人的话)。
棺材瓤子(骂人的话)。
不兴打人骂人。
有理讲理，骂人可不行
你无缘无故骂人家，人家要找你评理，那是当然的事
把手洗干净◇嘴干净点儿，别骂人
好端端的，怎么骂起人来了。
遭世人唾骂。
strong language
She mouthed a swear word.
Tā shuōle yí jù màrén de huà。
她说了一句骂人的话。
Expletives were deleted.
Zhòumà rén de huà bèi shānchú le。
咒骂人的话被删除了。
to put a curse on someone
咒骂某人
to curse sb for sth/for doing sth
因某事/做某事而咒骂某人
to scream at sb
大骂某人
He cursed his friend under his breath for even convincing him to go.
Tā shènzhì wèile tā de péngyou quàn tā zǒu，jiù dīshēng zhòumà biérén。
他甚至为了他的朋友劝他走，就低声咒骂别人。
to hail curses on someone
把某人乱骂一通
Mitch was flying into a rage and cursed everyone on his team.
Mǐqí tūrán shēng le qì，màle duìli měi yí gè rén。
米奇突然生了气，骂了队里每一个人。
I didn\'t used to curse or swear at all.
Wǒ cónglái bú màmà liěliě，yě bù zǔzhòu biérén。
我从来不骂骂咧咧，也不诅咒别人。
Furious at his deceit, she let fly at him with a stream of abuse.
他欺骗人, 气得她把他大骂了一顿。
骂不绝口
mà bù juékǒu
heap endless abuse upon; pour out unceasing abuse
continuously insult
挨骂
áimà 
get a scolding; get a dressing-down
他挨了骂不算，还挨了一顿打。
Tā ái le mà búsuàn，hái ái le yídùn dǎ。
On top of a tongue-lashing, he got a beating as well.
百般咒骂
bǎibān zhòumà 
abuse in every possible way; heap abuse on
被臭骂了一顿
bèi chòumà le yídùn 
get a tongue-lashing; get a dressing down
对骂
duì mà
call each other names
恶骂
èmà
vicious abuse
疯狂咒骂
fēngkuáng zhòumà
frenzied vilification
当众诟骂
dāngzhònggòumà
vilify sb. in public
海骂
hǎi mà
shout at no one in particular
骂不还口
mà bùhuánkǒu 
not retort when sworn at
他在一片叫骂声中跑掉了。
Tā zài yípiàn jiàomàshēng zhōng pǎodiào le。
He ran off amid shouts of cursing.
连打带骂
liándǎdàimà 
beating and cursing
他骂我是笨蛋。
Tā mà wǒ shì bèndàn。 
He called me an idiot.
留下千古骂名
liúxià qiānɡǔ màmínɡ 
earn oneself eternal infamy
谩骂决不是战斗。
Mànmà jué búshì zhàndòu。
To hurl abuse is no way to fight.
不要捧杀，也不要骂杀。
Búyào pěngshā，yě búyào màshā。
Do not destroy by either excessive praise or condemnation.
平白挨一顿骂
píngbái ái yídùn mà
get a scolding for no reason at all
泼妇骂街
pōfù màjiē
like a shrew shouting abuse in the street
大家骂他不公平，欺软怕硬。
Dàjiā mà tā bùgōngpíng，qīruǎnpàyìng。
Everybody lashed out at his unfairness, calling him a cowardly bully.
姐姐老是骂她是笨货，连毛衣都不会织。
Jiějie lǎoshì mà tā shì bènhuò，lián máoyī dōu búhuì zhī。
Her elder sister always calls her names, and scolds her for not even being able to knit sweaters.
他被师傅臭骂了一顿，保证再也不去赌场了。
Tā bèi shīfu chòumà le yídùn，bǎozhèngzài yě búqù dǔchǎng le。
He was blamed by his teacher and assured him that he won\'t go to gambling casino again.
这个老师特别刻薄，总骂学生是蠢物。
Zhège lǎoshī tèbié kèbó，zǒng mà xuésheng shì chǔnwù。
This teacher is so acrid, he always call his students fools.
还没等我说话，他兜头就是一顿臭骂。
Hái méi děng wǒ shuōhuà，tā dōutóu jiùshì yídùn chòumà。
He scolded me angrily face to face before I could finish my words.
他本是去劝解她的，没想到竟遭到了毒骂。
Tā běn shì qù quànjiě tā de，méi xiǎng dào jìng zāodào le dúmà。
He had wanted to persuade her, but was cursed by her instead.
面对大家的恶声咒骂，他一声不吭。
Miànduì dàjiā de èshēng zhòumà，tā yìshēngbùkēng。
He didn\'t utter a single word, even though facing abuse from others.
她生气的时候竟然能骂出那么恶俗的话来。
Tā shēngqì de shíhou jìngrán néng mà chū nàme èsú de huà lái。
Unexpectedly, she used so many vulgar words when she was angry.
他惯于对对手漫骂攻讦。
Tā guànyú duì duìshǒu mànmà gōngjié.
He often wildly abuses his opponents and exposes their past misdeeds.
群众声声詈骂也难解对这个贪官的心头之恨。
Qúnzhòng shēngshēng lìmà yě nán jiěduì zhège tānguān de xīntóu zhī hèn。
Curses are not enough to vent the anger of the masses towards corrupt officials.
他脸厚不害臊，你随便骂。
Tā liǎnhòu bú hàisào，nǐ suíbiàn mà。
He is thick-skinned, and unabashed to whatever you may say.
他被领导搂头盖脸地臭骂了一通。
Tā bèi lǐngdǎo lǒutóu gàiliǎn de chòumà le yí tòng。
He got a good scolding from the leader.
他每次喝醉后，就不停地骂大街。
Tā měi cì hēzuì hòu，jiù bùtíng de màdàjiē。
He keeps shouting abuse in the street every time he is drunk.
他俩关系不太好，经常骂架。
Tā liǎ guānxì bú tài hǎo，jīngcháng màjià。
They do not get along well with each other, and often quarrel.
那个泼妇站在门口，不停地嫚骂。
Nàge pōfù zhànzài ménkǒu，bùtíng de mànmà。
The shrew stands at the door and keeps shouting abuse.
他昨天为了工作大骂了我一通。
Tā zuótiān wèi le gōngzuò dàmà le wǒ yí tòng。
He gave me a scolding out of work yesterday.
他骂完小明转而又在夸他这件事情办得好。
Tā mà wán Xiǎo Míng zhuǎn éryòu zài kuā tā zhèjiàn shìqing bàn de hǎo。
After criticising Xiaoming, he changed his attitude and began to praise Xiaoming for doing a good job in this matter.

He was told off for not doing his homework.
他一路上骂骂咧咧，也不知是冲谁。

The children were reprimanded for abusing the substitute teacher.

She branded Ruby a snotty little cow.
Tā rǔmà Lābǐ shì yìtóu xiàjiàn de xiǎo mǔniú。

He cursed loudly as he fell knee-deep into the mud and water.
Dāng tā diēluò jìn qíxī de níshuǐ lǐ de shíhou，dàshēng zhòumà。

I raved at them, swore at them, gesticulated at them.

They hurled insults and called each other names.
Tāmen hùxiāng mànmà。

He shouted and cursed at her.
Tā jiàohǎnzhe bìng zhòumà tā。
他叫喊着并咒骂她。
She would greet him with a stream of good-natured abuse.
Tā huì yòng yí chuàn shànyì de dǎmà lái duìdài tā。
她会用一串善意的打骂来对待他。
I have asked you repeatedly not to curse in my presence.

Tā màle jǐjù sú de bùkānrù\'ěr de huà。

他正在咒骂那个警察。

这名出租车司机觉得他没有得到足够多的小费，因此对乘客开骂。
Whether he praised or cursed me depended on his temper at the time.
Tā shì kuā wǒ háishì mà wǒ qǔjuéyú tā dāngshí de xīnqíng。
他是夸我还是骂我取决于他当时的心情。
He swore as the ball rimmed the cup and rolled away.

Tā shòudàole bàomín de zhòumà。
他受到了暴民的咒骂。

That person looks a lot like the escaped criminal wanted by the police.
公安人员在缉捕逃犯。
Gōng\'ān rényuán zài jībǔ táofàn。
The police are pursuing the escaped prisoner.
抢劫犯在慌乱逃窜时把抢来的珠宝遗撒一地。
Qiǎngjiéfàn zài huāngluàn táocuàn shí bǎ qiǎnglái de zhūbǎo yísǎ yí dì。
Stolen jewels littered the floor when the robbers fled in a hurry.
警察正在搜索逃犯呢。
Jǐngchá zhèngzài sōusuǒ táofàn ne.
The police are hunting down the escaped convict.
这次我看他是在劫难逃。
Zhècì wǒ kàn tā shì zàijiénántáo。
This time I see him there will be no escape.
多亏了邻人相救，他才能在火灾中逃生。
Duōkuī le línrén xiāngjiù，tā cáinéng zài huǒzāi zhōng táoshēng。
It was due to the help of his neighbours that he managed to survive the fire.
这个逃犯在外流窜多年，最近突然潜回家乡了。
Zhège táofàn zài wài liúcuàn duōnián，zuìjìn tūrán qiánhuí jiāxiāng le。
After fleeing here and there for many years, the escaped criminal recently suddenly fled back to his hometown.
在机场，一名逃犯当场被捕。
Zài jīchǎng，yì míng táofàn dāngchǎng bèibǔ。
A criminal was arrested on the spot at the airport.
警察在车站戒严，搜捕逃犯。
Jǐngchá zài chēzhàn jièyán，sōubǔ táofàn。
The police cordoned off the railway station to search for the escape prisoner.
他惯于在这样的时候做逃兵。
Tā guànyú zài zhèyàng de shíhou zuò táobīng。
He is used to being a deserting soldier under this kind of situation.
他在这次火灾中死里逃生，但是体表被大面积烧伤。
Tā zài zhècì huǒzāi zhōng sǐlǐ táoshēng，dànshì tǐbiǎo bèi dàmiànjī shāoshāng。
He had a narrow escape from the fire, but the surface of his skin was severely burned.
警方正在这片树林查缉一名逃犯。
Jǐngfāng zhèngzài zhèpiàn shùlín chájī yìmíng táofàn。
The police are searching the woods for an escaped criminal.
现在天色已晚，犯罪分子很有可能借机潜逃。
Xiànzài tiānsè yǐ wǎn，fànzuìfènzǐ hěnyǒu kěnéng jièjī qiántáo。
It is getting dark now, and the criminals may take the chance to run away.
查缉在逃凶犯。

The police alerted the public of a butcher on the loose.

警察向公众发出警告，有一名凶残的杀手在逃。
Thieves stole cash and jewellery from the store before escaping.

小偷们在逃跑前从商店里偷走了现金和珠宝。
She cut across the waste ground even though she knew that the murderer was at large there.
Tā chāojìnlù chuānguò lājīchǎng，jíshǐ tā zhīdào nàlǐ yǒu xiōngshǒu zàitáo。
她抄近路穿过垃圾场，即使她知道那里有凶手在逃。
The government has categorized more than 320, 000 foreigners as alien absconders.
Zhèngfǔ yǐjīng jiāng chāoguò sānwàn èrqiān de wàiguórén rèndìng wéi zàitáo yímín。
政府已经将超过320,000的外国人认定为在逃移民.
A convict still at large.
Yìmíng zuìfàn yīrán zài táo。
一名罪犯依然在逃。
I knew one of the kids was trying to escape all the time.
Wǒ zhīdào yǒu gè háizi yìzhí zài shìtú táopǎo。
我知道有个孩子一直在试图逃跑。
He was seen making his getaway after he had just pulled the robbery.
Yǒu rén kàndào tā qiǎngjié wán hòu zài duó lù ér táo。
有人看到他抢劫完后在夺路而逃。
The posse beat the countryside for the fugitive.
一队警察在乡间搜捕逃犯。
He played the fox to stay home from school.
Tā shuǎhuátóu，táoxué dāizài jiālǐ。
他耍滑头，逃学呆在家里。
Their six accomplices escaped under the cover of fire.

他们的旅游网站新开设了一个“三峡揽胜”专区，专门介绍三峡旅游信息。
Tāmen de lǚyóu wǎngzhàn xīn kāishè le yígè“sānxiá lǎnshèng”zhuānqū，zhuānmén jièshào sānxiá lǚyóu xìnxī。
On their tour website, they have a new area featuring information on their sightseeing tours to the Three Gorges.
跟我一起旅游的都是挺不错的伴儿。
Gēn wǒ yìqǐ lǚyóu de dōushì tǐng búcuò de bànr。
My fellow tourists were all good companions.

lǚyóu biànlǎn

lǚyóu jìjié

Qù HuángShān lǚyóu de shì méixì le。

lǚyóu rè

lǚyóu shèngjì

小明一再请求，妈妈终于恩准他暑假可以去海边旅游。

Wǒ yào lìyòng gōngxiū chūguó lǚyóu。

Wǒmen yào lìyòng wǔyī chángjià qù jìngwài lǚyóu。
We will travel abroad during the May Day holiday.
俗话说“靠山吃山，靠水吃水”，于是他就想出了靠沙吃沙的点子，开发出了沙漠探险的特色旅游项目。
Súhuà shuō“kàoshān chīshān，kàoshuǐ chīshuǐ”，yúshì tā jiù xiǎngchū le kàoshā chīshā de diǎnzi，kāifā chū le shāmò tànxiǎn de tèsè lǚyóu xiàng mù。
As a popular saying goes: &quot;Those living on a mountain live off the mountain, those living near the water live off the water.&quot; Therefore he had the idea of making use of the sand and developed a special tourism item of desert exploration.
因为既没钱又没时间，这次的旅游计划成了他可望不可及的事。
Yīnwéi jì méi qián yòu méi shíjiān，zhè cì de lǚyóu jìhuà chéng le tā kěwàng bùkějí de shì。
Having neither money nor time, he cannot take the journey.
请问你想选择哪条旅游热线？

xiānghù zuòyòng
interaction; interplay

xiānghù guānxì

xiānghù àimù
adore each other

cùjìn xiānghù lǐjiě

Dàxuě fēng le qiánxíng de dàolù，wǒmen zài chēzi lǐ xiānghù yīwēi zhe qǔnuǎn。
The heavy snow blocked the way, we nestled together for warmth in the car
他们唐棣常相互帮助，感情笃深。
Tāmen tánglì cháng xiānghù bāngzhù，gǎnqíng dǔshēn。
They are brothers. They always help each other and have a deep affection for each other.
他俩在大街上相互推搡，打了起来。
Tā liǎ zài dàjiē shàng xiānghù tuīsǎng，dǎ le qǐlái。
They pushed and jostled each other in the street, which then turned into a fight.
山谷险峭，请大家相互照应，小心攀登。
Shāngǔ xiǎnqiào，qǐng dàjiā xiānghù zhàoyìng，xiǎoxīn pāndēng。
The valley is  dangerously steep, please look after each other and be careful.
老两口相互搀着散步。
Lǎoliǎngkǒu xiānghùchānzhe sànbù。
The couple go walking arm in arm to support each other.
他们善于相互配合。
Tāmen shànyú xiānghùpèihé.
They are good at cooperating with each other.
在这个问题上，希望大家能相互理解。
Zài zhège wèntí shàng，xīwàng dàjiā néng xiānghù lǐjiě。
As regards this question, hopefully everyone will understand each other.
工作要互相支持，不要互相拆台。
Gōngzuò yào hùxiāng zhīchí，búyào hùxiāng chāitái。
We should help and not hinder each other in our work.
文人相轻很可能源自于文人之间的互相嫉妒。
Wénrén xiāngqīng hěn kěnéng yuánzìyú wénrén zhījiān de hùxiāng jídù。
The fact that most men of letters despise each other may result from their jealousy.
互相包庇
hùxiāng bāobì 
shield each other
互相标榜
hùxiāng biāobǎng 
boost each other; exchange excessive praise
政府机构互相扯皮
zhèngfǔ jīgòu hùxiāng chěpí 
government organizations pass the buck to each other

Liǎngrén chuàntōngyíqì，hùxiāngbāobì。
Acting in collaboration, the two of them shielded each other.
互相吹捧
hùxiāng chuīpěng 
flatter each other
互相砥砺
hùxiāng dǐlì 
encourage each other
军阀互相争夺地盘。
Jūnfá hùxiāng zhēngduó dìpán。
The warlords competed for spheres of influence.
伤员们互相扶持着练习走路。
Shāngyuánmen hùxiāng fúchí zhe liànxí zǒulù。
Leaning on each other for support, the wounded men practised walking.
夫妻间有互相扶养的义务。
Fūqī jiān yǒu hùxiāng fúyǎng de yìwù。
Husband and wife have the duty to support and assist each other.
这两点是互相联系的，不能割裂。
Zhè liǎng diǎn shì hùxiāng liánxì de，bùnéng gēliè。
The two points are related and cannot be taken separately.
数学和天文学是互相关联的科学。
Shùxué hé tiānwénxué shì hùxiāngguānlián de kēxué。
Mathematics and astronomy are cognate sciences.

hùxiānghūyìng

hùxiāngyīcún

hùxiāngpáichì

hùxiāngpèihé

hùxiānglìyòng

互相掣肘
hùxiāngchèzhǒu

互相勾结
hùxiānggōujié

hùxiāngjiāoxīn

Hùxiāng mòqì

互相殴打
hùxiāngōudǎ
come to blows; exchange blows

Tóngzhǒng diànhè hùxiāngpáichì。

同行们互相排轧。
Tónghángmen hùxiāngpáizhá。

互相泼水
hùxiāngpō shuǐ

hùxiāngqiānchè

Kèrénmen hùxiāngqiān ràng le yíxià，ránhòu luò le zuò。

互相倾轧
hùxiāng qīngyà

hùxiāng xuéxí，qǔchángbǔduǎn

hùxiāng quànmiǎn

hùxiāngyībàng

hùxiāngzūnzhòng

你们不要互相辩难了，这样解决不了问题。
Nǐmen búyào hùxiāng biànnán le，zhèyàng jiějuébùliǎo wèntí。
Don’t make taunting retorts to each other, as it can not help solve the problem.
我们不应该互相剥难，齐心协力才能解决问题。
Wǒmen bùyīnggāi hùxiāng bōnàn，qíxīnxiélì cáinéng jiějué wèntí。
We should not make things difficult for each other, as the problem can only be solved when we unite.
他们互相调侃嘲谑，顾不上搭理其他人。
Tāmen hùxiāng tiáokǎn cháoxuè，gùbúshàng dālǐ qítā rén。
They continued their banter, totally negelecting others.
他们互相丑诋，最后竟然动起手来。
Tāmen hùxiāng chǒudǐ，zuìhòu jìngrán dòngqǐshǒulái。
Verbal slander finally progressed to a fight between two of them.
两个村子互相传经送宝，都得到了更好的发展。

咱们东邻西舍应该互相帮助。
zánmen dōnglín xīshě yīnggāi hùxiāng bāngzhù。
We neighbors should help each other.
我们不要互相怪怨，想想下一步怎么办才是正理。
Wǒmen búyào hùxiāng guàiyuàn，xiǎngxiǎng xiàyíbùzěnme bàn cái shì zhènglǐ。

当两辆汽车会车时，司机要互相礼让通行。

加之互相有共同爱好，朋友们更乐意交流。

riverbed

The man charged with murder popped a valium to calm his nerves.

The old hunter is good at trapping foxes.
这个老猎人很善于设陷阱捉狐狸。
A fox has vibrissae on its muzzle and above its eyes.
狐狸的口鼻和眼睛上方都长有触须。
Someone want to keep a wirehair as a pet.
有人想养硬毛狐狸做宠物。
The wolfhounds lost the scent of the fox.
这些猎犬闻不到狐狸的踪迹了。
The brush of the fox may be removed and given as a gift.
Húli de cūdà wěiba huòxǔ kěyǐ jiǎn xiàlái zuòwéi lǐwù sòng rén。
狐狸的粗大尾巴或许可以剪下来作为礼物送人。
The men will bait their dogs after the fox.
Zhèxiē rén huì ràng tāmen de gǒu zhuīgǎn húli。
这些人会让他们的狗追赶狐狸。
I can only imagine the crew he hangs out with.
Wǒ zhǐnéng xiǎngxiàng chū gēn tā yìqǐ wán de húqúngǒudǎng。
我只能想象出跟他一起玩的狐群狗党。
The foxes should be cubbing again soon.

这些狐狸应该快生幼仔了。
It would be wrong to think that foxes are a nuisance everywhere.
Rènwéi húli dào Nǎlǐ dōushì tǎoyàn dòngwù de xiǎngfǎ shì cuòwù de。
认为狐狸到哪里都是讨厌动物的想法是错误的。
It\'s claimed that the fox is a predator, killing lambs and free range chickens and must be controlled.
Jùshuō húli shì yì zhǒng ròushí dòngwù，huì bǔshā yánggāo hé zìyóu fàngmùchǎng de jī，suǒyǐ bìxū yào kòngzhì。
据说狐狸是一种肉食动物，会捕杀羊羔和自由放牧场的鸡，所以必须要控制。
A fox was seen running through the forest.
Rénmen kànjiàn yì zhī húli pǎoguò sēnlín。
人们看见一只狐狸跑过森林。
He was known to be a fox by the locals.
Dāngdìrén dōu chēng tā wéi jiǎohuá de húli。
当地人都称他为狡猾的狐狸。
The fox had high value for settlers in cold areas.
Húpí duìyú jūzhù zài hánlěng dìqū de rénmen fēicháng yǒuyòng。
狐皮对于居住在寒冷地区的人们非常有用。
The fox\'s tail finished in red.
Zhè zhī húli de wěiba mòduān shì hóngsè de。
这只狐狸的尾巴末端是红色的。

不要把他们留在外面，否则狐狸们会获得空前的机会。
He hurled a stone at the fox.
Tā xiàng húli zhìle yí kuài shítou。
他向狐狸掷了一块石头。
Three foxes were saved from being savagely ripped apart.
Sān zhī húli miǎnchúle bèi sīliè de cánrěn mìngyùn。

The fox was flushed from its cover.

The men trap foxes.

这些人用陷阱抓狐狸。

Flying foxes are extremely prolific.

méiyǒu yìsīyìháo de chābié

sīháo bùshuǎnɡ

毫无疑问
háo wú yí wèn 
doubtless; without a doubt; without question
毫无疑问。
I\'ve no doubt but that he\'ll come.
毫无疑问他是会来的。
That\'s for sure!
那是毫无疑问的！

毫无疑问，我会去的。

毫无疑问，他肯定会帮我们的。

beyond doubt
毫无疑问地
without {or} beyond a shadow of (a) doubt
that\'s for sure

completely worthless
他在任职期间毫无建树。
Tā zài rènzhí qījiān háo wú jiànshù。
He did nothing noteworthy during his tenure.
他为人谦逊，毫无骄矜之态。
Tā wéirén qiānxùn，háo wú jiāojīn zhī tài。
He is modest, and never puts on airs.
这篇文章语言质朴，毫无矫饰。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngyǔyán zhìpǔ，háo wú jiǎoshì。
This article is written in a simple style, free from any kind of affectation.
谈判毫无进展。
Tánpàn háo wú jìnzhǎn。
The talks have made no headway.
毫无所惧
háo wú suǒ jù
not cowed in the least; fearless
他滔滔不绝地讲，好像毫无倦意。
Tā tāotāobùjué de jiǎng，hǎo xiàng háo wú juànyì。
He talked on and on, apparently not feeling in the least tired.
毫无愧色
háo wú kuìsè
look unashamed (or unabashed)
文笔错杂，毫无伦次。
Wénbǐ cuòzá，háo wú lúncì。
The writing is tangled, utterly lacking in coherence.
毫无生气
háo wú shēngqì
lethargic
他继续胡作非为，毫无收敛。
Tā jìxù húzuò fēiwéi，háo wú shōuliǎn。
Unrelentingly he pursued his course of evil.
两者毫无相同之处。
Liǎngzhě háowú xiāngtóngzhīchù。
The two have nothing in common.
他至今毫无消息。
Tā zhìjīn háo wú xiāoxi。
We haven\'t had any news of him yet.
毫无逊色
háo wú xùnsè
be by no means inferior
毫无依据
háo wú yījù 
utterly baseless (or groundless)
毫无疑义
Háo wú yíyì 
no doubt
毫无助益
háo wú zhùyì 
be of no help at all

Suǒyǒu de shìqing dōu háowú tóuxù，zhēn ràng rén fánluàn。
Everything is in a complete mess, which drives people crazy.
虚假招聘惯常的伎俩是先收费后培训，最后毫无音讯。

这件事情毫无疑义，可以下结论了。

Tā jīnglìle yìliánchuàn háowúgǎnqíng de yíyèqíng。
他经历了一连串毫无感情的一夜情。
On the rough sea ice you may on an unshadowed day...fall over a chunk of ice that is kneehigh.

当他们在光秃秃的山上毫无防备地挤做一团的时候，有人对他们发起了进攻。

Tā de liǎn shàng háowú biǎoqíng，zhǐyǒu mámù de wúdòngyúzhōng。

The girl lay in her arms lifelessly.
Nǚhái háowúshēngqì de tǎng zài tā de huái zhōng。

I was caught in the bastardly traffic.

He wandered around aimlessly.
Tā háowúmùbiāo de sìchù yóuguàng。

在宣读判决书时，他的脸上依然毫无表情。
She looked at him inexpressively.
Tā háowú biǎoqíng de wàngzhe tā。
她毫无表情地望着他。
I\'ll be a gone coon when the battle starts.

He insulted us gratuitously.

The shock was unprepared.
Zhè cì dǎjī lìngrén háowúzhǔnbèi。

He had no inkling what was about to happen.
Tā duì wèilái yào fāshēng shénme háo wú gàiniàn。

háobùyóuyù 
without the least hesitation
他是他，我是我，我们毫不相干。
Tā shì tā，wǒ shì wǒ，wǒmen háo bùxiānggān。
He is he, I am I; we have nothing to do with each other.

This tribe refused to yield to the powerful invaders, and fought bravely.
不少人都在争夺这个肥差，他却毫不动心。

Everybody is contending for this lucrative job, but he shows the least interest.
他我行我素，毫不在乎大家对他的看法。

He went his own way, and doesn\'t care what other people think.
他毫不犹豫地加入了支援西部的大学生队伍。

He joined in the undergraduates in assisting the western region without second thought.
他常年在外飘荡，对什么人都毫不戒惧。

He drifts outside all year round, afraid of nobody.
面对疯狂的匪徒他毫不畏惧，怒喝一声就冲了上去。

小王总是临危不惧，哪怕身处险地也毫不惊慌。

Xiao Wang is always fearless and never panics even when in danger.
面对凶顽的歹徒，勇敢的民警毫不畏惧。

民警们毫不畏惧，勇敢地抓捕凶顽。

The policemen had no fear, courageously running after the gangsters.
她毫不迟疑地离开了家。
Tā háobùchíyíde líkāilejiā。
She didn\'t hesitate to leave home.

这伙子人和刚才那群人好象不是一起的。

This crowd doesn\'t seem to be together with that one.
这伙强盗箕踞在太行山上已经很久了。

This band of robbers has occupied the Taihang Mountain for a long time.

这伙抢银行的狂徒已经被警方擒获了。

他是一个重情味的好小伙儿。

He is a sentimental young man.

Zhège tānzhǔ hěnhuì zuò shēngyì，duì gùkè rèqíng qiě cóng bùquējīn duǎnliǎng，suǒyǐ dàhuǒr dōu ài mǎi tā de cài。

看那伙人的神态，就知道他们图谋不轨。

这小伙儿长得真俊，难怪这么多姑娘喜欢。

This young man is very handsome and attracts many girls.
你被骗了，这两个人根本就是一伙儿的。

我跟爸爸磨蹭了半天，他才答应明天带我到动物园玩去。

I kept on at my father until he promised to take me to the zoo tomorrow.

nǐ bàbɑ
your father
他说话的神气特别像他爸爸。
Tā shuōhuà de shénqì tèbié xiàng tā bàba。

他爸爸以前讨过饭。

爷爷去世了，爸爸向亲朋好友发了哀启。

gōngbù zuìzhuàng

gàozhuàng
go to law against sb.; bring a lawsuit against sb.

为这点小事跟人打架，你可真是犯浑！

他是徒手格斗的能手。
A 70\'s activist went to see as a committed drinker and bowler.

他们改变到对手立场之后，有人说他们是叛徒。
徒然耗费精力
túrán hàofèi jīnɡlì 
waste one\'s energy (or effort)
如果那么办，徒然有利于敌人。
Rúguǒ nàme bàn，túrán yǒulì yú dírén。
To do that will only be to the advantage of the enemy.
歹徒突然从包中掏出一把亮锃锃的匕首。
Dǎitú tūrán cóng bāo zhōng tāochū yìbǎ liàngzèngzèng de bǐshǒu。
The gangster suddenly fished out a dazzling dagger from the bag.
你这叛徒逆贼，居然还敢回来。
Nǐ zhè pàntú nìzéi，jūrán hái gǎn huílái。
You traitor, how dare you come back?
面对歹徒，他总能表现出泰然自若的神情，充分体现出一位老刑警的冷静与睿智。
Miànduì dǎitú，tā zǒng néng biǎoxiàn chū tàiránzìruò de shénqíng，chōngfèn tǐxiàn chū yíwèi lǎoxíngjǐng de lěngjìng yǔ ruìzhì。
He is calm and fearless when faced with a gangster, displaying the soberness and wisdom of a long-time criminal policeman.
纵有天大的本事也是徒然。
徒然损失了几百万。
徒然说句空话罢了。

两天前他下决心戒酒，现在似乎是徒劳的。
She was too drained to carry on this impossible, futile war any longer.

她已经筋疲力尽了，不能再继续这场不可能的，徒劳的战争。
He fired over their heads in vain.
Tā túláo de wǎng tāmen de tóudǐng sǎoshè。
他徒劳地往他们的头顶扫射。
It was a fool\'s errand and there wasn\'t any gold to be found.
Zhè shì túláo de gōngzuò，gēnběn zhǎobúdào huángjīn。
这是徒劳的工作，根本找不到黄金。
Hiring someone to finish the project will be to little purpose.
Qǐng rén wánchéng zhè ge xiàngmù shì túláo de。
请人完成这个项目是徒劳的。
It was a heavy play and the actors tried in vain to give life to it.
Nà shì yì chū chénmèn de xìjù，yǎnyuán men túláo de shìtú fùyǔ tā shēngqì。
那是一出沉闷的戏剧，演员们徒劳地试图赋予它生气。
If the effort brings no compensating gain it is a waste.
Rúguǒ nǔlì méiyǒu dàilái péicháng，nà jiùshì yì zhǒng túláo。
如果努力没有带来赔偿，那就是一种徒劳。
They made a futile play for power.

他们徒劳地想获得权力。
It was all for naught.

所有努力都是徒劳。

有这样好的徒工，老师傅甭提有多高兴了。

Needless to say, the old master worker was happy to have such good apprentices.
徒工把旧机器拆了又安，安了又拆，折腾了好多回。
Túgōngbǎ jiùjīqì chāi le yòu ān，ān le yòu chāi，zhēténg le hǎoduō huí。
The young apprentice again and again took the old machine apart and then put it together.
他做地下工作时，曾因叛徒告密而被捕。

The master is always ready to help his students.
如今他就想多传几个徒弟，他不希望这祖传的行当成为绝门儿。
Rújīn tā jiù xiǎng duōchuán jǐgè túdì，tā bùxīwàng zhè zǔchuán de hángdàng chéngwéi juéménr。
All he thinks about nowadays is to have more apprentices, because he doesn\'t want this business that has been passed on for generations to have no-one inherit it from his generation.

He was injured in a fight with a gangster, and then got an infection from the wounds of the heavy beating.

He shouted at the gangsters with fury.

This child is not only handsome but also very smart.

他是一名虔诚的佛徒，已经出家修行二十年了。

He is a pious Buddhist and has been a monk for 20 years.
他是一名回教徒，在生活习惯上和我们不太一样。

He believe\'s in Islam, so he has different living habits than the rest of us.

We shall fight against treacherous enemies bravely.

The pope uses missionaries to convey his doctrines to believers.
取经途中师徒四人遇到了很多精怪。
Qǔjīng tú zhōng shītú sì rén yùdào le hěnduō jīngguài。
On the way to the West, the monk and his followers encountered a lot of demons.
谁记住那位勇治歹徒的警察的警号了？
Shéi jìzhù nà wèi yǒngzhì dǎitú de jǐngchá de jǐnghào le？
Who can remember the police ID of the policeman who caught the gangster?
他每天都喝得醉醺醺的，是个十足的酒徒。
Tā měitiān dōu hē de zuìxūnxūn de，shì gè shízú de jiǔtú。
He gets drunk every day and is a real wino.
东汉末年，司徒王允使用连环计杀了奸贼董卓。
Dōnghàn mònián，Sītú Wángyǔn shǐyòng liánhuánjì shā le jiānzéi Dǒng Zhuó。
At the end of the East Han Dynasty, Situ Wang Yong killed the traitor Dong Zhou by using interlinking plans.
我马齿徒增，如今能受您重用，不胜感激。
Wǒ mǎchǐ túzēng，rújīn néng shòu nín zhòngyòng，búshèng gǎnjī。
Since I frittered away my time and accomplished nothing, I am extremely grateful that you have put me in an important position.
在警察赶到之前，他已经跟歹徒扭扯到了一起。
Zài jǐngchá gǎndào zhīqián，tā yǐjing gēn dǎitú niǔchědào le yìqǐ。
He scuffled with the gangster before the police arrived.
我们利用敲山震虎的办法使歹徒们露出了马脚。
Wǒmen lìyòng qiāoshān zhènhǔ de bànfǎ shǐ dǎitúmen lòuchū le mǎjiǎo。
We made the gang give their position away by attacking in an indirect way.
教我们生物课的老师是位清真教的教徒。
Jiāo wǒmen shēngwùkè de lǎoshī shì wèi qīngzhēnjiào de jiàotú。
Our biology teacher is a Muslim.
那个歹徒当街施暴无辜百姓，引起了公愤。
Nàge dǎitú dāngjiē shībào wúgū bǎixìng，yǐnqǐ le gōngfèn。
That ruffian bullied innocent people right in the street, which triggered public anger.
头家每天可以从赌徒身上捞到不少钱。
Tóujiā měitiān kěyǐ cóng dǔtú shēnshàng lāodào bùshǎo qián。
In gambling, the person who takes a percentage of the kitty can earn a great deal of money from gamblers.
我看她也没什么真本事，徒有其表罢了。
Wǒ kàn tā yě méi shénme zhēn běnshì，túyǒu qíbiǎo bà le。
I think she has no real ability, just an unwarranted reputation.
法院以委琐妇女罪判处他9年有期徒刑。
Fǎyuàn yǐ wěisuǒ fùnǚzuì pànchǔ tā jiǔnián yǒuqī túxíng。
The court sentenced him to 9 years imprisonment on the charge of bawdry.
他们对国家效死尽忠，发誓决不当叛徒。
Tāmen duì guójiā xiàosǐ jìn zhōng，fāshì jué bùdāng pàntú。
They devote their lives to the motherland and vow to die rather than become a traitor.
歹徒目露凶光的样子让她很害怕。
Dǎitú mùlòu xiōngguāng de yàngzi ràng tā hěn hàipà。
The ferocious look in the gangster\'s eyes scared her very much.
歹徒的凶蛮相是无论如何也吓不倒我们的。
Dǎitú de xiōngmán xiàng shì wúlùn rúhé yě xiàbùdǎo wǒmen de。
Gangsters can never threaten us by their cruelty.
这个歹徒贼头贼脑的，寻机作案。
Zhège dǎitú zéitóu zéinǎo de，xúnjī zuòàn。
This thief behaves stealthily and looks for an opportunity to steal something.
小林九岁就到村口的老木匠家当了艺徒。
Xiǎo lín jiǔ suì jiù dào cūnkǒu de lǎomùjiàng jiā dāng le yìtú。
Xiao Lin has been an apprentice of the old carpenter at the village entrance since he was nine.
安徒生的小说流传很广，中国很早就有了影印本。
Āntúshēng de xiǎoshuō liúchuán hěnguǎng，Zhōngguó hěnzǎo jiùyǒu le yǐngyìnběn。
Andersen\'s stories are broadly circulated. We have had photocopies of them in China a long time.
犹大背叛了耶稣，是基督教中的叛徒。
Yóudà bèipàn le yēsū，shì jīdūjiào zhōng de pàntú。
Judas betrayed Jesus, which makes him the traitor of Christianity.
干警缴获了歹徒用来行凶的折刀。
Gànjǐng jiǎohuò le dǎitú yònglái xíngxiōng de zhédāo。
The policmen seized the folding knife that was used by the scoundrels.
疯狂的歹徒以自爆结束了他罪恶的生命。
Fēngkuáng de dǎitú yǐ zìbào jiéshù le tā zuìè de shēngmìng。
The crazy bandit attempted to end his evil life with a suicide bomb.
我们面对的是罪恶滔天的歹徒，所以在对决时不能有半点犹豫。
Wǒmen miànduì de shì zuìè tāotiān de dǎitú，suǒyǐ zài duìjué shí bùnéng yǒu bàndiǎn yóuyù。
In front of us are the most heinous criminals, so we shouldn\'t hesitate at all when confronting them.

Lǎmajiào de huófó tèbié shòu jiàotú zūnzhòng。
